original: RV_8,013.07a pratnavaj janayā giraḥ śṛṇudhī jaritur havam /
analyzed: pratna vat janayā giraḥ śṛṇudhi jarituḥ havam

original: RV_8,013.07c made-made vavakṣithā sukṛtvane //
analyzed: mademade vavakṣitha su kṛtvane

original: RV_8,013.08a krīḷanty asya sūnṛtā āpo na pravatā yatīḥ /
analyzed: krīḍanti asya sūnṛtāḥ āpaḥ na pravatā yatīḥ

original: RV_8,013.08c ayā dhiyā ya ucyate patir divaḥ //
analyzed: ayā dhiyā yaḥ ucyate patiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_8,013.09a uto patir ya ucyate kṛṣṭīnām eka id vaśī /
analyzed: uta u patiḥ yaḥ ucyate kṛṣṭīnām ekaḥ id vaśī

original: RV_8,013.09c namovṛdhair avasyubhiḥ sute raṇa //
analyzed: namaḥ vṛdhaiḥ avasyubhiḥ sute raṇa

original: RV_8,013.10a stuhi śrutaṃ vipaścitaṃ harī yasya prasakṣiṇā /
analyzed: stuhi śrutam vipaścitam harī yasya prasakṣiṇā

original: RV_8,013.10c gantārā dāśuṣo gṛhaṃ namasvinaḥ //
analyzed: gantārā dāśuṣaḥ gṛham namasvinaḥ

original: RV_8,013.11a tūtujāno mahemate 'śvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ /
analyzed: tūtujānaḥ mahemate śvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.11c ā yāhi yajñam āśubhiḥ śam id dhi te //
analyzed: ā yāhi yajñam āśubhiḥ śam id hi te

original: RV_8,013.12a indra śaviṣṭha satpate rayiṃ gṛṇatsu dhāraya /
analyzed: indra śaviṣṭha satpate rayim gṛṇatsu dhāraya

original: RV_8,013.12c śravaḥ sūribhyo amṛtaṃ vasutvanam //
analyzed: śravaḥ sūribhyaḥ amṛtam vasutvanam

original: RV_8,013.13a have tvā sūra udite have madhyandine divaḥ /
analyzed: have tvā sūre udite have madhyandine divaḥ

original: RV_8,013.13c juṣāṇa indra saptibhir na ā gahi //
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ indra saptibhiḥ naḥ ā gahi

original: RV_8,013.14a ā tū gahi pra tu drava matsvā sutasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: ā tū gahi pra tu drava matsva sutasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,013.14c tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ yathā vide //
analyzed: tantum tanuṣva pūrvyam yathā vide

original: RV_8,013.15a yac chakrāsi parāvati yad arvāvati vṛtrahan /
analyzed: yat śakra asi parāvati yat arvāvati vṛtrahan

original: RV_8,013.15c yad vā samudre andhaso 'vited asi //
analyzed: yat vā samudre andhasaḥ vitā id asi

original: RV_8,013.16a indraṃ vardhantu no gira indraṃ sutāsa indavaḥ /
analyzed: indram vardhantu naḥ giraḥ indram sutāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_8,013.16c indre haviṣmatīr viśo arāṇiṣuḥ //
analyzed: indre haviṣmatīḥ viśaḥ arāṇiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,013.17a tam id viprā avasyavaḥ pravatvatībhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: tam id viprāḥ avasyavaḥ pravatvatībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.17c indraṃ kṣoṇīr avardhayan vayā iva //
analyzed: indram kṣoṇīḥ avardhayan vayāḥ iva

original: RV_8,013.18a trikadrukeṣu cetanaṃ devāso yajñam atnata /
analyzed: trikadrukeṣu cetanam devāsaḥ yajñam atnata

original: RV_8,013.18c tam id vardhantu no giraḥ sadāvṛdham //
analyzed: tam id vardhantu naḥ giraḥ sadāvṛdham

original: RV_8,013.19a stotā yat te anuvrata ukthāny ṛtuthā dadhe /
analyzed: stotā yat te anuvrataḥ ukthāni ṛtuthā dadhe

original: RV_8,013.19c śuciḥ pāvaka ucyate so adbhutaḥ //
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ ucyate saḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_8,013.20a tad id rudrasya cetati yahvam pratneṣu dhāmasu /
analyzed: tat id rudrasya cetati yahvam pratneṣu dhāmasu

original: RV_8,013.20c mano yatrā vi tad dadhur vicetasaḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ yatrā vi tat vicetasaḥ

original: RV_8,013.21a yadi me sakhyam āvara imasya pāhy andhasaḥ /
analyzed: yadi me sakhyam āvaraḥ imasya pāhi andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,013.21c yena viśvā ati dviṣo atārima //
analyzed: yena viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ atārima

original: RV_8,013.22a kadā ta indra girvaṇa stotā bhavāti śantamaḥ /
analyzed: kadā te indra girvaṇaḥ stotā bhavāti śantamaḥ

original: RV_8,013.22c kadā no gavye aśvye vasau dadhaḥ //
analyzed: kadā naḥ gavye aśvye vasau dadhaḥ

original: RV_8,013.23a uta te suṣṭutā harī vṛṣaṇā vahato ratham /
analyzed: uta te suṣṭutā harī vṛṣaṇā vahataḥ ratham

original: RV_8,013.23c ajuryasya madintamaṃ yam īmahe //
analyzed: ajuryasya madintamam yam īmahe

original: RV_8,013.24a tam īmahe puruṣṭutaṃ yahvam pratnābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: tam īmahe puruṣṭutam yahvam pratnābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.24c ni barhiṣi priye sadad adha dvitā //
analyzed: ni barhiṣi priye sadat adha dvitā

original: RV_8,013.25a vardhasvā su puruṣṭuta ṛṣiṣṭutābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: vardhasva su puruṣṭuta ṛṣiṣṭutābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.25c dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam avā ca naḥ //
analyzed: dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam ava ca naḥ

original: RV_8,013.26a indra tvam avited asītthā stuvato adrivaḥ /
analyzed: indra tvam avitā id asi itthā stuvataḥ adrivas

original: RV_8,013.26c ṛtād iyarmi te dhiyam manoyujam //
analyzed: ṛtāt iyarmi te dhiyam manaḥ yujam

original: RV_8,013.27a iha tyā sadhamādyā yujānaḥ somapītaye /
analyzed: iha tyā sadhamādyā yujānaḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_8,013.27c harī indra pratadvasū abhi svara //
analyzed: harī indra pratadvasū abhi svara

original: RV_8,013.28a abhi svarantu ye tava rudrāsaḥ sakṣata śriyam /
analyzed: abhi svarantu ye tava rudrāsaḥ sakṣata śriyam

original: RV_8,013.28c uto marutvatīr viśo abhi prayaḥ //
analyzed: uta u marutvatīḥ viśaḥ abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_8,013.29a imā asya pratūrtayaḥ padaṃ juṣanta yad divi /
analyzed: imāḥ asya pratūrtayaḥ padam juṣanta yat divi

original: RV_8,013.29c nābhā yajñasya saṃ dadhur yathā vide //
analyzed: nābhā yajñasya sam dadhuḥ yathā vide

original: RV_8,013.30a ayaṃ dīrghāya cakṣase prāci prayaty adhvare /
analyzed: ayam dīrghāya cakṣase prāci prayati adhvare

original: RV_8,013.30c mimīte yajñam ānuṣag vicakṣya //
analyzed: mimīte yajñam ānuṣak vicakṣya

original: RV_8,013.31a vṛṣāyam indra te ratha uto te vṛṣaṇā harī /
analyzed: vṛṣā ayam indra te rathaḥ uta u te vṛṣaṇā harī

original: RV_8,013.31c vṛṣā tvaṃ śatakrato vṛṣā havaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā tvam śatakrato vṛṣā havaḥ

original: RV_8,013.32a vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā mado vṛṣā somo ayaṃ sutaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā madaḥ vṛṣā somaḥ ayam sutaḥ

original: RV_8,013.32c vṛṣā yajño yam invasi vṛṣā havaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā yajñaḥ yam invasi vṛṣā havaḥ

original: RV_8,013.33a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ huve vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇam huve vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,013.33c vāvantha hi pratiṣṭutiṃ vṛṣā havaḥ //
analyzed: vāvantha hi pratiṣṭutim vṛṣā havaḥ

original: RV_8,014.01a yad indrāhaṃ yathā tvam īśīya vasva eka it /
analyzed: yat indra aham yathā tvam īśīya vasvaḥ ekaḥ id

original: RV_8,014.01c stotā me goṣakhā syāt //
analyzed: stotā me go sakhā syāt

original: RV_8,014.02a śikṣeyam asmai ditseyaṃ śacīpate manīṣiṇe /
analyzed: śikṣeyam asmai ditseyam śacīpate manīṣiṇe

original: RV_8,014.02c yad ahaṃ gopatiḥ syām //
analyzed: yat aham gopatiḥ syām

original: RV_8,014.03a dhenuṣ ṭa indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate /
analyzed: dhenuḥ te indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_8,014.03c gām aśvam pipyuṣī duhe //
analyzed: gām aśvam pipyuṣī duhe

original: RV_8,014.04a na te vartāsti rādhasa indra devo na martyaḥ /
analyzed: na te vartā asti rādhasaḥ indra devaḥ na martyaḥ

original: RV_8,014.04c yad ditsasi stuto magham //
analyzed: yat ditsasi stutaḥ magham

original: RV_8,014.05a yajña indram avardhayad yad bhūmiṃ vy avartayat /
analyzed: yajñaḥ indram avardhayat yat bhūmim vi avartayat

original: RV_8,014.05c cakrāṇa opaśaṃ divi //
analyzed: cakrāṇaḥ opaśam divi

original: RV_8,014.06a vāvṛdhānasya te vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ /
analyzed: vāvṛdhānasya te vayam viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ

original: RV_8,014.06c ūtim indrā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: ūtim indra vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_8,014.07a vy antarikṣam atiran made somasya rocanā /
analyzed: vi antarikṣam atirat made somasya rocanā

original: RV_8,014.07c indro yad abhinad valam //
analyzed: indraḥ yat abhinat valam

original: RV_8,014.08a ud gā ājad aṅgirobhya āviṣ kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ /
analyzed: ud gāḥ ājat aṅgirobhyaḥ āvis kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ

original: RV_8,014.08c arvāñcaṃ nunude valam //
analyzed: arvāñcam nunude valam

original: RV_8,014.09a indreṇa rocanā divo dṛḷhāni dṛṃhitāni ca /
analyzed: indreṇa rocanā divaḥ dṛḍhāni dṛṃhitāni ca

original: RV_8,014.09c sthirāṇi na parāṇude //
analyzed: sthirāṇi na parāṇude

original: RV_8,014.10a apām ūrmir madann iva stoma indrājirāyate /
analyzed: apām ūrmiḥ madan iva stomaḥ indra ajirāyate

original: RV_8,014.10c vi te madā arājiṣuḥ //
analyzed: vi te madāḥ arājiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,014.11a tvaṃ hi stomavardhana indrāsy ukthavardhanaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi stoma vardhanaḥ indra asi uktha vardhanaḥ

original: RV_8,014.11c stotṝṇām uta bhadrakṛt //
analyzed: stotṝṇām uta bhadra kṛt

original: RV_8,014.12a indram it keśinā harī somapeyāya vakṣataḥ /
analyzed: indram id keśinā harī soma peyāya vakṣataḥ

original: RV_8,014.12c upa yajñaṃ surādhasam //
analyzed: upa yajñam su rādhasam

original: RV_8,014.13a apām phenena namuceḥ śira indrod avartayaḥ /
analyzed: apām phenena namuceḥ śiraḥ indra ud avartayaḥ

original: RV_8,014.13c viśvā yad ajaya spṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: viśvāḥ yat ajayaḥ spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_8,014.14a māyābhir utsisṛpsata indra dyām ārurukṣataḥ /
analyzed: māyābhiḥ utsisṛpsataḥ indra dyām ārurukṣataḥ

original: RV_8,014.14c ava dasyūṃr adhūnuthāḥ //
analyzed: ava dasyūṃr adhūnuthāḥ

original: RV_8,014.15a asunvām indra saṃsadaṃ viṣūcīṃ vy anāśayaḥ /
analyzed: asunvām indra saṃsadam viṣūcīm vi anāśayaḥ

original: RV_8,014.15c somapā uttaro bhavan //
analyzed: soma pāḥ uttaraḥ bhavan

original: RV_8,015.01a tam v abhi pra gāyata puruhūtam puruṣṭutam /
analyzed: tam u abhi pra gāyata puru hūtam puruṣṭutam

original: RV_8,015.01c indraṃ gīrbhis taviṣam ā vivāsata //
analyzed: indram gīrbhiḥ taviṣam ā vivāsata

original: RV_8,015.02a yasya dvibarhaso bṛhat saho dādhāra rodasī /
analyzed: yasya dvibarhasaḥ bṛhat sahaḥ dādhāra rodasī

original: RV_8,015.02c girīṃr ajrāṃ apaḥ svar vṛṣatvanā //
analyzed: girīṃr ajrān apaḥ svar vṛṣatvanā

original: RV_8,015.03a sa rājasi puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi jighnase /
analyzed: sa rājasi puruṣṭutam ekaḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnase

original: RV_8,015.03c indra jaitrā śravasyā ca yantave //
analyzed: indra jaitrā śravasyā ca yantave

original: RV_8,015.04a taṃ te madaṃ gṛṇīmasi vṛṣaṇam pṛtsu sāsahim /
analyzed: tam te madam gṛṇīmasi vṛṣaṇam pṛtsu sāsahim

original: RV_8,015.04c u lokakṛtnum adrivo hariśriyam //
analyzed: u loka kṛtnum adrivas hari śriyam

original: RV_8,015.05a yena jyotīṃṣy āyave manave ca viveditha /
analyzed: yena jyotīṃṣi āyave manave ca viveditha

original: RV_8,015.05c mandāno asya barhiṣo vi rājasi //
analyzed: mandānaḥ asya barhiṣaḥ vi rājasi

original: RV_8,015.06a tad adyā cit ta ukthino 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā /
analyzed: tat adyā cit te ukthinaḥ nu stuvanti pūrvathā

original: RV_8,015.06c vṛṣapatnīr apo jayā dive-dive //
analyzed: vṛṣa patnīḥ apaḥ jaya dive dive

original: RV_8,015.07a tava tyad indriyam bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum /
analyzed: tava tyad indriyam bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum

original: RV_8,015.07c vajraṃ śiśāti dhiṣaṇā vareṇyam //
analyzed: vajram śiśāti dhiṣaṇā vareṇyam

original: RV_8,015.08a tava dyaur indra pauṃsyam pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ /
analyzed: tava dyauḥ indra pauṃsyam pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ

original: RV_8,015.08c tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaś ca hinvire //
analyzed: tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaḥ ca hinvire

original: RV_8,015.09a tvāṃ viṣṇur bṛhan kṣayo mitro gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ /
analyzed: tvām viṣṇuḥ bṛhan kṣayaḥ mitraḥ gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ

original: RV_8,015.09c tvāṃ śardho madaty anu mārutam //
analyzed: tvām śardhaḥ madati anu mārutam

original: RV_8,015.10a tvaṃ vṛṣā janānām maṃhiṣṭha indra jajñiṣe /
analyzed: tvam vṛṣā janānām maṃhiṣṭhaḥ indra jajñiṣe

original: RV_8,015.10c satrā viśvā svapatyāni dadhiṣe //
analyzed: satrā viśvā su apatyāni dadhiṣe

original: RV_8,015.11a satrā tvam puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi tośase /
analyzed: satrā tvam puruṣṭutam ekaḥ vṛtrāṇi tośase

original: RV_8,015.11c nānya indrāt karaṇam bhūya invati //
analyzed: na anyaḥ indrāt karaṇam bhūyaḥ invati

original: RV_8,015.12a yad indra manmaśas tvā nānā havanta ūtaye /
analyzed: yat indra manmaśas tvā nānā havante ūtaye

original: RV_8,015.12c asmākebhir nṛbhir atrā svar jaya //
analyzed: asmākebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ atra svar jaya

original: RV_8,015.13a araṃ kṣayāya no mahe viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan /
analyzed: aram kṣayāya naḥ mahe viśvā rūpāṇi āviśan

original: RV_8,015.13c indraṃ jaitrāya harṣayā śacīpatim //
analyzed: indram jaitrāya harṣaya śacīpatim

original: RV_8,016.01a pra samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnām indraṃ stotā navyaṃ gīrbhiḥ /
analyzed: pra samrājam carṣaṇīnām indram stota navyam gīrbhiḥ

original: RV_8,016.01c naraṃ nṛṣāham maṃhiṣṭham //
analyzed: naram nṛṣāham maṃhiṣṭham

original: RV_8,016.02a yasminn ukthāni raṇyanti viśvāni ca śravasyā /
analyzed: yasmin ukthāni raṇyanti viśvāni ca śravasyā

original: RV_8,016.02c apām avo na samudre //
analyzed: apām avaḥ na samudre

original: RV_8,016.03a taṃ suṣṭutyā vivāse jyeṣṭharājam bhare kṛtnum /
analyzed: tam suṣṭutyā vivāse jyeṣṭha rājam bhare kṛtnum

original: RV_8,016.03c maho vājinaṃ sanibhyaḥ //
analyzed: mahaḥ vājinam sanibhyaḥ

original: RV_8,016.04a yasyānūnā gabhīrā madā uravas tarutrāḥ /
analyzed: yasya anūnāḥ gabhīrāḥ madāḥ uravaḥ tarutrāḥ

original: RV_8,016.04c harṣumantaḥ śūrasātau //
analyzed: harṣumantaḥ śūrasātau

original: RV_8,016.05a tam id dhaneṣu hiteṣv adhivākāya havante /
analyzed: tam id dhaneṣu hiteṣu adhivākāya havante

original: RV_8,016.05c yeṣām indras te jayanti //
analyzed: yeṣām indraḥ te jayanti

original: RV_8,016.06a tam ic cyautnair āryanti taṃ kṛtebhiś carṣaṇayaḥ /
analyzed: tam id cyautnaiḥ āryanti tam kṛtebhiḥ carṣaṇayaḥ

original: RV_8,016.06c eṣa indro varivaskṛt //
analyzed: eṣaḥ indraḥ varivaskṛt

original: RV_8,016.07a indro brahmendra ṛṣir indraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ brahmā indraḥ ṛṣiḥ indraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ

original: RV_8,016.07c mahān mahībhiḥ śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: mahān mahībhiḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_8,016.08a sa stomyaḥ sa havyaḥ satyaḥ satvā tuvikūrmiḥ /
analyzed: sa stomyaḥ sa havyaḥ satyaḥ satvā tuvikūrmiḥ

original: RV_8,016.08c ekaś cit sann abhibhūtiḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ cit san abhibhūtiḥ

original: RV_8,016.09a tam arkebhis taṃ sāmabhis taṃ gāyatraiś carṣaṇayaḥ /
analyzed: tam arkebhiḥ tam sāmabhiḥ tam gāyatraiḥ carṣaṇayaḥ

original: RV_8,016.09c indraṃ vardhanti kṣitayaḥ //
analyzed: indram vardhanti kṣitayaḥ

original: RV_8,016.10a praṇetāraṃ vasyo acchā kartāraṃ jyotiḥ samatsu /
analyzed: praṇetāram vasyaḥ acchā kartāram jyotiḥ samatsu

original: RV_8,016.10c sāsahvāṃsaṃ yudhāmitrān //
analyzed: sāsahvāṃsam yudhā amitrān

original: RV_8,016.11a sa naḥ papriḥ pārayāti svasti nāvā puruhūtaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ papriḥ pārayāti svasti nāvā puruhūtaḥ

original: RV_8,016.11c indro viśvā ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_8,016.12a sa tvaṃ na indra vājebhir daśasyā ca gātuyā ca /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra vājebhiḥ daśasya ca gātuya ca

original: RV_8,016.12c acchā ca naḥ sumnaṃ neṣi //
analyzed: acchā ca naḥ sumnam neṣi

original: RV_8,017.01a ā yāhi suṣumā hi ta indra somam pibā imam /
analyzed: ā yāhi suṣuma hi te indra somam pibā imam

original: RV_8,017.01c edam barhiḥ sado mama //
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ sadaḥ mama

original: RV_8,017.02a ā tvā brahmayujā harī vahatām indra keśinā /
analyzed: ā tvā brahma yujā harī vahatām indra keśinā

original: RV_8,017.02c upa brahmāṇi naḥ śṛṇu //
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi naḥ śṛṇu

original: RV_8,017.03a brahmāṇas tvā vayaṃ yujā somapām indra sominaḥ /
analyzed: brahmāṇaḥ tvā vayam yujā soma pām indra sominaḥ

original: RV_8,017.03c sutāvanto havāmahe //
analyzed: sutāvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,017.04a ā no yāhi sutāvato 'smākaṃ suṣṭutīr upa /
analyzed: ā naḥ yāhi sutāvataḥ smākam suṣṭutīḥ upa

original: RV_8,017.04c pibā su śiprinn andhasaḥ //
analyzed: pibā su śiprin andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,017.05a ā te siñcāmi kukṣyor anu gātrā vi dhāvatu /
analyzed: ā te siñcāmi kukṣyoḥ anu gātrā vi dhāvatu

original: RV_8,017.05c gṛbhāya jihvayā madhu //
analyzed: gṛbhāya jihvayā madhu

original: RV_8,017.06a svāduṣ ṭe astu saṃsude madhumān tanve tava /
analyzed: svāduḥ te astu saṃsude madhumān tanve tava

original: RV_8,017.06c somaḥ śam astu te hṛde //
analyzed: somaḥ śam astu te hṛde

original: RV_8,017.07a ayam u tvā vicarṣaṇe janīr ivābhi saṃvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ayam u tvā vicarṣaṇe janīḥ iva abhi saṃvṛtaḥ

original: RV_8,017.07c pra soma indra sarpatu //
analyzed: pra somaḥ indra sarpatu

original: RV_8,017.08a tuvigrīvo vapodaraḥ subāhur andhaso made /
analyzed: tuvi grīvaḥ vapā udaraḥ su bāhuḥ andhasaḥ made

original: RV_8,017.08c indro vṛtrāṇi jighnate //
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnate

original: RV_8,017.09a indra prehi puras tvaṃ viśvasyeśāna ojasā /
analyzed: indra prehi puras tvam viśvasya īśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_8,017.09c vṛtrāṇi vṛtrahañ jahi //
analyzed: vṛtrāṇi vṛtraham jahi

original: RV_8,017.10a dīrghas te astv aṅkuśo yenā vasu prayacchasi /
analyzed: dīrghaḥ te astu aṅkuśaḥ yena vasu prayacchasi

original: RV_8,017.10c yajamānāya sunvate //
analyzed: yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_8,017.11a ayaṃ ta indra somo nipūto adhi barhiṣi /
analyzed: ayam te indra somaḥ nipūtaḥ adhi barhiṣi

original: RV_8,017.11c ehīm asya dravā piba //
analyzed: ehi īm asya drava piba

original: RV_8,017.12a śācigo śācipūjanāyaṃ raṇāya te sutaḥ /
analyzed: śācigo śācipūjana ayam raṇāya te sutaḥ

original: RV_8,017.12c ākhaṇḍala pra hūyase //
analyzed: ākhaṇḍala pra hūyase

original: RV_8,017.13a yas te śṛṅgavṛṣo napāt praṇapāt kuṇḍapāyyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te śṛṅgavṛṣaḥ napāt praṇapāt kuṇḍapāyyaḥ

original: RV_8,017.13c ny asmin dadhra ā manaḥ //
analyzed: ni asmin dadhre ā manaḥ

original: RV_8,017.14a vāstoṣ pate dhruvā sthūṇāṃsatraṃ somyānām /
analyzed: vāstoḥ pate dhruvā sthūṇā aṃsatram somyānām

original: RV_8,017.14c drapso bhettā purāṃ śaśvatīnām indro munīnāṃ sakhā //
analyzed: drapsaḥ bhettā purām śaśvatīnām indraḥ munīnām sakhā

original: RV_8,017.15a pṛdākusānur yajato gaveṣaṇa ekaḥ sann abhi bhūyasaḥ /
analyzed: pṛdākusānuḥ yajataḥ gaveṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ san abhi bhūyasaḥ

original: RV_8,017.15c bhūrṇim aśvaṃ nayat tujā puro gṛbhendraṃ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: bhūrṇim aśvam nayat tujā puras gṛbhā indram somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,018.01a idaṃ ha nūnam eṣāṃ sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ /
analyzed: idam ha nūnam eṣām sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ

original: RV_8,018.01c ādityānām apūrvyaṃ savīmani //
analyzed: ādityānām apūrvyam savīmani

original: RV_8,018.02a anarvāṇo hy eṣām panthā ādityānām /
analyzed: anarvāṇaḥ hi eṣām panthāḥ ādityānām

original: RV_8,018.02c adabdhāḥ santi pāyavaḥ sugevṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: adabdhāḥ santi pāyavaḥ sugevṛdhaḥ

original: RV_8,018.03a tat su naḥ savitā bhago varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: tat su naḥ savitā bhagaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_8,018.03c śarma yacchantu sapratho yad īmahe //
analyzed: śarma yacchantu saprathaḥ yat īmahe

original: RV_8,018.04a devebhir devy adite 'riṣṭabharmann ā gahi /
analyzed: devebhiḥ devi adite riṣṭa bharman ā gahi

original: RV_8,018.04c smat sūribhiḥ purupriye suśarmabhiḥ //
analyzed: smat sūribhiḥ puru priye su śarmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,018.05a te hi putrāso aditer vidur dveṣāṃsi yotave /
analyzed: te hi putrāsaḥ aditeḥ viduḥ dveṣāṃsi yotave

original: RV_8,018.05c aṃhoś cid urucakrayo 'nehasaḥ //
analyzed: aṃhoḥ cit uru cakrayaḥ na īhasaḥ

original: RV_8,018.06a aditir no divā paśum aditir naktam advayāḥ /
analyzed: aditiḥ naḥ divā paśum aditiḥ naktam advayāḥ

original: RV_8,018.06c aditiḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ sadāvṛdhā //
analyzed: aditiḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ sadā vṛdhā

original: RV_8,018.07a uta syā no divā matir aditir ūtyā gamat /
analyzed: uta syā naḥ divā matiḥ aditiḥ ūtyā gamat

original: RV_8,018.07c sā śantāti mayas karad apa sridhaḥ //
analyzed: sā śantāti mayaḥ karat apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_8,018.08a uta tyā daivyā bhiṣajā śaṃ naḥ karato aśvinā /
analyzed: uta tyā daivyā bhiṣajā śam naḥ karataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,018.08c yuyuyātām ito rapo apa sridhaḥ //
analyzed: yuyuyātām itas rapaḥ apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_8,018.09a śam agnir agnibhiḥ karac chaṃ nas tapatu sūryaḥ /
analyzed: śam agniḥ agnibhiḥ karat śam naḥ tapatu sūryaḥ

original: RV_8,018.09c śaṃ vāto vātv arapā apa sridhaḥ //
analyzed: śam vātaḥ vātu arapāḥ apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_8,018.10a apāmīvām apa sridham apa sedhata durmatim /
analyzed: apa amīvām apa sridham apa sedhata durmatim

original: RV_8,018.10c ādityāso yuyotanā no aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ yuyotana naḥ aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_8,018.11a yuyotā śarum asmad āṃ ādityāsa utāmatim /
analyzed: yuyota śarum asmat ām ādityāsaḥ uta amatim

original: RV_8,018.11c ṛdhag dveṣaḥ kṛṇuta viśvavedasaḥ //
analyzed: ṛdhak dveṣaḥ kṛṇuta viśva vedasaḥ

original: RV_8,018.12a tat su naḥ śarma yacchatādityā yan mumocati /
analyzed: tat su naḥ śarma yacchata ādityāḥ yat mumocati

original: RV_8,018.12c enasvantaṃ cid enasaḥ sudānavaḥ //
analyzed: enasvantam cit enasaḥ sudānavaḥ

original: RV_8,018.13a yo naḥ kaś cid ririkṣati rakṣastvena martyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ kaḥ cit ririkṣati rakṣaḥ tvena martyaḥ

original: RV_8,018.13c svaiḥ ṣa evai ririṣīṣṭa yur janaḥ //
analyzed: svaiḥ saḥ evaiḥ ririṣīṣṭa janaḥ

original: RV_8,018.14a sam it tam agham aśnavad duḥśaṃsam martyaṃ ripum /
analyzed: sam id tam agham aśnavat duḥśaṃsam martyam ripum

original: RV_8,018.14c yo asmatrā durhaṇāvāṃ upa dvayuḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ asmatrā upa dvayuḥ

original: RV_8,018.15a pākatrā sthana devā hṛtsu jānītha martyam /
analyzed: pākatrā sthana devāḥ hṛtsu jānītha martyam

original: RV_8,018.15c upa dvayuṃ cādvayuṃ ca vasavaḥ //
analyzed: upa dvayum ca advayum ca vasavaḥ

original: RV_8,018.16a ā śarma parvatānām otāpāṃ vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: ā śarma parvatānām ā uta apām vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_8,018.16c dyāvākṣāmāre asmad rapas kṛtam //
analyzed: dyāvākṣāmā āre asmat rapaḥ kṛtam

original: RV_8,018.17a te no bhadreṇa śarmaṇā yuṣmākaṃ nāvā vasavaḥ /
analyzed: te naḥ bhadreṇa śarmaṇā yuṣmākam nāvā vasavaḥ

original: RV_8,018.17c ati viśvāni duritā pipartana //
analyzed: ati viśvāni duritā pipartana

original: RV_8,018.18a tuce tanāya tat su no drāghīya āyur jīvase /
analyzed: tuce tanāya tat su naḥ drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ jīvase

original: RV_8,018.18c ādityāsaḥ sumahasaḥ kṛṇotana //
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ su mahasaḥ kṛṇotana

original: RV_8,018.19a yajño hīḷo vo antara ādityā asti mṛḷata /
analyzed: yajñaḥ hīḍaḥ vaḥ antare ādityāḥ asti mṛḍata

original: RV_8,018.19c yuṣme id vo api ṣmasi sajātye //
analyzed: yuṣme id vaḥ api smasi sajātye

original: RV_8,018.20a bṛhad varūtham marutāṃ devaṃ trātāram aśvinā /
analyzed: bṛhat varūtham marutām devam trātāram aśvinā

original: RV_8,018.20c mitram īmahe varuṇaṃ svastaye //
analyzed: mitram īmahe varuṇam svastaye

original: RV_8,018.21a aneho mitrāryaman nṛvad varuṇa śaṃsyam /
analyzed: anehaḥ mitra aryaman nṛvat varuṇa śaṃsyam

original: RV_8,018.21c trivarūtham maruto yanta naś chardiḥ //
analyzed: tri varūtham marutaḥ yanta naḥ chardiḥ

original: RV_8,018.22a ye cid dhi mṛtyubandhava ādityā manavaḥ smasi /
analyzed: ye cit hi mṛtyu bandhavaḥ ādityāḥ manavaḥ smasi

original: RV_8,018.22c pra sū na āyur jīvase tiretana //
analyzed: pra su naḥ āyuḥ jīvase tiretana

original: RV_8,019.01a taṃ gūrdhayā svarṇaraṃ devāso devam aratiṃ dadhanvire /
analyzed: tam gūrdhayā svarṇaram devāsaḥ devam aratim dadhanvire

original: RV_8,019.01c devatrā havyam ohire //
analyzed: devatrā havyam ohire

original: RV_8,019.02a vibhūtarātiṃ vipra citraśociṣam agnim īḷiṣva yanturam /
analyzed: vibhūta rātim vipra citra śociṣam agnim īḍiṣva yanturam

original: RV_8,019.02c asya medhasya somyasya sobhare prem adhvarāya pūrvyam //
analyzed: asya medhasya somyasya sobhare pra īm adhvarāya pūrvyam

original: RV_8,019.03a yajiṣṭhaṃ tvā vavṛmahe devaṃ devatrā hotāram amartyam /
analyzed: yajiṣṭham tvā vavṛmahe devam devatrā hotāram amartyam

original: RV_8,019.03c asya yajñasya sukratum //
analyzed: asya yajñasya sukratum

original: RV_8,019.04a ūrjo napātaṃ subhagaṃ sudīditim agniṃ śreṣṭhaśociṣam /
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napātam subhagam su dīditim agnim śreṣṭha śociṣam

original: RV_8,019.04c sa no mitrasya varuṇasya so apām ā sumnaṃ yakṣate divi //
analyzed: sa naḥ mitrasya varuṇasya saḥ apām ā sumnam yakṣate divi

original: RV_8,019.05a yaḥ samidhā ya āhutī yo vedena dadāśa marto agnaye /
analyzed: yaḥ samidhā yaḥ āhutī yaḥ vedena dadāśa martaḥ agnaye

original: RV_8,019.05c yo namasā svadhvaraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ namasā su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_8,019.06a tasyed arvanto raṃhayanta āśavas tasya dyumnitamaṃ yaśaḥ /
analyzed: tasya id arvantaḥ raṃhayantaḥ āśavaḥ tasya dyumnitamam yaśaḥ

original: RV_8,019.06c na tam aṃho devakṛtaṃ kutaś cana na martyakṛtaṃ naśat //
analyzed: na tam aṃhaḥ deva kṛtam kutas cana na martya kṛtam naśat

original: RV_8,019.07a svagnayo vo agnibhiḥ syāma sūno sahasa ūrjām pate /
analyzed: su agnayaḥ vaḥ agnibhiḥ syāma sūno sahasaḥ ūrjām pate

original: RV_8,019.07c suvīras tvam asmayuḥ //
analyzed: su vīraḥ tvam asmayuḥ

original: RV_8,019.08a praśaṃsamāno atithir na mitriyo 'gnī ratho na vedyaḥ /
analyzed: praśaṃsamānaḥ atithiḥ na mitriyaḥ gniḥ rathaḥ na vedyaḥ

original: RV_8,019.08c tve kṣemāso api santi sādhavas tvaṃ rājā rayīṇām //
analyzed: tve kṣemāsaḥ api santi sādhavaḥ tvam rājā rayīṇām

original: RV_8,019.09a so addhā dāśvadhvaro 'gne martaḥ subhaga sa praśaṃsyaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ addhā dāśu adhvaraḥ gne martaḥ subhaga sa praśaṃsyaḥ

original: RV_8,019.09c sa dhībhir astu sanitā //
analyzed: sa dhībhiḥ astu sanitā

original: RV_8,019.10a yasya tvam ūrdhvo adhvarāya tiṣṭhasi kṣayadvīraḥ sa sādhate /
analyzed: yasya tvam ūrdhvaḥ adhvarāya tiṣṭhasi kṣayadvīraḥ sa sādhate

original: RV_8,019.10c so arvadbhiḥ sanitā sa vipanyubhiḥ sa śūraiḥ sanitā kṛtam //
analyzed: saḥ arvadbhiḥ sanitā sa vipanyubhiḥ sa śūraiḥ sanitā kṛtam

original: RV_8,019.11a yasyāgnir vapur gṛhe stomaṃ cano dadhīta viśvavāryaḥ /
analyzed: yasya agniḥ vapuḥ gṛhe stomam canaḥ dadhīta viśva vāryaḥ

original: RV_8,019.11c havyā vā veviṣad viṣaḥ //
analyzed: havyā vā veviṣat viṣaḥ

original: RV_8,019.12a viprasya vā stuvataḥ sahaso yaho makṣūtamasya rātiṣu /
analyzed: viprasya vā stuvataḥ sahasaḥ yaho makṣūtamasya rātiṣu

original: RV_8,019.12c avodevam uparimartyaṃ kṛdhi vaso vividuṣo vacaḥ //
analyzed: avas udevam upari martyam kṛdhi vaso vividuṣaḥ vacaḥ

original: RV_8,019.13a yo agniṃ havyadātibhir namobhir vā sudakṣam āvivāsati /
analyzed: yaḥ agnim havya dātibhiḥ namobhiḥ vā su dakṣam āvivāsati

original: RV_8,019.13c girā vājiraśociṣam //
analyzed: girā vājira śociṣam

original: RV_8,019.14a samidhā yo niśitī dāśad aditiṃ dhāmabhir asya martyaḥ /
analyzed: samidhā yaḥ niśitī dāśat aditim dhāmabhiḥ asya martyaḥ

original: RV_8,019.14c viśvet sa dhībhiḥ subhago janāṃ ati dyumnair udna iva tāriṣat //
analyzed: viśvā id sa dhībhiḥ subhagaḥ janān ati dyumnaiḥ udnaḥ iva tāriṣat

original: RV_8,019.15a tad agne dyumnam ā bhara yat sāsahat sadane kaṃ cid atriṇam /
analyzed: tat agne dyumnam ā bhara yat sāsahat sadane kam cit atriṇam

original: RV_8,019.15c manyuṃ janasya dūḍhyaḥ //
analyzed: manyum janasya dūḍhyaḥ

original: RV_8,019.16a yena caṣṭe varuṇo mitro aryamā yena nāsatyā bhagaḥ /
analyzed: yena caṣṭe varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā yena nāsatyā bhagaḥ

original: RV_8,019.16c vayaṃ tat te śavasā gātuvittamā indratvotā vidhemahi //
analyzed: vayam tat te śavasā gātu vittamāḥ indra tva utāḥ vidhemahi

original: RV_8,019.17a te ghed agne svādhyo ye tvā vipra nidadhire nṛcakṣasam /
analyzed: te gha id agne su ādhyaḥ ye tvā vipra nidadhire nṛ cakṣasam

original: RV_8,019.17c viprāso deva sukratum //
analyzed: viprāsaḥ deva sukratum

original: RV_8,019.18a ta id vediṃ subhaga ta āhutiṃ te sotuṃ cakrire divi /
analyzed: te id vedim subhaga te āhutim te sotum cakrire divi

original: RV_8,019.18c ta id vājebhir jigyur mahad dhanaṃ ye tve kāmaṃ nyerire //
analyzed: te id vājebhiḥ jigyuḥ mahat dhanam ye tve kāmam nyerire

original: RV_8,019.19a bhadro no agnir āhuto bhadrā rātiḥ subhaga bhadro adhvaraḥ /
analyzed: bhadraḥ naḥ agniḥ āhutaḥ bhadrā rātiḥ subhaga bhadraḥ adhvaraḥ

original: RV_8,019.19c bhadrā uta praśastayaḥ //
analyzed: bhadrāḥ uta praśastayaḥ

original: RV_8,019.20a bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye yenā samatsu sāsahaḥ /
analyzed: bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye yena samatsu sāsahaḥ

original: RV_8,019.20c ava sthirā tanuhi bhūri śardhatāṃ vanemā te abhiṣṭibhiḥ //
analyzed: ava sthirā tanuhi bhūri śardhatām vanema te abhiṣṭibhiḥ

original: RV_8,019.21a īḷe girā manurhitaṃ yaṃ devā dūtam aratiṃ nyerire /
analyzed: īḍe girā manuḥ hitam yam devāḥ dūtam aratim nyerire

original: RV_8,019.21c yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhanam //
analyzed: yajiṣṭham havyavāhanam

original: RV_8,019.22a tigmajambhāya taruṇāya rājate prayo gāyasy agnaye /
analyzed: tigma jambhāya taruṇāya rājate prayaḥ gāyasi agnaye

original: RV_8,019.22c yaḥ piṃśate sūnṛtābhiḥ suvīryam agnir ghṛtebhir āhutaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ piṃśate sūnṛtābhiḥ su vīryam agniḥ ghṛtebhiḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_8,019.23a yadī ghṛtebhir āhuto vāśīm agnir bharata uc cāva ca /
analyzed: yadī ghṛtebhiḥ āhutaḥ vāśīm agniḥ bharate ud ca ava ca

original: RV_8,019.23c asura iva nirṇijam //
analyzed: asuraḥ iva nirṇijam

original: RV_8,019.24a yo havyāny airayatā manurhito deva āsā sugandhinā /
analyzed: yaḥ havyāni airayata manuḥ hitaḥ devaḥ āsā sugandhinā

original: RV_8,019.24c vivāsate vāryāṇi svadhvaro hotā devo amartyaḥ //
analyzed: vivāsate vāryāṇi su adhvaraḥ hotā devaḥ amartyaḥ

original: RV_8,019.25a yad agne martyas tvaṃ syām aham mitramaho amartyaḥ /
analyzed: yat agne martyaḥ tvam syām aham mitra mahas amartyaḥ

original: RV_8,019.25c sahasaḥ sūnav āhuta //
analyzed: sahasaḥ sūno āhuta

original: RV_8,019.26a na tvā rāsīyābhiśastaye vaso na pāpatvāya santya /
analyzed: na tvā rāsīya abhiśastaye vaso na pāpa tvāya santya

original: RV_8,019.26c na me stotāmatīvā na durhitaḥ syād agne na pāpayā //
analyzed: na me stotā amatīvā na durhitaḥ syāt agne na pāpayā

original: RV_8,019.27a pitur na putraḥ subhṛto duroṇa ā devāṃ etu pra ṇo haviḥ //
analyzed: pituḥ na putraḥ su bhṛtaḥ duroṇe ā devān etu pra naḥ haviḥ

original: RV_8,019.28a tavāham agna ūtibhir nediṣṭhābhiḥ saceya joṣam ā vaso /
analyzed: tava aham agne ūtibhiḥ nediṣṭhābhiḥ saceya joṣam ā vaso

original: RV_8,019.28c sadā devasya martyaḥ //
analyzed: sadā devasya martyaḥ

original: RV_8,019.29a tava kratvā saneyaṃ tava rātibhir agne tava praśastibhiḥ /
analyzed: tava kratvā saneyam tava rātibhiḥ agne tava praśastibhiḥ

original: RV_8,019.29c tvām id āhuḥ pramatiṃ vaso mamāgne harṣasva dātave //
analyzed: tvām id āhuḥ pramatim vaso mama agne harṣasva dātave

original: RV_8,019.30a pra so agne tavotibhiḥ suvīrābhis tirate vājabharmabhiḥ /
analyzed: pra saḥ agne tava ūtibhiḥ su vīrābhiḥ tirate vāja bharmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,019.30c yasya tvaṃ sakhyam āvaraḥ //
analyzed: yasya tvam sakhyam āvaraḥ

original: RV_8,019.31a tava drapso nīlavān vāśa ṛtviya indhānaḥ siṣṇav ā dade /
analyzed: tava drapsaḥ nīlavān vāśaḥ ṛtviyaḥ indhānaḥ siṣṇo ā dade

original: RV_8,019.31c tvam mahīnām uṣasām asi priyaḥ kṣapo vastuṣu rājasi //
analyzed: tvam mahīnām uṣasām asi priyaḥ kṣapaḥ vastuṣu rājasi

original: RV_8,019.32a tam āganma sobharayaḥ sahasramuṣkaṃ svabhiṣṭim avase /
analyzed: tam āganma sobharayaḥ sahasra muṣkam su abhiṣṭim avase

original: RV_8,019.32c samrājaṃ trāsadasyavam //
analyzed: samrājam trāsadasyavam

original: RV_8,019.33a yasya te agne anye agnaya upakṣito vayā iva /
analyzed: yasya te agne anye agnayaḥ upakṣitaḥ vayāḥ iva

original: RV_8,019.33c vipo na dyumnā ni yuve janānāṃ tava kṣatrāṇi vardhayan //
analyzed: vipaḥ na dyumnā ni yuve janānām tava kṣatrāṇi vardhayan

original: RV_8,019.34a yam ādityāso adruhaḥ pāraṃ nayatha martyam /
analyzed: yam ādityāsaḥ adruhaḥ pāram nayatha martyam

original: RV_8,019.34c maghonāṃ viśveṣāṃ sudānavaḥ //
analyzed: maghonām viśveṣām sudānavaḥ

original: RV_8,019.35a yūyaṃ rājānaḥ kaṃ cic carṣaṇīsahaḥ kṣayantam mānuṣāṃ anu /
analyzed: yūyam rājānaḥ kam cit carṣaṇī sahaḥ kṣayantam mānuṣām anu

original: RV_8,019.35c vayaṃ te vo varuṇa mitrāryaman syāmed ṛtasya rathyaḥ //
analyzed: vayam te vaḥ varuṇa mitra aryaman syāma id ṛtasya rathyaḥ

original: RV_8,019.36a adān me paurukutsyaḥ pañcāśataṃ trasadasyur vadhūnām /
analyzed: adāt me paurukutsyaḥ pañcāśatam trasadasyuḥ vadhūnām

original: RV_8,019.36c maṃhiṣṭho aryaḥ satpatiḥ //
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhaḥ aryaḥ satpatiḥ

original: RV_8,019.37a uta me prayiyor vayiyoḥ suvāstvā adhi tugvani /
analyzed: uta me prayiyoḥ vayiyoḥ su vāstvā adhi tugvani

original: RV_8,019.37c tisṝṇāṃ saptatīnāṃ śyāvaḥ praṇetā bhuvad vasur diyānām patiḥ //
analyzed: tisṝṇām saptatīnām śyāvaḥ praṇetā bhuvat vasuḥ diyānām patiḥ

original: RV_8,020.01a ā gantā mā riṣaṇyata prasthāvāno māpa sthātā samanyavaḥ /
analyzed: ā ganta mā riṣaṇyata prasthāvānaḥ mā apa sthāta samanyavaḥ

original: RV_8,020.01c sthirā cin namayiṣṇavaḥ //
analyzed: sthirā cit namayiṣṇavaḥ

original: RV_8,020.02a vīḷupavibhir maruta ṛbhukṣaṇa ā rudrāsaḥ sudītibhiḥ /
analyzed: vīḍu pavibhiḥ marutaḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ ā rudrāsaḥ su dītibhiḥ

original: RV_8,020.02c iṣā no adyā gatā puruspṛho yajñam ā sobharīyavaḥ //
analyzed: iṣā naḥ adya ā gata puruspṛhaḥ yajñam ā sobharīyavaḥ

original: RV_8,020.03a vidmā hi rudriyāṇāṃ śuṣmam ugram marutāṃ śimīvatām /
analyzed: vidma hi rudriyāṇām śuṣmam ugram marutām śimīvatām

original: RV_8,020.03c viṣṇor eṣasya mīḷhuṣām //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ eṣasya mīḷhuṣām

original: RV_8,020.04a vi dvīpāni pāpatan tiṣṭhad ducchunobhe yujanta rodasī /
analyzed: vi dvīpāni pāpatan tiṣṭhat ducchunā ubhe yujanta rodasī

original: RV_8,020.04c pra dhanvāny airata śubhrakhādayo yad ejatha svabhānavaḥ //
analyzed: pra dhanvāni airata śubhra khādayaḥ yat ejatha sva bhānavaḥ

original: RV_8,020.05a acyutā cid vo ajmann ā nānadati parvatāso vanaspatiḥ /
analyzed: acyutā cit vaḥ ajman ā nānadati parvatāsaḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: RV_8,020.05c bhūmir yāmeṣu rejate //
analyzed: bhūmiḥ yāmeṣu rejate

original: RV_8,020.06a amāya vo maruto yātave dyaur jihīta uttarā bṛhat /
analyzed: amāya vaḥ marutaḥ yātave dyauḥ jihīte uttarā bṛhat

original: RV_8,020.06c yatrā naro dediśate tanūṣv ā tvakṣāṃsi bāhvojasaḥ //
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ dediśate tanūṣu ā tvakṣāṃsi bāhu ojasaḥ

original: RV_8,020.07a svadhām anu śriyaṃ naro mahi tveṣā amavanto vṛṣapsavaḥ /
analyzed: svadhām anu śriyam naraḥ mahi tveṣāḥ amavantaḥ vṛṣapsavaḥ

original: RV_8,020.07c vahante ahrutapsavaḥ //
analyzed: vahante ahrutapsavaḥ

original: RV_8,020.08a gobhir vāṇo ajyate sobharīṇāṃ rathe kośe hiraṇyaye /
analyzed: gobhiḥ vāṇaḥ ajyate sobharīṇām rathe kośe hiraṇyaye

original: RV_8,020.08c gobandhavaḥ sujātāsa iṣe bhuje mahānto na sparase nu //
analyzed: go bandhavaḥ sujātāsaḥ iṣe bhuje mahāntaḥ naḥ sparase nu

original: RV_8,020.09a prati vo vṛṣadañjayo vṛṣṇe śardhāya mārutāya bharadhvam /
analyzed: prati vaḥ vṛṣat añjayaḥ vṛṣṇe śardhāya mārutāya bharadhvam

original: RV_8,020.09c havyā vṛṣaprayāvṇe //
analyzed: havyā vṛṣa prayāvṇe

original: RV_8,020.10a vṛṣaṇaśvena maruto vṛṣapsunā rathena vṛṣanābhinā /
analyzed: vṛṣaṇaśvena marutaḥ vṛṣapsunā rathena vṛṣa nābhinā

original: RV_8,020.10c ā śyenāso na pakṣiṇo vṛthā naro havyā no vītaye gata //
analyzed: ā śyenāsaḥ na pakṣiṇaḥ vṛthā naraḥ havyā naḥ vītaye gata

original: RV_8,020.11a samānam añjy eṣāṃ vi bhrājante rukmāso adhi bāhuṣu /
analyzed: samānam añji eṣām vi bhrājante rukmāsaḥ adhi bāhuṣu

original: RV_8,020.11c davidyutaty ṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: davidyutati ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_8,020.12a ta ugrāso vṛṣaṇa ugrabāhavo nakiṣ ṭanūṣu yetire /
analyzed: te ugrāsaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ ugra bāhavaḥ nakir tanūṣu yetire

original: RV_8,020.12c sthirā dhanvāny āyudhā ratheṣu vo 'nīkeṣv adhi śriyaḥ //
analyzed: sthirā dhanvāni āyudhā ratheṣu vaḥ nīkeṣu adhi śriyaḥ

original: RV_8,020.13a yeṣām arṇo na sapratho nāma tveṣaṃ śaśvatām ekam id bhuje /
analyzed: yeṣām arṇaḥ na saprathaḥ nāma tveṣam śaśvatām ekam id bhuje

original: RV_8,020.13c vayo na pitryaṃ sahaḥ //
analyzed: vayaḥ na pitryam sahaḥ

original: RV_8,020.14a tān vandasva marutas tāṃ upa stuhi teṣāṃ hi dhunīnām /
analyzed: tān vandasva marutaḥ tām upa stuhi teṣām hi dhunīnām

original: RV_8,020.14c arāṇāṃ na caramas tad eṣāṃ dānā mahnā tad eṣām //
analyzed: arāṇām na caramaḥ tat eṣām dānā mahnā tat eṣām

original: RV_8,020.15a subhagaḥ sa va ūtiṣv āsa pūrvāsu maruto vyuṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: subhagaḥ sa vaḥ ūtiṣu āsa pūrvāsu marutaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_8,020.15c yo vā nūnam utāsati //
analyzed: yaḥ vā nūnam uta asati

original: RV_8,020.16a yasya vā yūyam prati vājino nara ā havyā vītaye gatha /
analyzed: yasya vā yūyam prati vājinaḥ naraḥ ā havyā vītaye

original: RV_8,020.16c abhi ṣa dyumnair uta vājasātibhiḥ sumnā vo dhūtayo naśat //
analyzed: abhi sa dyumnaiḥ uta vājasātibhiḥ sumnā vaḥ dhūtayaḥ naśat

original: RV_8,020.17a yathā rudrasya sūnavo divo vaśanty asurasya vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: yathā rudrasya sūnavaḥ divaḥ vaśanti asurasya vedhasaḥ

original: RV_8,020.17c yuvānas tathed asat //
analyzed: yuvānaḥ tathā id asat

original: RV_8,020.18a ye cārhanti marutaḥ sudānavaḥ sman mīḷhuṣaś caranti ye /
analyzed: ye ca arhanti marutaḥ sudānavaḥ smat mīḍhuṣaḥ caranti ye

original: RV_8,020.18c ataś cid ā na upa vasyasā hṛdā yuvāna ā vavṛdhvam //
analyzed: atas cit ā naḥ upa vasyasā hṛdā yuvānaḥ ā vavṛdhvam

original: RV_8,020.19a yūna ū ṣu naviṣṭhayā vṛṣṇaḥ pāvakāṃ abhi sobhare girā /
analyzed: yūnaḥ u su naviṣṭhayā vṛṣṇaḥ pāvakām abhi sobhare girā

original: RV_8,020.19c gāya gā iva carkṛṣat //
analyzed: gāya gāḥ iva carkṛṣat

original: RV_8,020.20a sāhā ye santi muṣṭiheva havyo viśvāsu pṛtsu hotṛṣu /
analyzed: sāhāḥ ye santi muṣṭi hā iva havyaḥ viśvāsu pṛtsu hotṛṣu

original: RV_8,020.20c vṛṣṇaś candrān na suśravastamān girā vandasva maruto aha //
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ candrān na su śravastamān girā vandasva marutaḥ aha

original: RV_8,020.21a gāvaś cid ghā samanyavaḥ sajātyena marutaḥ sabandhavaḥ /
analyzed: gāvaḥ cit gha samanyavaḥ sajātyena marutaḥ sa bandhavaḥ

original: RV_8,020.21c rihate kakubho mithaḥ //
analyzed: rihate kakubhaḥ mithas

original: RV_8,020.22a martaś cid vo nṛtavo rukmavakṣasa upa bhrātṛtvam āyati /
analyzed: martaḥ cit vaḥ nṛtavaḥ rukma vakṣasaḥ upa bhrātṛ tvam āyati

original: RV_8,020.22c adhi no gāta marutaḥ sadā hi va āpitvam asti nidhruvi //
analyzed: adhi naḥ gāta marutaḥ sadā hi vaḥ āpi tvam asti nidhruvi

original: RV_8,020.23a maruto mārutasya na ā bheṣajasya vahatā sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: marutaḥ mārutasya naḥ ā bheṣajasya vahata sudānavaḥ

original: RV_8,020.23c yūyaṃ sakhāyaḥ saptayaḥ //
analyzed: yūyam sakhāyaḥ saptayaḥ

original: RV_8,020.24a yābhiḥ sindhum avatha yābhis tūrvatha yābhir daśasyathā krivim /
analyzed: yābhiḥ sindhum avatha yābhiḥ tūrvatha yābhiḥ daśasyatha krivim

original: RV_8,020.24c mayo no bhūtotibhir mayobhuvaḥ śivābhir asacadviṣaḥ //
analyzed: mayaḥ naḥ bhūta ūtibhiḥ mayobhuvaḥ śivābhiḥ a saca dviṣaḥ

original: RV_8,020.25a yat sindhau yad asiknyāṃ yat samudreṣu marutaḥ subarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: yat sindhau yat asiknyām yat samudreṣu marutaḥ su barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_8,020.25c yat parvateṣu bheṣajam //
analyzed: yat parvateṣu bheṣajam

original: RV_8,020.26a viśvam paśyanto bibhṛthā tanūṣv ā tenā no adhi vocata /
analyzed: viśvam paśyantaḥ bibhṛtha tanūṣu ā tena naḥ adhi vocata

original: RV_8,020.26c kṣamā rapo maruta āturasya na iṣkartā vihrutam punaḥ //
analyzed: kṣamā rapaḥ marutaḥ āturasya naḥ iṣkarta vihrutam punar

original: RV_8,021.01a vayam u tvām apūrvya sthūraṃ na kac cid bharanto 'vasyavaḥ /
analyzed: vayam u tvām apūrvya sthūram na kad cit bharantaḥ vasyavaḥ

original: RV_8,021.01c vāje citraṃ havāmahe //
analyzed: vāje citram havāmahe

original: RV_8,021.02a upa tvā karmann ūtaye sa no yuvograś cakrāma yo dhṛṣat /
analyzed: upa tvā karman ūtaye sa naḥ yuvā ugraḥ cakrāma yaḥ dhṛṣat

original: RV_8,021.02c tvām id dhy avitāraṃ vavṛmahe sakhāya indra sānasim //
analyzed: tvām id hi avitāram vavṛmahe sakhāyaḥ indra sānasim

original: RV_8,021.03a ā yāhīma indavo 'śvapate gopata urvarāpate /
analyzed: ā yāhi ime indavaḥ śva pate go pate urvarā pate

original: RV_8,021.03c somaṃ somapate piba //
analyzed: somam soma pate piba

original: RV_8,021.04a vayaṃ hi tvā bandhumantam abandhavo viprāsa indra yemima /
analyzed: vayam hi tvā bandhumantam abandhavaḥ viprāsaḥ indra yemima

original: RV_8,021.04c yā te dhāmāni vṛṣabha tebhir ā gahi viśvebhiḥ somapītaye //
analyzed: yā te dhāmāni vṛṣabha tebhiḥ ā gahi viśvebhiḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_8,021.05a sīdantas te vayo yathā gośrīte madhau madire vivakṣaṇe /
analyzed: sīdantaḥ te vayaḥ yathā go śrīte madhau madire vivakṣaṇe

original: RV_8,021.05c abhi tvām indra nonumaḥ //
analyzed: abhi tvām indra nonumaḥ

original: RV_8,021.06a acchā ca tvainā namasā vadāmasi kim muhuś cid vi dīdhayaḥ /
analyzed: acchā ca tvā enā namasā vadāmasi kim muhur cit vi dīdhayaḥ

original: RV_8,021.06c santi kāmāso harivo dadiṣ ṭvaṃ smo vayaṃ santi no dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: santi kāmāsaḥ harivas dadiḥ tvam smaḥ vayam santi naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_8,021.07a nūtnā id indra te vayam ūtī abhūma nahi nū te adrivaḥ /
analyzed: nūtnāḥ id indra te vayam ūtī abhūma nahi nu te adrivas

original: RV_8,021.07c vidmā purā parīṇasaḥ //
analyzed: vidma purā parīṇasaḥ

original: RV_8,021.08a vidmā sakhitvam uta śūra bhojyam ā te tā vajrinn īmahe /
analyzed: vidma sakhi tvam uta śūra bhojyam ā te tā vajrin īmahe

original: RV_8,021.08c uto samasminn ā śiśīhi no vaso vāje suśipra gomati //
analyzed: uta u samasmin ā śiśīhi naḥ vaso vāje su śipra gomati

original: RV_8,021.09a yo na idam-idam purā pra vasya ānināya tam u va stuṣe /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ idam idam purā pra vasyaḥ ānināya tam u vaḥ stuṣe

original: RV_8,021.09c sakhāya indram ūtaye //
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ indram ūtaye

original: RV_8,021.10a haryaśvaṃ satpatiṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sa hi ṣmā yo amandata /
analyzed: haryaśvam satpatim carṣaṇīsaham sa hi sma yaḥ amandata

original: RV_8,021.10c ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavā śatam //
analyzed: ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyam stotṛbhyaḥ maghavā śatam

original: RV_8,021.11a tvayā ha svid yujā vayam prati śvasantaṃ vṛṣabha bruvīmahi /
analyzed: tvayā ha svid yujā vayam prati śvasantam vṛṣabha bruvīmahi

original: RV_8,021.11c saṃsthe janasya gomataḥ //
analyzed: saṃsthe janasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,021.12a jayema kāre puruhūta kāriṇo 'bhi tiṣṭhema dūḍhyaḥ /
analyzed: jayema kāre puruhūta kāriṇaḥ bhi tiṣṭhema dūḍhyaḥ

original: RV_8,021.12c nṛbhir vṛtraṃ hanyāma śūśuyāma cāver indra pra ṇo dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ vṛtram hanyāma śūśuyāma ca aveḥ indra pra naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_8,021.13a abhrātṛvyo anā tvam anāpir indra januṣā sanād asi /
analyzed: a bhrātṛvyaḥ anā tvam an āpiḥ indra januṣā sanāt asi

original: RV_8,021.13c yudhed āpitvam icchase //
analyzed: yudhā id āpi tvam icchase

original: RV_8,021.14a nakī revantaṃ sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ /
analyzed: nakir revantam sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ

original: RV_8,021.14c yadā kṛṇoṣi nadanuṃ sam ūhasy ād it piteva hūyase //
analyzed: yadā kṛṇoṣi nadanum sam ūhasi āt id pitā iva hūyase

original: RV_8,021.15a mā te amājuro yathā mūrāsa indra sakhye tvāvataḥ /
analyzed: mā te amājuraḥ yathā mūrāsaḥ indra sakhye tvāvataḥ

original: RV_8,021.15c ni ṣadāma sacā sute //
analyzed: ni ṣadāma sacā sute

original: RV_8,021.16a mā te godatra nir arāma rādhasa indra mā te gṛhāmahi /
analyzed: mā te go datra niḥ arāma rādhasaḥ indra mā te gṛhāmahi

original: RV_8,021.16c dṛḷhā cid aryaḥ pra mṛśābhy ā bhara na te dāmāna ādabhe //
analyzed: dṛḍhā cit aryaḥ pra mṛśa abhi ā bhara na te dāmānaḥ ādabhe

original: RV_8,021.17a indro vā ghed iyan maghaṃ sarasvatī vā subhagā dadir vasu /
analyzed: indraḥ vā gha id iyat magham sarasvatī vā subhagā dadiḥ vasu

original: RV_8,021.17c tvaṃ vā citra dāśuṣe //
analyzed: tvam vā citra dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,021.18a citra id rājā rājakā id anyake yake sarasvatīm anu /
analyzed: citraḥ id rājā rājakāḥ id anyake yake sarasvatīm anu

original: RV_8,021.18c parjanya iva tatanad dhi vṛṣṭyā sahasram ayutā dadat //
analyzed: parjanyaḥ iva tatanat hi vṛṣṭyā sahasram ayutā dadat

original: RV_8,022.01a o tyam ahva ā ratham adyā daṃsiṣṭham ūtaye /
analyzed: ā u tyam ahve ā ratham adyā daṃsiṣṭham ūtaye

original: RV_8,022.01c yam aśvinā suhavā rudravartanī ā sūryāyai tasthathuḥ //
analyzed: yam aśvinā su havā rudravartanī ā sūryāyai tasthathuḥ

original: RV_8,022.02a pūrvāyuṣaṃ suhavam puruspṛham bhujyuṃ vājeṣu pūrvyam /
analyzed: pūrva āyuṣam su havam puruspṛham bhujyum vājeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_8,022.02c sacanāvantaṃ sumatibhiḥ sobhare vidveṣasam anehasam //
analyzed: sacanāvantam sumatibhiḥ sobhare vidveṣasam anehasam

original: RV_8,022.03a iha tyā purubhūtamā devā namobhir aśvinā /
analyzed: iha tyā puru bhūtamā devā namobhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,022.03c arvācīnā sv avase karāmahe gantārā dāśuṣo gṛham //
analyzed: arvācīnā su avase karāmahe gantārā dāśuṣaḥ gṛham

original: RV_8,022.04a yuvo rathasya pari cakram īyata īrmānyad vām iṣaṇyati /
analyzed: yuvoḥ rathasya pari cakram īyate īrmā anyat vām iṣaṇyati

original: RV_8,022.04c asmāṃ acchā sumatir vāṃ śubhas patī ā dhenur iva dhāvatu //
analyzed: asmān acchā sumatiḥ vām śubhaḥ patī ā dhenuḥ iva dhāvatu

original: RV_8,022.05a ratho yo vāṃ trivandhuro hiraṇyābhīśur aśvinā /
analyzed: rathaḥ yaḥ vām tri vandhuraḥ hiraṇya abhīśuḥ aśvinā

original: RV_8,022.05c pari dyāvāpṛthivī bhūṣati śrutas tena nāsatyā gatam //
analyzed: pari dyāvāpṛthivī bhūṣati śrutaḥ tena nāsatyā gatam

original: RV_8,022.06a daśasyantā manave pūrvyaṃ divi yavaṃ vṛkeṇa karṣathaḥ /
analyzed: daśasyantā manave pūrvyam divi yavam vṛkeṇa karṣathaḥ

original: RV_8,022.06c tā vām adya sumatibhiḥ śubhas patī aśvinā pra stuvīmahi //
analyzed: tā vām adya sumatibhiḥ śubhaḥ patī aśvinā pra stuvīmahi

original: RV_8,022.07a upa no vājinīvasū yātam ṛtasya pathibhiḥ /
analyzed: upa naḥ vājinīvasū yātam ṛtasya pathibhiḥ

original: RV_8,022.07c yebhis tṛkṣiṃ vṛṣaṇā trāsadasyavam mahe kṣatrāya jinvathaḥ //
analyzed: yebhiḥ tṛkṣim vṛṣaṇā trāsadasyavam mahe kṣatrāya jinvathaḥ

original: RV_8,022.08a ayaṃ vām adribhiḥ sutaḥ somo narā vṛṣaṇvasū /
analyzed: ayam vām adribhiḥ sutaḥ somaḥ narā vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_8,022.08c ā yātaṃ somapītaye pibataṃ dāśuṣo gṛhe //
analyzed: ā yātam soma pītaye pibatam dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_8,022.09a ā hi ruhatam aśvinā rathe kośe hiraṇyaye vṛṣaṇvasū /
analyzed: ā hi ruhatam aśvinā rathe kośe hiraṇyaye vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_8,022.09c yuñjāthām pīvarīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: yuñjāthām pīvarīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_8,022.10a yābhiḥ paktham avatho yābhir adhriguṃ yābhir babhruṃ vijoṣasam /
analyzed: yābhiḥ paktham avathaḥ yābhiḥ adhrigum yābhiḥ babhrum vijoṣasam

original: RV_8,022.10c tābhir no makṣū tūyam aśvinā gatam bhiṣajyataṃ yad āturam //
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ makṣū tūyam aśvinā gatam bhiṣajyatam yat āturam

original: RV_8,022.11a yad adhrigāvo adhrigū idā cid ahno aśvinā havāmahe /
analyzed: yat adhrigāvaḥ adhrigū idā cit ahnaḥ aśvinā havāmahe

original: RV_8,022.11c vayaṃ gīrbhir vipanyavaḥ //
analyzed: vayam gīrbhiḥ vipanyavaḥ

original: RV_8,022.12a tābhir ā yātaṃ vṛṣaṇopa me havaṃ viśvapsuṃ viśvavāryam /
analyzed: tābhiḥ ā yātam vṛṣaṇā upa me havam viśvapsum viśva vāryam

original: RV_8,022.12c iṣā maṃhiṣṭhā purubhūtamā narā yābhiḥ kriviṃ vāvṛdhus tābhir ā gatam //
analyzed: iṣā maṃhiṣṭhā puru bhūtamā narā yābhiḥ krivim vāvṛdhuḥ tābhiḥ ā gatam

original: RV_8,022.13a tāv idā cid ahānāṃ tāv aśvinā vandamāna upa bruve /
analyzed: tau idā cit ahānām tau aśvinā vandamānaḥ upa bruve

original: RV_8,022.13c tā u namobhir īmahe //
analyzed: tāḥ u namobhiḥ īmahe

original: RV_8,022.14a tāv id doṣā tā uṣasi śubhas patī tā yāman rudravartanī /
analyzed: tau id doṣā tau uṣasi śubhaḥ patī tā yāman rudravartanī

original: RV_8,022.14c mā no martāya ripave vājinīvasū paro rudrāv ati khyatam //
analyzed: mā naḥ martāya ripave vājinīvasū paras rudrau ati khyatam

original: RV_8,022.15a ā sugmyāya sugmyam prātā rathenāśvinā vā sakṣaṇī /
analyzed: ā sugmyāya sugmyam prātar rathena aśvinā vā sakṣaṇī

original: RV_8,022.15c huve piteva sobharī //
analyzed: huve pitā iva sobharī

original: RV_8,022.16a manojavasā vṛṣaṇā madacyutā makṣuṅgamābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ javasā vṛṣaṇā mada cyutā makṣuṅgamābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,022.16c ārāttāc cid bhūtam asme avase pūrvībhiḥ purubhojasā //
analyzed: ārāttāt cit bhūtam asme avase pūrvībhiḥ puru bhojasā

original: RV_8,022.17a ā no aśvāvad aśvinā vartir yāsiṣṭam madhupātamā narā /
analyzed: ā naḥ aśvāvat aśvinā vartiḥ yāsiṣṭam madhu pātamā narā

original: RV_8,022.17c gomad dasrā hiraṇyavat //
analyzed: gomat dasrā hiraṇyavat

original: RV_8,022.18a suprāvargaṃ suvīryaṃ suṣṭhu vāryam anādhṛṣṭaṃ rakṣasvinā /
analyzed: su prāvargam su vīryam suṣṭhu vāryam an ādhṛṣṭam rakṣasvinā

original: RV_8,022.18c asminn ā vām āyāne vājinīvasū viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi //
analyzed: asmin ā vām āyāne vājinīvasū viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi

original: RV_8,023.01a īḷiṣvā hi pratīvyaṃ yajasva jātavedasam /
analyzed: īḍiṣva hi pratīvyam yajasva jātavedasam

original: RV_8,023.01c cariṣṇudhūmam agṛbhītaśociṣam //
analyzed: cariṣṇu dhūmam a gṛbhīta śociṣam

original: RV_8,023.02a dāmānaṃ viśvacarṣaṇe 'gniṃ viśvamano girā /
analyzed: dāmānam viśvacarṣaṇe gnim viśvamanaḥ girā

original: RV_8,023.02c uta stuṣe viṣpardhaso rathānām //
analyzed: uta stuṣe viṣpardhasaḥ rathānām

original: RV_8,023.03a yeṣām ābādha ṛgmiya iṣaḥ pṛkṣaś ca nigrabhe /
analyzed: yeṣām ābādhaḥ ṛgmiyaḥ iṣaḥ pṛkṣaḥ ca nigrabhe

original: RV_8,023.03c upavidā vahnir vindate vasu //
analyzed: upavidā vahniḥ vindate vasu

original: RV_8,023.04a ud asya śocir asthād dīdiyuṣo vy ajaram /
analyzed: ud asya śociḥ asthāt dīdiyuṣaḥ vi ajaram

original: RV_8,023.04c tapurjambhasya sudyuto gaṇaśriyaḥ //
analyzed: tapuḥ jambhasya su dyutaḥ gaṇa śriyaḥ

original: RV_8,023.05a ud u tiṣṭha svadhvara stavāno devyā kṛpā /
analyzed: ud u tiṣṭha su adhvara stavānaḥ devyā kṛpā

original: RV_8,023.05c abhikhyā bhāsā bṛhatā śuśukvaniḥ //
analyzed: abhikhyā bhāsā bṛhatā śuśukvaniḥ

original: RV_8,023.06a agne yāhi suśastibhir havyā juhvāna ānuṣak /
analyzed: agne yāhi su śastibhiḥ havyā juhvānaḥ ānuṣak

original: RV_8,023.06c yathā dūto babhūtha havyavāhanaḥ //
analyzed: yathā dūtaḥ babhūtha havyavāhanaḥ

original: RV_8,023.07a agniṃ vaḥ pūrvyaṃ huve hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: agnim vaḥ pūrvyam huve hotāram carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_8,023.07c tam ayā vācā gṛṇe tam u va stuṣe //
analyzed: tam ayā vācā gṛṇe tam u vaḥ stuṣe

original: RV_8,023.08a yajñebhir adbhutakratuṃ yaṃ kṛpā sūdayanta it /
analyzed: yajñebhiḥ adbhuta kratum yam kṛpā sūdayante id

original: RV_8,023.08c mitraṃ na jane sudhitam ṛtāvani //
analyzed: mitram na jane sudhitam ṛtāvani

original: RV_8,023.09a ṛtāvānam ṛtāyavo yajñasya sādhanaṃ girā /
analyzed: ṛtāvānam ṛtāyavaḥ yajñasya sādhanam girā

original: RV_8,023.09c upo enaṃ jujuṣur namasas pade //
analyzed: upa u enam jujuṣuḥ namasaḥ pade

original: RV_8,023.10a acchā no aṅgirastamaṃ yajñāso yantu saṃyataḥ /
analyzed: acchā naḥ aṅgirastamam yajñāsaḥ yantu saṃyataḥ

original: RV_8,023.10c hotā yo asti vikṣv ā yaśastamaḥ //
analyzed: hotā yaḥ asti vikṣu ā yaśastamaḥ

original: RV_8,023.11a agne tava tye ajarendhānāso bṛhad bhāḥ /
analyzed: agne tava tye ajara indhānāsaḥ bṛhat bhās

original: RV_8,023.11c aśvā iva vṛṣaṇas taviṣīyavaḥ //
analyzed: aśvāḥ iva vṛṣaṇaḥ taviṣīyavaḥ

original: RV_8,023.12a sa tvaṃ na ūrjām pate rayiṃ rāsva suvīryam /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ ūrjām pate rayim rāsva su vīryam

original: RV_8,023.12c prāva nas toke tanaye samatsv ā //
analyzed: prāva naḥ toke tanaye samatsu ā

original: RV_8,023.13a yad vā u viśpatiḥ śitaḥ suprīto manuṣo viśi /
analyzed: yat vai u viśpatiḥ śitaḥ su prītaḥ manuṣaḥ viśi

original: RV_8,023.13c viśved agniḥ prati rakṣāṃsi sedhati //
analyzed: viśvā id agniḥ prati rakṣāṃsi sedhati

original: RV_8,023.14a śruṣṭy agne navasya me stomasya vīra viśpate /
analyzed: śruṣṭī agne navasya me stomasya vīra viśpate

original: RV_8,023.14c ni māyinas tapuṣā rakṣaso daha //
analyzed: ni māyinaḥ tapuṣā rakṣasaḥ daha

original: RV_8,023.15a na tasya māyayā cana ripur īśīta martyaḥ /
analyzed: na tasya māyayā cana ripuḥ īśīta martyaḥ

original: RV_8,023.15c yo agnaye dadāśa havyadātibhiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ agnaye dadāśa havya dātibhiḥ

original: RV_8,023.16a vyaśvas tvā vasuvidam ukṣaṇyur aprīṇād ṛṣiḥ /
analyzed: vyaśvaḥ tvā vasu vidam ukṣaṇyuḥ aprīṇāt ṛṣiḥ

original: RV_8,023.16c maho rāye tam u tvā sam idhīmahi //
analyzed: mahaḥ rāye tam u tvā sam idhīmahi

original: RV_8,023.17a uśanā kāvyas tvā ni hotāram asādayat /
analyzed: uśanā kāvyaḥ tvā ni hotāram asādayat

original: RV_8,023.17c āyajiṃ tvā manave jātavedasam //
analyzed: āyajim tvā manave jātavedasam

original: RV_8,023.18a viśve hi tvā sajoṣaso devāso dūtam akrata /
analyzed: viśve hi tvā sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ dūtam akrata

original: RV_8,023.18c śruṣṭī deva prathamo yajñiyo bhuvaḥ //
analyzed: śruṣṭī deva prathamaḥ yajñiyaḥ bhuvaḥ

original: RV_8,023.19a imaṃ ghā vīro amṛtaṃ dūtaṃ kṛṇvīta martyaḥ /
analyzed: imam gha vīraḥ amṛtam dūtam kṛṇvīta martyaḥ

original: RV_8,023.19c pāvakaṃ kṛṣṇavartaniṃ vihāyasam //
analyzed: pāvakam kṛṣṇa vartanim vihāyasam

original: RV_8,023.20a taṃ huvema yatasrucaḥ subhāsaṃ śukraśociṣam /
analyzed: tam huvema yata srucaḥ su bhāsam śukra śociṣam

original: RV_8,023.20c viśām agnim ajaram pratnam īḍyam //
analyzed: viśām agnim ajaram pratnam īḍyam

original: RV_8,023.21a yo asmai havyadātibhir āhutim marto 'vidhat /
analyzed: yaḥ asmai havya dātibhiḥ āhutim martaḥ vidhat

original: RV_8,023.21c bhūri poṣaṃ sa dhatte vīravad yaśaḥ //
analyzed: bhūri poṣam sa dhatte vīravat yaśaḥ

original: RV_8,023.22a prathamaṃ jātavedasam agniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam /
analyzed: prathamam jātavedasam agnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_8,023.22c prati srug eti namasā haviṣmatī //
analyzed: prati sruc eti namasā haviṣmatī

original: RV_8,023.23a ābhir vidhemāgnaye jyeṣṭhābhir vyaśvavat /
analyzed: ābhiḥ vidhema agnaye jyeṣṭhābhiḥ vyaśva vat

original: RV_8,023.23c maṃhiṣṭhābhir matibhiḥ śukraśociṣe //
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhābhiḥ matibhiḥ śukra śociṣe

original: RV_8,023.24a nūnam arca vihāyase stomebhi sthūrayūpavat /
analyzed: nūnam arca vihāyase stomebhiḥ sthūra yūpa vat

original: RV_8,023.24c ṛṣe vaiyaśva damyāyāgnaye //
analyzed: ṛṣe vaiyaśva damyāya agnaye

original: RV_8,023.25a atithim mānuṣāṇāṃ sūnuṃ vanaspatīnām /
analyzed: atithim mānuṣāṇām sūnum vanaspatīnām

original: RV_8,023.25c viprā agnim avase pratnam īḷate //
analyzed: viprāḥ agnim avase pratnam īḍate

original: RV_8,023.26a maho viśvāṃ abhi ṣato 'bhi havyāni mānuṣā /
analyzed: mahaḥ viśvān abhi sataḥ bhi havyāni mānuṣā

original: RV_8,023.26c agne ni ṣatsi namasādhi barhiṣi //
analyzed: agne ni satsi namasā adhi barhiṣi

original: RV_8,023.27a vaṃsvā no vāryā puru vaṃsva rāyaḥ puruspṛhaḥ /
analyzed: vaṃsva naḥ vāryā puru vaṃsva rāyaḥ puruspṛhaḥ

original: RV_8,023.27c suvīryasya prajāvato yaśasvataḥ //
analyzed: su vīryasya prajāvataḥ yaśasvataḥ

original: RV_8,023.28a tvaṃ varo suṣāmṇe 'gne janāya codaya /
analyzed: tvam suṣāmṇe gne janāya codaya

original: RV_8,023.28c sadā vaso rātiṃ yaviṣṭha śaśvate //
analyzed: sadā vasoḥ rātim yaviṣṭha śaśvate

original: RV_8,023.29a tvaṃ hi supratūr asi tvaṃ no gomatīr iṣaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi supratur asi tvam naḥ gomatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_8,023.29c maho rāyaḥ sātim agne apā vṛdhi //
analyzed: mahaḥ rāyaḥ sātim agne apa vṛdhi

original: RV_8,023.30a agne tvaṃ yaśā asy ā mitrāvaruṇā vaha /
analyzed: agne tvam yaśāḥ asi ā mitrāvaruṇā vaha

original: RV_8,023.30c ṛtāvānā samrājā pūtadakṣasā //
analyzed: ṛtāvānā samrājā pūta dakṣasā

original: RV_8,024.01a sakhāya ā śiṣāmahi brahmendrāya vajriṇe /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ ā śiṣāmahi brahma indrāya vajriṇe

original: RV_8,024.01c stuṣa ū ṣu vo nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave //
analyzed: stuṣe u su vaḥ nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave

original: RV_8,024.02a śavasā hy asi śruto vṛtrahatyena vṛtrahā /
analyzed: śavasā hi asi śrutaḥ vṛtra hatyena vṛtrahā

original: RV_8,024.02c maghair maghono ati śūra dāśasi //
analyzed: maghaiḥ maghonaḥ ati śūra dāśasi

original: RV_8,024.03a sa na stavāna ā bhara rayiṃ citraśravastamam /
analyzed: sa naḥ stavānaḥ ā bhara rayim citraśravastamam

original: RV_8,024.03c nireke cid yo harivo vasur dadiḥ //
analyzed: nireke cit yaḥ harivas vasuḥ dadiḥ

original: RV_8,024.04a ā nirekam uta priyam indra darṣi janānām /
analyzed: ā nirekam uta priyam indra darṣi janānām

original: RV_8,024.04c dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo stavamāna ā bhara //
analyzed: dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo stavamānaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_8,024.05a na te savyaṃ na dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ varanta āmuraḥ /
analyzed: na te savyam na dakṣiṇam hastam varante āmuraḥ

original: RV_8,024.05c na paribādho harivo gaviṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: na paribādhaḥ harivas gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_8,024.06a ā tvā gobhir iva vrajaṃ gīrbhir ṛṇomy adrivaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā gobhiḥ iva vrajam gīrbhiḥ ṛṇomi adrivas

original: RV_8,024.06c ā smā kāmaṃ jaritur ā manaḥ pṛṇa //
analyzed: ā smā kāmam jarituḥ ā manaḥ pṛṇa

original: RV_8,024.07a viśvāni viśvamanaso dhiyā no vṛtrahantama /
analyzed: viśvāni viśvamanasaḥ dhiyā naḥ vṛtra hantama

original: RV_8,024.07c ugra praṇetar adhi ṣū vaso gahi //
analyzed: ugra praṇetar adhi su vaso gahi

original: RV_8,024.08a vayaṃ te asya vṛtrahan vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ /
analyzed: vayam te asya vṛtrahan vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ

original: RV_8,024.08c vaso spārhasya puruhūta rādhasaḥ //
analyzed: vaso spārhasya puruhūta rādhasaḥ

original: RV_8,024.09a indra yathā hy asti te 'parītaṃ nṛto śavaḥ /
analyzed: indra yathā hi asti te parītam nṛto śavaḥ

original: RV_8,024.09c amṛktā rātiḥ puruhūta dāśuṣe //
analyzed: amṛktā rātiḥ puruhūta dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,024.10a ā vṛṣasva mahāmaha mahe nṛtama rādhase /
analyzed: ā vṛṣasva mahā maha mahe nṛtama rādhase

original: RV_8,024.10c dṛḷhaś cid dṛhya maghavan maghattaye //
analyzed: dṛḍhaḥ cit dṛhya maghavan maghattaye

original: RV_8,024.11a nū anyatrā cid adrivas tvan no jagmur āśasaḥ /
analyzed: nu anyatrā cit adrivas tvat naḥ jagmuḥ āśasaḥ

original: RV_8,024.11c maghavañ chagdhi tava tan na ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: maghavan śagdhi tava tat naḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,024.12a nahy aṅga nṛto tvad anyaṃ vindāmi rādhase /
analyzed: nahi aṅga nṛto tvat anyam vindāmi rādhase

original: RV_8,024.12c rāye dyumnāya śavase ca girvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: rāye dyumnāya śavase ca girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_8,024.13a endum indrāya siñcata pibāti somyam madhu /
analyzed: ā indum indrāya siñcata pibāti somyam madhu

original: RV_8,024.13c pra rādhasā codayāte mahitvanā //
analyzed: pra rādhasā codayāte mahitvanā

original: RV_8,024.14a upo harīṇām patiṃ dakṣam pṛñcantam abravam /
analyzed: upa u harīṇām patim dakṣam pṛñcantam abravam

original: RV_8,024.14c nūnaṃ śrudhi stuvato aśvyasya //
analyzed: nūnam śrudhi stuvataḥ aśvyasya

original: RV_8,024.15a nahy aṅga purā cana jajñe vīrataras tvat /
analyzed: nahi aṅga purā cana jajñe vīrataraḥ tvat

original: RV_8,024.15c nakī rāyā naivathā na bhandanā //
analyzed: nakir rāyā na evathā na bhandanā

original: RV_8,024.16a ed u madhvo madintaraṃ siñca vādhvaryo andhasaḥ /
analyzed: ā id u madhvaḥ madintaram siñca vā adhvaryo andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,024.16c evā hi vīra stavate sadāvṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: eva hi vīra stavate sadāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_8,024.17a indra sthātar harīṇāṃ nakiṣ ṭe pūrvyastutim /
analyzed: indra sthātar harīṇām nakir te pūrvya stutim

original: RV_8,024.17c ud ānaṃśa śavasā na bhandanā //
analyzed: ud ānaṃśa śavasā na bhandanā

original: RV_8,024.18a taṃ vo vājānām patim ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ /
analyzed: tam vaḥ vājānām patim ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_8,024.18c aprāyubhir yajñebhir vāvṛdhenyam //
analyzed: aprāyubhiḥ yajñebhiḥ vāvṛdhenyam

original: RV_8,024.19a eto nv indraṃ stavāma sakhāya stomyaṃ naram /
analyzed: eta u nu indram stavāma sakhāyaḥ stomyam naram

original: RV_8,024.19c kṛṣṭīr yo viśvā abhy asty eka it //
analyzed: kṛṣṭīḥ yaḥ viśvāḥ abhī asti ekaḥ id

original: RV_8,024.20a agorudhāya gaviṣe dyukṣāya dasmyaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: agorudhāya gaviṣe dyukṣāya dasmyam vacaḥ

original: RV_8,024.20c ghṛtāt svādīyo madhunaś ca vocata //
analyzed: ghṛtāt svādīyaḥ madhunaḥ ca vocata

original: RV_8,024.21a yasyāmitāni vīryā na rādhaḥ paryetave /
analyzed: yasya amitāni vīryā na rādhaḥ paryetave

original: RV_8,024.21c jyotir na viśvam abhy asti dakṣiṇā //
analyzed: jyotiḥ na viśvam abhī asti dakṣiṇā

original: RV_8,024.22a stuhīndraṃ vyaśvavad anūrmiṃ vājinaṃ yamam /
analyzed: stuhi indram vyaśva vat anūrmim vājinam yamam

original: RV_8,024.22c aryo gayam maṃhamānaṃ vi dāśuṣe //
analyzed: aryaḥ gayam maṃhamānam vi dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,024.23a evā nūnam upa stuhi vaiyaśva daśamaṃ navam /
analyzed: eva nūnam upa stuhi vaiyaśva daśamam navam

original: RV_8,024.23c suvidvāṃsaṃ carkṛtyaṃ caraṇīnām //
analyzed: su vidvāṃsam carkṛtyam caraṇīnām

original: RV_8,024.24a vetthā hi nirṛtīnāṃ vajrahasta parivṛjam /
analyzed: vettha hi nirṛtīnām vajrahasta parivṛjam

original: RV_8,024.24c ahar-ahaḥ śundhyuḥ paripadām iva //
analyzed: ahar ahar śundhyuḥ paripadām iva

original: RV_8,024.25a tad indrāva ā bhara yenā daṃsiṣṭha kṛtvane /
analyzed: tat indra avaḥ ā bhara yena daṃsiṣṭha kṛtvane

original: RV_8,024.25c dvitā kutsāya śiśnatho ni codaya //
analyzed: dvitā kutsāya śiśnathaḥ ni codaya

original: RV_8,024.26a tam u tvā nūnam īmahe navyaṃ daṃsiṣṭha sanyase /
analyzed: tam u tvā nūnam īmahe navyam daṃsiṣṭha sanyase

original: RV_8,024.26c sa tvaṃ no viśvā abhimātīḥ sakṣaṇiḥ //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ viśvāḥ abhimātīḥ sakṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_8,024.27a ya ṛkṣād aṃhaso mucad yo vāryāt sapta sindhuṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ ṛkṣāt aṃhasaḥ mucat yaḥ vā āryāt sapta sindhuṣu

original: RV_8,024.27c vadhar dāsasya tuvinṛmṇa nīnamaḥ //
analyzed: vadhar dāsasya tuvi nṛmṇa nīnamaḥ

original: RV_8,024.28a yathā varo suṣāmṇe sanibhya āvaho rayim /
analyzed: yathā suṣāmṇe sanibhyaḥ āvahaḥ rayim

original: RV_8,024.28c vyaśvebhyaḥ subhage vājinīvati //
analyzed: vyaśvebhyaḥ subhage vājinīvati

original: RV_8,024.29a ā nāryasya dakṣiṇā vyaśvāṃ etu sominaḥ /
analyzed: ā nāryasya dakṣiṇā vyaśvān etu sominaḥ

original: RV_8,024.29c sthūraṃ ca rādhaḥ śatavat sahasravat //
analyzed: sthūram ca rādhaḥ śatavat sahasravat

original: RV_8,024.30a yat tvā pṛcchād ījānaḥ kuhayā kuhayākṛte /
analyzed: yat tvā pṛcchāt ījānaḥ kuhayā kuhayākṛte

original: RV_8,024.30c eṣo apaśrito valo gomatīm ava tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: eṣa u apaśritaḥ valaḥ gomatīm ava tiṣṭhati

original: RV_8,025.01a tā vāṃ viśvasya gopā devā deveṣu yajñiyā /
analyzed: tā vām viśvasya gopā devā deveṣu yajñiyā

original: RV_8,025.01c ṛtāvānā yajase pūtadakṣasā //
analyzed: ṛtāvānā yajase pūta dakṣasā

original: RV_8,025.02a mitrā tanā na rathyā varuṇo yaś ca sukratuḥ /
analyzed: mitrā tanā na rathyā varuṇaḥ yaḥ ca su kratuḥ

original: RV_8,025.02c sanāt sujātā tanayā dhṛtavratā //
analyzed: sanāt sujātā tanayā dhṛtavratā

original: RV_8,025.03a tā mātā viśvavedasāsuryāya pramahasā /
analyzed: tā mātā viśva vedasā asuryāya pramahasā

original: RV_8,025.03c mahī jajānāditir ṛtāvarī //
analyzed: mahī jajāna aditiḥ ṛtāvarī

original: RV_8,025.04a mahāntā mitrāvaruṇā samrājā devāv asurā /
analyzed: mahāntā mitrāvaruṇā samrājā devau asurā

original: RV_8,025.04c ṛtāvānāv ṛtam ā ghoṣato bṛhat //
analyzed: ṛtāvānau ṛtam ā ghoṣataḥ bṛhat

original: RV_8,025.05a napātā śavaso mahaḥ sūnū dakṣasya sukratū /
analyzed: napātā śavasaḥ mahaḥ sūnū dakṣasya su kratū

original: RV_8,025.05c sṛpradānū iṣo vāstv adhi kṣitaḥ //
analyzed: sṛpra dānū iṣaḥ vāstū adhi kṣitaḥ

original: RV_8,025.06a saṃ yā dānūni yemathur divyāḥ pārthivīr iṣaḥ /
analyzed: sam yā dānūni yemathuḥ divyāḥ pārthivīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_8,025.06c nabhasvatīr ā vāṃ carantu vṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: nabhasvatīḥ ā vām carantu vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_8,025.07a adhi yā bṛhato divo 'bhi yūtheva paśyataḥ /
analyzed: adhi yā bṛhataḥ divaḥ bhi yūthā iva paśyataḥ

original: RV_8,025.07c ṛtāvānā samrājā namase hitā //
analyzed: ṛtāvānā samrājā namase hitā

original: RV_8,025.08a ṛtāvānā ni ṣedatuḥ sāmrājyāya sukratū /
analyzed: ṛtāvānā ni sedatuḥ sāmrājyāya su kratū

original: RV_8,025.08c dhṛtavratā kṣatriyā kṣatram āśatuḥ //
analyzed: dhṛta vratā kṣatriyā kṣatram āśatuḥ

original: RV_8,025.09a akṣṇaś cid gātuvittarānulbaṇena cakṣasā /
analyzed: akṣṇaḥ cit gātu vittarā an ulbaṇena cakṣasā

original: RV_8,025.09c ni cin miṣantā nicirā ni cikyatuḥ //
analyzed: ni cit miṣantā nicirā ni cikyatuḥ

original: RV_8,025.10a uta no devy aditir uruṣyatāṃ nāsatyā /
analyzed: uta naḥ devī aditiḥ uruṣyatām nāsatyā

original: RV_8,025.10c uruṣyantu maruto vṛddhaśavasaḥ //
analyzed: uruṣyantu marutaḥ vṛddha śavasaḥ

original: RV_8,025.11a te no nāvam uruṣyata divā naktaṃ sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: te naḥ nāvam uruṣyata divā naktam sudānavaḥ

original: RV_8,025.11c ariṣyanto ni pāyubhiḥ sacemahi //
analyzed: a riṣyantaḥ ni pāyubhiḥ sacemahi

original: RV_8,025.12a aghnate viṣṇave vayam ariṣyantaḥ sudānave /
analyzed: a ghnate viṣṇave vayam a riṣyantaḥ sudānave

original: RV_8,025.12c śrudhi svayāvan sindho pūrvacittaye //
analyzed: śrudhi sva yāvan sindho pūrva cittaye

original: RV_8,025.13a tad vāryaṃ vṛṇīmahe variṣṭhaṃ gopayatyam /
analyzed: tat vāryam vṛṇīmahe variṣṭham gopayatyam

original: RV_8,025.13c mitro yat pānti varuṇo yad aryamā //
analyzed: mitraḥ yat pānti varuṇaḥ yat aryamā

original: RV_8,025.14a uta naḥ sindhur apāṃ tan marutas tad aśvinā /
analyzed: uta naḥ sindhuḥ apām tat marutaḥ tat aśvinā

original: RV_8,025.14c indro viṣṇur mīḍhvāṃsaḥ sajoṣasaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ viṣṇuḥ mīḍhvāṃsaḥ sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_8,025.15a te hi ṣmā vanuṣo naro 'bhimātiṃ kayasya cit /
analyzed: te hi sma vanuṣaḥ naraḥ bhimātim kayasya cit

original: RV_8,025.15c tigmaṃ na kṣodaḥ pratighnanti bhūrṇayaḥ //
analyzed: tigmam na kṣodaḥ pratighnanti bhūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_8,025.16a ayam eka itthā purūru caṣṭe vi viśpatiḥ /
analyzed: ayam ekaḥ itthā puru uru caṣṭe vi viśpatiḥ

original: RV_8,025.16c tasya vratāny anu vaś carāmasi //
analyzed: tasya vratāni anu vaḥ carāmasi

original: RV_8,025.17a anu pūrvāṇy okyā sāmrājyasya saścima /
analyzed: anu pūrvāṇi okyā sāmrājyasya saścima

original: RV_8,025.17c mitrasya vratā varuṇasya dīrghaśrut //
analyzed: mitrasya vratā varuṇasya dīrgha śrut

original: RV_8,025.18a pari yo raśminā divo 'ntān mame pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: pari yaḥ raśminā divaḥ ntāt mame pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_8,025.18c ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā //
analyzed: ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā

original: RV_8,025.19a ud u ṣya śaraṇe divo jyotir ayaṃsta sūryaḥ /
analyzed: ud u sya śaraṇe divaḥ jyotiḥ ayaṃsta sūryaḥ

original: RV_8,025.19c agnir na śukraḥ samidhāna āhutaḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ na śukraḥ samidhānaḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_8,025.20a vaco dīrghaprasadmanīśe vājasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: vacaḥ dīrghaprasadmani īśe vājasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,025.20c īśe hi pitvo 'viṣasya dāvane //
analyzed: īśe hi pitvaḥ viṣasya dāvane

original: RV_8,025.21a tat sūryaṃ rodasī ubhe doṣā vastor upa bruve /
analyzed: tat sūryam rodasī ubhe doṣā vastoḥ upa bruve

original: RV_8,025.21c bhojeṣv asmāṃ abhy uc carā sadā //
analyzed: bhojeṣu asmām abhī ud cara sadā

original: RV_8,025.22a ṛjram ukṣaṇyāyane rajataṃ harayāṇe /
analyzed: ṛjram ukṣaṇyāyane rajatam harayāṇe

original: RV_8,025.22c rathaṃ yuktam asanāma suṣāmaṇi //
analyzed: ratham yuktam asanāma suṣāmaṇi

original: RV_8,025.23a tā me aśvyānāṃ harīṇāṃ nitośanā /
analyzed: tā me aśvyānām harīṇām nitośanā

original: RV_8,025.23c uto nu kṛtvyānāṃ nṛvāhasā //
analyzed: uta u nu kṛtvyānām nṛ vāhasā

original: RV_8,025.24a smadabhīśū kaśāvantā viprā naviṣṭhayā matī /
analyzed: smat abhīśū kaśāvantā viprāḥ naviṣṭhayā matī

original: RV_8,025.24c maho vājināv arvantā sacāsanam //
analyzed: mahaḥ vājinau arvantā sacā asanam

original: RV_8,026.01a yuvor u ṣū rathaṃ huve sadhastutyāya sūriṣu /
analyzed: yuvoḥ u su ratham huve sadhastutyāya sūriṣu

original: RV_8,026.01c atūrtadakṣā vṛṣaṇā vṛṣaṇvasū //
analyzed: a tūrta dakṣā vṛṣaṇā vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_8,026.02a yuvaṃ varo suṣāmṇe mahe tane nāsatyā /
analyzed: yuvam suṣāmṇe mahe tane nāsatyā

original: RV_8,026.02c avobhir yātho vṛṣaṇā vṛṣaṇvasū //
analyzed: avobhiḥ yāthaḥ vṛṣaṇā vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_8,026.03a tā vām adya havāmahe havyebhir vājinīvasū /
analyzed: tā vām adya havāmahe havyebhiḥ vājinīvasū

original: RV_8,026.03c pūrvīr iṣa iṣayantāv ati kṣapaḥ //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ iṣayantau ati kṣapaḥ

original: RV_8,026.04a ā vāṃ vāhiṣṭho aśvinā ratho yātu śruto narā /
analyzed: ā vām vāhiṣṭhaḥ aśvinā rathaḥ yātu śrutaḥ narā

original: RV_8,026.04c upa stomān turasya darśathaḥ śriye //
analyzed: upa stomān turasya darśathaḥ śriye

original: RV_8,026.05a juhurāṇā cid aśvinā manyethāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū /
analyzed: juhurāṇā cit aśvinā manyethām vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_8,026.05c yuvaṃ hi rudrā parṣatho ati dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: yuvam hi rudrā parṣathaḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_8,026.06a dasrā hi viśvam ānuṣaṅ makṣūbhiḥ paridīyathaḥ /
analyzed: dasrā hi viśvam ānuṣak makṣūbhiḥ paridīyathaḥ

original: RV_8,026.06c dhiyañjinvā madhuvarṇā śubhas patī //
analyzed: dhiyañjinvā madhu varṇā śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_8,026.07a upa no yātam aśvinā rāyā viśvapuṣā saha /
analyzed: upa naḥ yātam aśvinā rāyā viśva puṣā saha

original: RV_8,026.07c maghavānā suvīrāv anapacyutā //
analyzed: maghavānā su vīrau an apacyutā

original: RV_8,026.08a ā me asya pratīvyam indranāsatyā gatam /
analyzed: ā me asya pratīvyam indra nāsatyāḥ gatam

original: RV_8,026.08c devā devebhir adya sacanastamā //
analyzed: devā devebhiḥ adya sacanastamā

original: RV_8,026.09a vayaṃ hi vāṃ havāmaha ukṣaṇyanto vyaśvavat /
analyzed: vayam hi vām havāmahe ukṣaṇyantaḥ vyaśva vat

original: RV_8,026.09c sumatibhir upa viprāv ihā gatam //
analyzed: sumatibhiḥ upa viprau iha ā gatam

original: RV_8,026.10a aśvinā sv ṛṣe stuhi kuvit te śravato havam /
analyzed: aśvinā su ṛṣe stuhi kuvid te śravataḥ havam

original: RV_8,026.10c nedīyasaḥ kūḷayātaḥ paṇīṃr uta //
analyzed: nedīyasaḥ kūḷayātaḥ paṇīṃr uta

original: RV_8,026.11a vaiyaśvasya śrutaṃ naroto me asya vedathaḥ /
analyzed: vaiyaśvasya śrutam narā uta u me asya vedathaḥ

original: RV_8,026.11c sajoṣasā varuṇo mitro aryamā //
analyzed: sajoṣasā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_8,026.12a yuvādattasya dhiṣṇyā yuvānītasya sūribhiḥ /
analyzed: yuvādattasya dhiṣṇyā yuvānītasya sūribhiḥ

original: RV_8,026.12c ahar-ahar vṛṣaṇa mahyaṃ śikṣatam //
analyzed: ahar ahar mahyam śikṣatam

original: RV_8,026.13a yo vāṃ yajñebhir āvṛto 'dhivastrā vadhūr iva /
analyzed: yaḥ vām yajñebhiḥ āvṛtaḥ dhivastrā vadhūḥ iva

original: RV_8,026.13c saparyantā śubhe cakrāte aśvinā //
analyzed: saparyantā śubhe cakrāte aśvinā

original: RV_8,026.14a yo vām uruvyacastamaṃ ciketati nṛpāyyam /
analyzed: yaḥ vām uru vyacastamam ciketati nṛ pāyyam

original: RV_8,026.14c vartir aśvinā pari yātam asmayū //
analyzed: vartiḥ aśvinā pari yātam asmayū

original: RV_8,026.15a asmabhyaṃ su vṛṣaṇvasū yātaṃ vartir nṛpāyyam /
analyzed: asmabhyam su vṛṣaṇvasū yātam vartiḥ nṛ pāyyam

original: RV_8,026.15c viṣudruheva yajñam ūhathur girā //
analyzed: viṣu druhā iva yajñam ūhathuḥ girā

original: RV_8,026.16a vāhiṣṭho vāṃ havānāṃ stomo dūto huvan narā /
analyzed: vāhiṣṭhaḥ vām havānām stomaḥ dūtaḥ huvat narā

original: RV_8,026.16c yuvābhyām bhūtv aśvinā //
analyzed: yuvābhyām bhūtu aśvinā

original: RV_8,026.17a yad ado divo arṇava iṣo vā madatho gṛhe /
analyzed: yat adaḥ divaḥ arṇave iṣaḥ vā madathaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_8,026.17c śrutam in me amartyā //
analyzed: śrutam id me amartyā

original: RV_8,026.18a uta syā śvetayāvarī vāhiṣṭhā vāṃ nadīnām /
analyzed: uta syā śveta yāvarī vāhiṣṭhā vām nadīnām

original: RV_8,026.18c sindhur hiraṇyavartaniḥ //
analyzed: sindhuḥ hiraṇya vartaniḥ

original: RV_8,026.19a smad etayā sukīrtyāśvinā śvetayā dhiyā /
analyzed: smat etayā su kīrtyā aśvinā śvetayā dhiyā

original: RV_8,026.19c vahethe śubhrayāvānā //
analyzed: vahethe śubhra yāvānā

original: RV_8,026.20a yukṣvā hi tvaṃ rathāsahā yuvasva poṣyā vaso /
analyzed: yukṣvā hi tvam rathāsahā yuvasva poṣyā vaso

original: RV_8,026.20c ān no vāyo madhu pibāsmākaṃ savanā gahi //
analyzed: āt naḥ vāyo madhu piba asmākam savanā gahi

original: RV_8,026.21a tava vāyav ṛtaspate tvaṣṭur jāmātar adbhuta /
analyzed: tava vāyo ṛtaspate tvaṣṭuḥ jāmātar adbhuta

original: RV_8,026.21c avāṃsy ā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: avāṃsi ā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_8,026.22a tvaṣṭur jāmātaraṃ vayam īśānaṃ rāya īmahe /
analyzed: tvaṣṭuḥ jāmātaram vayam īśānam rāyaḥ īmahe

original: RV_8,026.22c sutāvanto vāyuṃ dyumnā janāsaḥ //
analyzed: sutāvantaḥ vāyum dyumnā janāsaḥ

original: RV_8,026.23a vāyo yāhi śivā divo vahasvā su svaśvyam /
analyzed: vāyo yāhi śiva ā divaḥ vahasva su su aśvyam

original: RV_8,026.23c vahasva mahaḥ pṛthupakṣasā rathe //
analyzed: vahasva mahaḥ pṛthu pakṣasā rathe

original: RV_8,026.24a tvāṃ hi supsarastamaṃ nṛṣadaneṣu hūmahe /
analyzed: tvām hi su psarastamam nṛṣadaneṣu hūmahe

original: RV_8,026.24c grāvāṇaṃ nāśvapṛṣṭham maṃhanā //
analyzed: grāvāṇam na aśva pṛṣṭham maṃhanā

original: RV_8,026.25a sa tvaṃ no deva manasā vāyo mandāno agriyaḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ deva manasā vāyo mandānaḥ agriyaḥ

original: RV_8,026.25c kṛdhi vājāṃ apo dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: kṛdhi vājān apaḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_8,027.01a agnir ukthe purohito grāvāṇo barhir adhvare /
analyzed: agniḥ ukthe purohitaḥ grāvāṇaḥ barhiḥ adhvare

original: RV_8,027.01c ṛcā yāmi maruto brahmaṇas patiṃ devāṃ avo vareṇyam //
analyzed: ṛcā yāmi marutaḥ brahmaṇaḥ patim devān avaḥ vareṇyam

original: RV_8,027.02a ā paśuṃ gāsi pṛthivīṃ vanaspatīn uṣāsā naktam oṣadhīḥ /
analyzed: ā paśum gāsi pṛthivīm vanaspatīn uṣāsā naktam oṣadhīḥ

original: RV_8,027.02c viśve ca no vasavo viśvavedaso dhīnām bhūta prāvitāraḥ //
analyzed: viśve ca naḥ vasavaḥ viśva vedasaḥ dhīnām bhūta prāvitāraḥ

original: RV_8,027.03a pra sū na etv adhvaro 'gnā deveṣu pūrvyaḥ /
analyzed: pra su naḥ etu adhvaraḥ gnāḥ deveṣu pūrvyaḥ

original: RV_8,027.03c ādityeṣu pra varuṇe dhṛtavrate marutsu viśvabhānuṣu //
analyzed: ādityeṣu pra varuṇe dhṛta vrate marutsu viśva bhānuṣu

original: RV_8,027.04a viśve hi ṣmā manave viśvavedaso bhuvan vṛdhe riśādasaḥ /
analyzed: viśve hi sma manave viśva vedasaḥ bhuvan vṛdhe riśādasaḥ

original: RV_8,027.04c ariṣṭebhiḥ pāyubhir viśvavedaso yantā no 'vṛkaṃ chardiḥ //
analyzed: ariṣṭebhiḥ pāyubhiḥ viśva vedasaḥ yanta naḥ vṛkam chardiḥ

original: RV_8,027.05a ā no adya samanaso gantā viśve sajoṣasaḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ adya samanasaḥ ganta viśve sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_8,027.05c ṛcā girā maruto devy adite sadane pastye mahi //
analyzed: ṛcā girā marutaḥ devi adite sadane pastye mahi

original: RV_8,027.06a abhi priyā maruto yā vo aśvyā havyā mitra prayāthana /
analyzed: abhi priyā marutaḥ yā vaḥ aśvyā havyā mitra prayāthana

original: RV_8,027.06c ā barhir indro varuṇas turā nara ādityāsaḥ sadantu naḥ //
analyzed: ā barhiḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ turāḥ naraḥ ādityāsaḥ sadantu naḥ

original: RV_8,027.07a vayaṃ vo vṛktabarhiṣo hitaprayasa ānuṣak /
analyzed: vayam vaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ hita prayasaḥ ānuṣak

original: RV_8,027.07c sutasomāso varuṇa havāmahe manuṣvad iddhāgnayaḥ //
analyzed: suta somāsaḥ varuṇa havāmahe manuṣvat iddha agnayaḥ

original: RV_8,027.08a ā pra yāta maruto viṣṇo aśvinā pūṣan mākīnayā dhiyā /
analyzed: ā pra yāta marutaḥ viṣṇo aśvinā pūṣan mākīnayā dhiyā

original: RV_8,027.08c indra ā yātu prathamaḥ saniṣyubhir vṛṣā yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe //
analyzed: indraḥ ā yātu prathamaḥ saniṣyubhiḥ vṛṣā yaḥ vṛtra hā gṛṇe

original: RV_8,027.09a vi no devāso adruho 'cchidraṃ śarma yacchata /
analyzed: vi naḥ devāsaḥ adruhaḥ chidram śarma yacchata

original: RV_8,027.09c na yad dūrād vasavo nū cid antito varūtham ādadharṣati //
analyzed: na yat dūrāt vasavaḥ nu cit antitas varūtham ādadharṣati

original: RV_8,027.10a asti hi vaḥ sajātyaṃ riśādaso devāso asty āpyam /
analyzed: asti hi vaḥ sajātyam riśādasaḥ devāsaḥ asti āpyam

original: RV_8,027.10c pra ṇaḥ pūrvasmai suvitāya vocata makṣū sumnāya navyase //
analyzed: pra naḥ pūrvasmai suvitāya vocata makṣū sumnāya navyase

original: RV_8,027.11a idā hi va upastutim idā vāmasya bhaktaye /
analyzed: idā hi vaḥ upastutim idā vāmasya bhaktaye

original: RV_8,027.11c upa vo viśvavedaso namasyur āṃ asṛkṣy anyām iva //
analyzed: upa vaḥ viśva vedasaḥ namasyuḥ ām asṛkṣi anyām iva

original: RV_8,027.12a ud u ṣya vaḥ savitā supraṇītayo 'sthād ūrdhvo vareṇyaḥ /
analyzed: ud u sya vaḥ savitā su praṇītayaḥ sthāt ūrdhvaḥ vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_8,027.12c ni dvipādaś catuṣpādo arthino 'viśran patayiṣṇavaḥ //
analyzed: ni dvipādaḥ catuṣpādaḥ arthinaḥ viśran patayiṣṇavaḥ

original: RV_8,027.13a devaṃ-devaṃ vo 'vase devaṃ-devam abhiṣṭaye /
analyzed: devaṃdevam vaḥ vase devaṃdevam abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_8,027.13c devaṃ-devaṃ huvema vājasātaye gṛṇanto devyā dhiyā //
analyzed: devam devam huvema vājasātaye gṛṇantaḥ devyā dhiyā

original: RV_8,027.14a devāso hi ṣmā manave samanyavo viśve sākaṃ sarātayaḥ /
analyzed: devāsaḥ hi sma manave samanyavaḥ viśve sākam sa rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,027.14c te no adya te aparaṃ tuce tu no bhavantu varivovidaḥ //
analyzed: te naḥ adya te aparam tuce tu naḥ bhavantu varivaḥ vidaḥ

original: RV_8,027.15a pra vaḥ śaṃsāmy adruhaḥ saṃstha upastutīnām /
analyzed: pra vaḥ śaṃsāmi adruhaḥ saṃsthe upastutīnām

original: RV_8,027.15c na taṃ dhūrtir varuṇa mitra martyaṃ yo vo dhāmabhyo 'vidhat //
analyzed: na tam dhūrtiḥ varuṇa mitra martyam yaḥ vaḥ dhāmabhyaḥ vidhat

original: RV_8,027.16a pra sa kṣayaṃ tirate vi mahīr iṣo yo vo varāya dāśati /
analyzed: pra sa kṣayam tirate vi mahīḥ iṣaḥ yaḥ vaḥ varāya dāśati

original: RV_8,027.16c pra prajābhir jāyate dharmaṇas pary ariṣṭaḥ sarva edhate //
analyzed: pra prajābhiḥ jāyate dharmaṇaḥ pari ariṣṭaḥ sarvaḥ edhate

original: RV_8,027.17a ṛte sa vindate yudhaḥ sugebhir yāty adhvanaḥ /
analyzed: ṛte sa vindate yudhaḥ sugebhiḥ yāti adhvanaḥ

original: RV_8,027.17c aryamā mitro varuṇaḥ sarātayo yaṃ trāyante sajoṣasaḥ //
analyzed: aryamā mitraḥ varuṇaḥ sa rātayaḥ yam trāyante sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_8,027.18a ajre cid asmai kṛṇuthā nyañcanaṃ durge cid ā susaraṇam /
analyzed: ajre cit asmai kṛṇutha nyañcanam durge cit ā su saraṇam

original: RV_8,027.18c eṣā cid asmād aśaniḥ paro nu sāsredhantī vi naśyatu //
analyzed: eṣā cit asmāt aśaniḥ paras nu sā a sredhantī vi naśyatu

original: RV_8,027.19a yad adya sūrya udyati priyakṣatrā ṛtaṃ dadha /
analyzed: yat adya sūrye udyati priya kṣatrāḥ ṛtam

original: RV_8,027.19c yan nimruci prabudhi viśvavedaso yad vā madhyandine divaḥ //
analyzed: yat nimruci prabudhi viśva vedasaḥ yat vā madhyandine divaḥ

original: RV_8,027.20a yad vābhipitve asurā ṛtaṃ yate chardir yema vi dāśuṣe /
analyzed: yat vā abhipitve asurāḥ ṛtam yate chardiḥ yema vi dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,027.20c vayaṃ tad vo vasavo viśvavedasa upa stheyāma madhya ā //
analyzed: vayam tat vaḥ vasavaḥ viśva vedasaḥ upa stheyāma madhye ā

original: RV_8,027.21a yad adya sūra udite yan madhyandina ātuci /
analyzed: yat adya sūre udite yat madhyandine ātuci

original: RV_8,027.21c vāmaṃ dhattha manave viśvavedaso juhvānāya pracetase //
analyzed: vāmam dhattha manave viśva vedasaḥ juhvānāya pracetase

original: RV_8,027.22a vayaṃ tad vaḥ samrāja ā vṛṇīmahe putro na bahupāyyam /
analyzed: vayam tat vaḥ samrājaḥ ā vṛṇīmahe putraḥ na bahu pāyyam

original: RV_8,027.22c aśyāma tad ādityā juhvato havir yena vasyo 'naśāmahai //
analyzed: aśyāma tat ādityāḥ juhvataḥ haviḥ yena vasyaḥ naśāmahai

original: RV_8,028.01a ye triṃśati trayas paro devāso barhir āsadan /
analyzed: ye triṃśati trayaḥ paras devāsaḥ barhiḥ āsadan

original: RV_8,028.01c vidann aha dvitāsanan //
analyzed: vidan aha dvitā asanan

original: RV_8,028.02a varuṇo mitro aryamā smadrātiṣāco agnayaḥ /
analyzed: varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā smat rātiṣācaḥ agnayaḥ

original: RV_8,028.02c patnīvanto vaṣaṭkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: patnīvantaḥ vaṣaṭkṛtāḥ

original: RV_8,028.03a te no gopā apācyās ta udak ta itthā nyak /
analyzed: te naḥ gopāḥ apācyāḥ te udak te itthā nyak

original: RV_8,028.03c purastāt sarvayā viśā //
analyzed: purastāt sarvayā viśā

original: RV_8,028.04a yathā vaśanti devās tathed asat tad eṣāṃ nakir ā minat /
analyzed: yathā vaśanti devāḥ tathā id asat tat eṣām nakir ā minat

original: RV_8,028.04c arāvā cana martyaḥ //
analyzed: arāvā cana martyaḥ

original: RV_8,028.05a saptānāṃ sapta ṛṣṭayaḥ sapta dyumnāny eṣām /
analyzed: saptānām sapta ṛṣṭayaḥ sapta dyumnāni eṣām

original: RV_8,028.05c sapto adhi śriyo dhire //
analyzed: sapta u adhi śriyaḥ dhire
