original: RV_8,047.06a parihvṛted anā jano yuṣmādattasya vāyati /
analyzed: parihvṛtā id anā janaḥ yuṣmādattasya vāyati

original: RV_8,047.06c devā adabhram āśa vo yam ādityā ahetanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: devāḥ adabhram āśa vaḥ yam ādityāḥ ahetana anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.07a na taṃ tigmaṃ cana tyajo na drāsad abhi taṃ guru /
analyzed: na tam tigmam cana tyajaḥ na drāsat abhi tam guru

original: RV_8,047.07c yasmā u śarma sapratha ādityāso arādhvam anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: yasmai u śarma saprathaḥ ādityāsaḥ arādhvam anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.08a yuṣme devā api ṣmasi yudhyanta iva varmasu /
analyzed: yuṣme devāḥ api smasi yudhyantaḥ iva varmasu

original: RV_8,047.08c yūyam maho na enaso yūyam arbhād uruṣyatānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: yūyam mahaḥ naḥ enasaḥ yūyam arbhāt uruṣyata anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.09a aditir na uruṣyatv aditiḥ śarma yacchatu /
analyzed: aditiḥ naḥ uruṣyatu aditiḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_8,047.09c mātā mitrasya revato 'ryamṇo varuṇasya cānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: mātā mitrasya revataḥ ryamṇaḥ varuṇasya ca anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.10a yad devāḥ śarma śaraṇaṃ yad bhadraṃ yad anāturam /
analyzed: yat devāḥ śarma śaraṇam yat bhadram yat anāturam

original: RV_8,047.10c tridhātu yad varūthyaṃ tad asmāsu vi yantanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: tri dhātu yat varūthyam tat asmāsu vi yantana anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.11a ādityā ava hi khyatādhi kūlād iva spaśaḥ /
analyzed: ādityāḥ ava hi khyata adhi kūlāt iva spaśaḥ

original: RV_8,047.11c sutīrtham arvato yathānu no neṣathā sugam anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: su tīrtham arvataḥ yathā anu naḥ neṣatha sugam anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.12a neha bhadraṃ rakṣasvine nāvayai nopayā uta /
analyzed: na iha bhadram rakṣasvine na avayai na upayai uta

original: RV_8,047.12c gave ca bhadraṃ dhenave vīrāya ca śravasyate 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: gave ca bhadram dhenave vīrāya ca śravasyate nehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.13a yad āvir yad apīcyaṃ devāso asti duṣkṛtam /
analyzed: yat āvis yat apīcyam devāsaḥ asti duṣkṛtam

original: RV_8,047.13c trite tad viśvam āptya āre asmad dadhātanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: trite tat viśvam āptye āre asmat dadhātana anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.14a yac ca goṣu duṣṣvapnyaṃ yac cāsme duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: yat ca goṣu duṣṣvapnyam yat ca asme duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_8,047.14c tritāya tad vibhāvary āptyāya parā vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: tritāya tat vibhāvari āptyāya parā vaha anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.15a niṣkaṃ vā ghā kṛṇavate srajaṃ vā duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: niṣkam vā gha kṛṇavate srajam vā duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_8,047.15c trite duṣṣvapnyaṃ sarvam āptye pari dadmasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: trite duṣṣvapnyam sarvam āptye pari dadmasi anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.16a tadannāya tadapase tam bhāgam upaseduṣe /
analyzed: tad annāya tad apase tam bhāgam upaseduṣe

original: RV_8,047.16c tritāya ca dvitāya coṣo duṣṣvapnyaṃ vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: tritāya ca dvitāya ca uṣaḥ duṣṣvapnyam vaha anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.17a yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yatha ṛṇaṃ saṃnayāmasi /
analyzed: yathā kalām yathā śapham yathā ṛṇam saṃnayāmasi

original: RV_8,047.17c evā duṣṣvapnyaṃ sarvam āptye saṃ nayāmasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: eva duṣṣvapnyam sarvam āptye sam nayāmasi anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,047.18a ajaiṣmādyāsanāma cābhūmānāgaso vayam /
analyzed: ajaiṣma adya asanāma ca abhūma anāgasaḥ vayam

original: RV_8,047.18c uṣo yasmād duṣṣvapnyād abhaiṣmāpa tad ucchatv anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
analyzed: uṣaḥ yasmāt duṣṣvapnyāt abhaiṣma apa tat ucchatu anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,048.01a svādor abhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ svādhyo varivovittarasya /
analyzed: svādoḥ abhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ svādhyaḥ varivaḥ vittarasya

original: RV_8,048.01c viśve yaṃ devā uta martyāso madhu bruvanto abhi saṃcaranti //
analyzed: viśve yam devāḥ uta martyāsaḥ madhu bruvantaḥ abhi saṃcaranti

original: RV_8,048.02a antaś ca prāgā aditir bhavāsy avayātā haraso daivyasya /
analyzed: antar ca prāgāḥ aditiḥ bhavāsi avayātā harasaḥ daivyasya

original: RV_8,048.02c indav indrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ śrauṣṭīva dhuram anu rāya ṛdhyāḥ //
analyzed: indo indrasya sakhyam juṣāṇaḥ śrauṣṭī iva dhuram anu rāyaḥ ṛdhyāḥ

original: RV_8,048.03a apāma somam amṛtā abhūmāganma jyotir avidāma devān /
analyzed: apāma somam amṛtāḥ abhūma aganma jyotiḥ avidāma devān

original: RV_8,048.03c kiṃ nūnam asmān kṛṇavad arātiḥ kim u dhūrtir amṛta martyasya //
analyzed: kim nūnam asmān kṛṇavat arātiḥ kim u dhūrtiḥ amṛta martyasya

original: RV_8,048.04a śaṃ no bhava hṛda ā pīta indo piteva soma sūnave suśevaḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ bhava hṛde ā pītaḥ indo pitā iva soma sūnave su śevaḥ

original: RV_8,048.04c sakheva sakhya uruśaṃsa dhīraḥ pra ṇa āyur jīvase soma tārīḥ //
analyzed: sakhā iva sakhye uru śaṃsa dhīraḥ pra naḥ āyuḥ jīvase soma tārīḥ

original: RV_8,048.05a ime mā pītā yaśasa uruṣyavo rathaṃ na gāvaḥ sam anāha parvasu /
analyzed: ime mā pītāḥ yaśasaḥ uruṣyavaḥ ratham na gāvaḥ sam anāha parvasu

original: RV_8,048.05c te mā rakṣantu visrasaś caritrād uta mā srāmād yavayantv indavaḥ //
analyzed: te mā rakṣantu visrasaḥ caritrāt uta mā srāmāt yavayantu indavaḥ

original: RV_8,048.06a agniṃ na mā mathitaṃ saṃ didīpaḥ pra cakṣaya kṛṇuhi vasyaso naḥ /
analyzed: agnim na mā mathitam sam didīpaḥ pra cakṣaya kṛṇuhi vasyasaḥ naḥ

original: RV_8,048.06c athā hi te mada ā soma manye revāṃ iva pra carā puṣṭim accha //
analyzed: athā hi te made ā soma manye revān iva pra cara puṣṭim accha

original: RV_8,048.07a iṣireṇa te manasā sutasya bhakṣīmahi pitryasyeva rāyaḥ /
analyzed: iṣireṇa te manasā sutasya bhakṣīmahi pitryasya iva rāyaḥ

original: RV_8,048.07c soma rājan pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tārīr ahānīva sūryo vāsarāṇi //
analyzed: soma rājan pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tārīḥ ahāni iva sūryaḥ vāsarāṇi

original: RV_8,048.08a soma rājan mṛḷayā naḥ svasti tava smasi vratyās tasya viddhi /
analyzed: soma rājan mṛḍaya naḥ svasti tava smasi vratyāḥ tasya viddhi

original: RV_8,048.08c alarti dakṣa uta manyur indo mā no aryo anukāmam parā dāḥ //
analyzed: alarti dakṣaḥ uta manyuḥ indo mā naḥ aryaḥ anukāmam parā dāḥ

original: RV_8,048.09a tvaṃ hi nas tanvaḥ soma gopā gātre-gātre niṣasatthā nṛcakṣāḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ tanvaḥ soma gopāḥ gātre gātre niṣasattha nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_8,048.09c yat te vayam pramināma vratāni sa no mṛḷa suṣakhā deva vasyaḥ //
analyzed: yat te vayam pramināma vratāni sa naḥ mṛḍa su sakhā deva vasyaḥ

original: RV_8,048.10a ṛdūdareṇa sakhyā saceya yo mā na riṣyed dharyaśva pītaḥ /
analyzed: ṛdūdareṇa sakhyā saceya yaḥ mā na riṣyet hari aśva pītaḥ

original: RV_8,048.10c ayaṃ yaḥ somo ny adhāyy asme tasmā indram pratiram emy āyuḥ //
analyzed: ayam yaḥ somaḥ ni adhāyi asme tasmai indram pratiram emi āyuḥ

original: RV_8,048.11a apa tyā asthur anirā amīvā nir atrasan tamiṣīcīr abhaiṣuḥ /
analyzed: apa tyāḥ asthuḥ anirāḥ amīvāḥ niḥ atrasan tamiṣīcīḥ abhaiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,048.11c ā somo asmāṃ aruhad vihāyā aganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ //
analyzed: ā somaḥ asmān aruhat vihāyāḥ aganma yatra pratirante āyuḥ

original: RV_8,048.12a yo na induḥ pitaro hṛtsu pīto 'martyo martyāṃ āviveśa /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ induḥ pitaraḥ hṛtsu pītaḥ martyaḥ martyān āviveśa

original: RV_8,048.12c tasmai somāya haviṣā vidhema mṛḷīke asya sumatau syāma //
analyzed: tasmai somāya haviṣā vidhema mṛḷīke asya sumatau syāma

original: RV_8,048.13a tvaṃ soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāno 'nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha /
analyzed: tvam soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha

original: RV_8,048.13c tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
analyzed: tasmai te indo haviṣā vidhema vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_8,048.14a trātāro devā adhi vocatā no mā no nidrā īśata mota jalpiḥ /
analyzed: trātāraḥ devāḥ adhi vocata naḥ mā naḥ nidrā īśata mā uta jalpiḥ

original: RV_8,048.14c vayaṃ somasya viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema //
analyzed: vayam somasya viśvaha priyāsaḥ su vīrāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema

original: RV_8,048.15a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato vayodhās tvaṃ svarvid ā viśā nṛcakṣāḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma viśvatas vayaḥ dhāḥ tvam svar vid ā viśa nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_8,048.15c tvaṃ na inda ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ pāhi paścātād uta vā purastāt //
analyzed: tvam naḥ indo ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ pāhi paścātāt uta vā purastāt

original: RV_8,049.01a abhi pra vaḥ surādhasam indram arca yathā vide /
analyzed: abhi pra vaḥ su rādhasam indram arca yathā vide

original: RV_8,049.01c yo jaritṛbhyo maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇeva śikṣati //
analyzed: yaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇa iva śikṣati

original: RV_8,049.02a śatānīkeva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe /
analyzed: śata anīkā iva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,049.02c girer iva pra rasā asya pinvire datrāṇi purubhojasaḥ //
analyzed: gireḥ iva pra rasāḥ asya pinvire datrāṇi puru bhojasaḥ

original: RV_8,049.03a ā tvā sutāsa indavo madā ya indra girvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā sutāsaḥ indavaḥ madāḥ ye indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_8,049.03c āpo na vajrinn anv okyaṃ saraḥ pṛṇanti śūra rādhase //
analyzed: āpaḥ na vajrin anu okyam saraḥ pṛṇanti śūra rādhase

original: RV_8,049.04a anehasam prataraṇaṃ vivakṣaṇam madhvaḥ svādiṣṭham īm piba /
analyzed: anehasam prataraṇam vivakṣaṇam madhvaḥ svādiṣṭham īm piba

original: RV_8,049.04c ā yathā mandasānaḥ kirāsi naḥ pra kṣudreva tmanā dhṛṣat //
analyzed: ā yathā mandasānaḥ kirāsi naḥ pra kṣudrā iva tmanā dhṛṣat

original: RV_8,049.05a ā na stomam upa dravad dhiyāno aśvo na sotṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ stomam upa dravat dhiyānaḥ aśvaḥ na sotṛbhiḥ

original: RV_8,049.05c yaṃ te svadhāvan svadayanti dhenava indra kaṇveṣu rātayaḥ //
analyzed: yam te svadhāvan svadayanti dhenavaḥ indra kaṇveṣu rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,049.06a ugraṃ na vīraṃ namasopa sedima vibhūtim akṣitāvasum /
analyzed: ugram na vīram namasā upa sedima vibhūtim akṣitāvasum

original: RV_8,049.06c udrīva vajrinn avato na siñcate kṣarantīndra dhītayaḥ //
analyzed: udrī iva vajrin avataḥ na siñcate kṣaranti indra dhītayaḥ

original: RV_8,049.07a yad dha nūnaṃ yad vā yajñe yad vā pṛthivyām adhi /
analyzed: yat ha nūnam yat vā yajñe yat vā pṛthivyām adhi

original: RV_8,049.07c ato no yajñam āśubhir mahemata ugra ugrebhir ā gahi //
analyzed: atas naḥ yajñam āśubhiḥ mahemate ugraḥ ugrebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_8,049.08a ajirāso harayo ye ta āśavo vātā iva prasakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ajirāsaḥ harayaḥ ye te āśavaḥ vātāḥ iva prasakṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_8,049.08c yebhir apatyam manuṣaḥ parīyase yebhir viśvaṃ svar dṛśe //
analyzed: yebhiḥ apatyam manuṣaḥ parīyase yebhiḥ viśvam svar dṛśe

original: RV_8,049.09a etāvatas ta īmaha indra sumnasya gomataḥ /
analyzed: etāvataḥ te īmahe indra sumnasya gomataḥ

original: RV_8,049.09c yathā prāvo maghavan medhyātithiṃ yathā nīpātithiṃ dhane //
analyzed: yathā prāvaḥ maghavan medhyātithim yathā nīpātithim dhane

original: RV_8,049.10a yathā kaṇve maghavan trasadasyavi yathā pakthe daśavraje /
analyzed: yathā kaṇve maghavan trasadasyavi yathā pakthe daśavraje

original: RV_8,049.10c yathā gośarye asanor ṛjiśvanīndra gomad dhiraṇyavat //
analyzed: yathā gośarye asanoḥ ṛjiśvani indra gomat hiraṇyavat

original: RV_8,050.01a pra su śrutaṃ surādhasam arcā śakram abhiṣṭaye /
analyzed: pra su śrutam su rādhasam arca śakram abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_8,050.01c yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sahasreṇeva maṃhate //
analyzed: yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyam vasu sahasreṇa iva maṃhate

original: RV_8,050.02a śatānīkā hetayo asya duṣṭarā indrasya samiṣo mahīḥ /
analyzed: śata anīkāḥ hetayaḥ asya duṣṭarāḥ indrasya samiṣaḥ mahīḥ

original: RV_8,050.02c girir na bhujmā maghavatsu pinvate yad īṃ sutā amandiṣuḥ //
analyzed: giriḥ na bhujmā maghavatsu pinvate yat īm sutāḥ amandiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,050.03a yad īṃ sutāsa indavo 'bhi priyam amandiṣuḥ /
analyzed: yat īm sutāsaḥ indavaḥ bhi priyam amandiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,050.03c āpo na dhāyi savanam ma ā vaso dughā ivopa dāśuṣe //
analyzed: āpaḥ na dhāyi savanam me ā vaso dughāḥ iva upa dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,050.04a anehasaṃ vo havamānam ūtaye madhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītayaḥ /
analyzed: anehasam vaḥ havamānam ūtaye madhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītayaḥ

original: RV_8,050.04c ā tvā vaso havamānāsa indava upa stotreṣu dadhire //
analyzed: ā tvā vaso havamānāsaḥ indavaḥ upa stotreṣu dadhire

original: RV_8,050.05a ā naḥ some svadhvara iyāno atyo na tośate /
analyzed: ā naḥ some su adhvare iyānaḥ atyaḥ na tośate

original: RV_8,050.05c yaṃ te svadāvan svadanti gūrtayaḥ paure chandayase havam //
analyzed: yam te sva dāvan svadanti gūrtayaḥ paure chandayase havam

original: RV_8,050.06a pra vīram ugraṃ viviciṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ vibhūtiṃ rādhaso mahaḥ /
analyzed: pra vīram ugram vivicim dhana spṛtam vibhūtim rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_8,050.06c udrīva vajrinn avato vasutvanā sadā pīpetha dāśuṣe //
analyzed: udrī iva vajrin avataḥ vasutvanā sadā pīpetha dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,050.07a yad dha nūnam parāvati yad vā pṛthivyāṃ divi /
analyzed: yat ha nūnam parāvati yat vā pṛthivyām divi

original: RV_8,050.07c yujāna indra haribhir mahemata ṛṣva ṛṣvebhir ā gahi //
analyzed: yujānaḥ indra haribhiḥ mahemate ṛṣvaḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_8,050.08a rathirāso harayo ye te asridha ojo vātasya piprati /
analyzed: rathirāsaḥ harayaḥ ye te asridhaḥ ojaḥ vātasya piprati

original: RV_8,050.08c yebhir ni dasyum manuṣo nighoṣayo yebhiḥ svaḥ parīyase //
analyzed: yebhiḥ ni dasyum manuṣaḥ nighoṣayaḥ yebhiḥ svar parīyase

original: RV_8,050.09a etāvatas te vaso vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ /
analyzed: etāvataḥ te vaso vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ

original: RV_8,050.09c yathā prāva etaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane yathā vaśaṃ daśavraje //
analyzed: yathā prāvaḥ etaśam kṛtvye dhane yathā vaśam daśavraje

original: RV_8,050.10a yathā kaṇve maghavan medhe adhvare dīrghanīthe damūnasi /
analyzed: yathā kaṇve maghavan medhe adhvare dīrgha nīthe damūnasi

original: RV_8,050.10c yathā gośarye asiṣāso adrivo mayi gotraṃ hariśriyam //
analyzed: yathā gośarye asiṣāsaḥ adrivas mayi gotram hari śriyam

original: RV_8,051.01a yathā manau sāṃvaraṇau somam indrāpibaḥ sutam /
analyzed: yathā manau sāṃvaraṇau somam indra apibaḥ sutam

original: RV_8,051.01c nīpātithau maghavan medhyātithau puṣṭigau śruṣṭigau sacā //
analyzed: nīpātithau maghavan medhyātithau puṣṭigau śruṣṭigau sacā

original: RV_8,051.02a pārṣadvāṇaḥ praskaṇvaṃ sam asādayac chayānaṃ jivrim uddhitam /
analyzed: pārṣadvāṇaḥ praskaṇvam sam asādayat śayānam jivrim uddhitam

original: RV_8,051.02c sahasrāṇy asiṣāsad gavām ṛṣis tvoto dasyave vṛkaḥ //
analyzed: sahasrāṇi asiṣāsat gavām ṛṣiḥ tvotaḥ dasyave vṛkaḥ

original: RV_8,051.03a ya ukthebhir na vindhate cikid ya ṛṣicodanaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ukthebhiḥ na vindhate cikit yaḥ ṛṣi codanaḥ

original: RV_8,051.03c indraṃ tam acchā vada navyasyā maty ariṣyantaṃ na bhojase //
analyzed: indram tam acchā vada navyasyā matī a riṣyantam na bhojase

original: RV_8,051.04a yasmā arkaṃ saptaśīrṣāṇam ānṛcus tridhātum uttame pade /
analyzed: yasmai arkam sapta śīrṣāṇam ānṛcuḥ tri dhātum uttame pade

original: RV_8,051.04c sa tv imā viśvā bhuvanāni cikradad ād ij janiṣṭa pauṃsyam //
analyzed: sa tu imā viśvā bhuvanāni cikradat āt id janiṣṭa pauṃsyam

original: RV_8,051.05a yo no dātā vasūnām indraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dātā vasūnām indram tam hūmahe vayam

original: RV_8,051.05c vidmā hy asya sumatiṃ navīyasīṃ gamema gomati vraje //
analyzed: vidma hi asya sumatim navīyasīm gamema gomati vraje

original: RV_8,051.06a yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya śikṣasi sa rāyas poṣam aśnute /
analyzed: yasmai tvam vaso dānāya śikṣasi sa rāyaḥ poṣam aśnute

original: RV_8,051.06c taṃ tvā vayam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe //
analyzed: tam tvā vayam maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,051.07a kadā cana starīr asi nendra saścasi dāśuṣe /
analyzed: kadā cana starīḥ asi na indra saścasi dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,051.07c upopen nu maghavan bhūya in nu te dānaṃ devasya pṛcyate //
analyzed: upa upa id nu maghavan bhūyaḥ id nu te dānam devasya pṛcyate

original: RV_8,051.08a pra yo nanakṣe abhy ojasā kriviṃ vadhaiḥ śuṣṇaṃ nighoṣayan /
analyzed: pra yaḥ nanakṣe abhī ojasā krivim vadhaiḥ śuṣṇam nighoṣayan

original: RV_8,051.08c yaded astambhīt prathayann amūṃ divam ād ij janiṣṭa pārthivaḥ //
analyzed: yadā id astambhīt prathayan amūm divam āt id janiṣṭa pārthivaḥ

original: RV_8,051.09a yasyāyaṃ viśva āryo dāsaḥ śevadhipā ariḥ /
analyzed: yasya ayam viśvaḥ āryaḥ dāsaḥ śevadhi pāḥ ariḥ

original: RV_8,051.09c tiraś cid arye ruśame parīravi tubhyet so ajyate rayiḥ //
analyzed: tiras cit arye ruśame tubhya id saḥ ajyate rayiḥ

original: RV_8,051.10a turaṇyavo madhumantaṃ ghṛtaścutaṃ viprāso arkam ānṛcuḥ /
analyzed: turaṇyavaḥ madhumantam ghṛtaścutam viprāsaḥ arkam ānṛcuḥ

original: RV_8,051.10c asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo 'sme suvānāsa indavaḥ //
analyzed: asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ sme suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_8,052.01a yathā manau vivasvati somaṃ śakrāpibaḥ sutam /
analyzed: yathā manau vivasvati somam śakra apibaḥ sutam

original: RV_8,052.01c yathā trite chanda indra jujoṣasy āyau mādayase sacā //
analyzed: yathā trite chandaḥ indra jujoṣasi āyau mādayase sacā

original: RV_8,052.02a pṛṣadhre medhye mātariśvanīndra suvāne amandathāḥ /
analyzed: pṛṣadhre medhye mātariśvani indra suvāne amandathāḥ

original: RV_8,052.02c yathā somaṃ daśaśipre daśoṇye syūmaraśmāv ṛjūnasi //
analyzed: yathā somam daśaśipre daśoṇye syūmaraśmau ṛjūnasi

original: RV_8,052.03a ya ukthā kevalā dadhe yaḥ somaṃ dhṛṣitāpibat /
analyzed: yaḥ ukthā kevalā dadhe yaḥ somam dhṛṣitā apibat

original: RV_8,052.03c yasmai viṣṇus trīṇi padā vicakrama upa mitrasya dharmabhiḥ //
analyzed: yasmai viṣṇuḥ trīṇi padā vicakrame upa mitrasya dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,052.04a yasya tvam indra stomeṣu cākano vāje vājiñ chatakrato /
analyzed: yasya tvam indra stomeṣu cākanaḥ vāje vājim śatakrato

original: RV_8,052.04c taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudughām iva goduho juhūmasi śravasyavaḥ //
analyzed: tam tvā vayam sudughām iva go duhaḥ juhūmasi śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_8,052.05a yo no dātā sa naḥ pitā mahāṃ ugra īśānakṛt /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dātā sa naḥ pitā mahān ugraḥ īśāna kṛt

original: RV_8,052.05c ayāmann ugro maghavā purūvasur gor aśvasya pra dātu naḥ //
analyzed: a yāman ugraḥ maghavā purūvasuḥ goḥ aśvasya pra dātu naḥ

original: RV_8,052.06a yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya maṃhase sa rāyas poṣam invati /
analyzed: yasmai tvam vaso dānāya maṃhase sa rāyaḥ poṣam invati

original: RV_8,052.06c vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomair indraṃ havāmahe //
analyzed: vasūyavaḥ vasu patim śatakratum stomaiḥ indram havāmahe

original: RV_8,052.07a kadā cana pra yucchasy ubhe ni pāsi janmanī /
analyzed: kadā cana pra yucchasi ubhe ni pāsi janmanī

original: RV_8,052.07c turīyāditya havanaṃ ta indriyam ā tasthāv amṛtaṃ divi //
analyzed: turīya āditya havanam te indriyam ā tasthau amṛtam divi

original: RV_8,052.08a yasmai tvam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ śikṣo śikṣasi dāśuṣe /
analyzed: yasmai tvam maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ śikṣo śikṣasi dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,052.08c asmākaṃ gira uta suṣṭutiṃ vaso kaṇvavac chṛṇudhī havam //
analyzed: asmākam giraḥ uta suṣṭutim vaso kaṇva vat śṛṇudhi havam

original: RV_8,052.09a astāvi manma pūrvyam brahmendrāya vocata /
analyzed: astāvi manma pūrvyam brahma indrāya vocata

original: RV_8,052.09c pūrvīr ṛtasya bṛhatīr anūṣata stotur medhā asṛkṣata //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ ṛtasya bṛhatīḥ anūṣata stotuḥ medhāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_8,052.10a sam indro rāyo bṛhatīr adhūnuta saṃ kṣoṇī sam u sūryam /
analyzed: sam indraḥ rāyaḥ bṛhatīḥ adhūnuta sam kṣoṇī sam sūryam

original: RV_8,052.10c saṃ śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ saṃ gavāśiraḥ somā indram amandiṣuḥ //
analyzed: sam śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ sam gavāśiraḥ somāḥ indram amandiṣuḥ

original: RV_8,053.01a upamaṃ tvā maghonāṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ ca vṛṣabhāṇām /
analyzed: upamam tvā maghonām jyeṣṭham ca vṛṣabhāṇām

original: RV_8,053.01c pūrbhittamam maghavann indra govidam īśānaṃ rāya īmahe //
analyzed: pūrbhittamam maghavan indra go vidam īśānam rāyaḥ īmahe

original: RV_8,053.02a ya āyuṃ kutsam atithigvam ardayo vāvṛdhāno dive-dive /
analyzed: yaḥ āyum kutsam atithigvam ardayaḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ dive dive

original: RV_8,053.02c taṃ tvā vayaṃ haryaśvaṃ śatakratuṃ vājayanto havāmahe //
analyzed: tam tvā vayam hari aśvam śatakratum vājayantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,053.03a ā no viśveṣāṃ rasam madhvaḥ siñcantv adrayaḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ viśveṣām rasam madhvaḥ siñcantu adrayaḥ

original: RV_8,053.03c ye parāvati sunvire janeṣv ā ye arvāvatīndavaḥ //
analyzed: ye parāvati sunvire janeṣu ā ye arvāvati indavaḥ

original: RV_8,053.04a viśvā dveṣāṃsi jahi cāva cā kṛdhi viśve sanvantv ā vasu /
analyzed: viśvā dveṣāṃsi jahi ca ava ca kṛdhi viśve sanvantu ā vasu

original: RV_8,053.04c śīṣṭeṣu cit te madirāso aṃśavo yatrā somasya tṛmpasi //
analyzed: śīṣṭeṣu cit te madirāsaḥ aṃśavaḥ yatra somasya tṛmpasi

original: RV_8,053.05a indra nedīya ed ihi mitamedhābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: indra nedīyaḥ ā id ihi mita medhābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,053.05c ā śantama śantamābhir abhiṣṭibhir ā svāpe svāpibhiḥ //
analyzed: ā śantama śantamābhiḥ abhiṣṭibhiḥ ā su āpe su āpibhiḥ

original: RV_8,053.06a ājituraṃ satpatiṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ kṛdhi prajāsv ābhagam /
analyzed: āji turam sat patim viśvacarṣaṇim kṛdhi prajāsu ābhagam

original: RV_8,053.06c pra sū tirā śacībhir ye ta ukthinaḥ kratum punata ānuṣak //
analyzed: pra su tira śacībhiḥ ye te ukthinaḥ kratum punate ānuṣak

original: RV_8,053.07a yas te sādhiṣṭho 'vase te syāma bhareṣu te /
analyzed: yaḥ te sādhiṣṭhaḥ vase te syāma bhareṣu te

original: RV_8,053.07c vayaṃ hotrābhir uta devahūtibhiḥ sasavāṃso manāmahe //
analyzed: vayam hotrābhiḥ uta deva hūtibhiḥ sasavāṃsaḥ manāmahe

original: RV_8,053.08a ahaṃ hi te harivo brahma vājayur ājiṃ yāmi sadotibhiḥ /
analyzed: aham hi te harivas brahma vājayuḥ ājim yāmi sadā ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,053.08c tvām id eva tam ame sam aśvayur gavyur agre mathīnām //
analyzed: tvām id eva tam ame sam aśvayuḥ gavyuḥ agre mathīnām

original: RV_8,054.01a etat ta indra vīryaṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanti kāravaḥ /
analyzed: etat te indra vīryam gīrbhiḥ gṛṇanti kāravaḥ

original: RV_8,054.01c te stobhanta ūrjam āvan ghṛtaścutam paurāso nakṣan dhītibhiḥ //
analyzed: te stobhantaḥ ūrjam āvan ghṛtaścutam paurāsaḥ nakṣan dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_8,054.02a nakṣanta indram avase sukṛtyayā yeṣāṃ suteṣu mandase /
analyzed: nakṣante indram avase su kṛtyayā yeṣām suteṣu mandase

original: RV_8,054.02c yathā saṃvarte amado yathā kṛśa evāsme indra matsva //
analyzed: yathā saṃvarte amadaḥ yathā kṛśe eva asme indra matsva

original: RV_8,054.03a ā no viśve sajoṣaso devāso gantanopa naḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ viśve sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ gantana upa naḥ

original: RV_8,054.03c vasavo rudrā avase na ā gamañ chṛṇvantu maruto havam //
analyzed: vasavaḥ rudrāḥ avase naḥ ā gamam śṛṇvantu marutaḥ havam

original: RV_8,054.04a pūṣā viṣṇur havanam me sarasvaty avantu sapta sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: pūṣā viṣṇuḥ havanam me sarasvatī avantu sapta sindhavaḥ

original: RV_8,054.04c āpo vātaḥ parvatāso vanaspatiḥ śṛṇotu pṛthivī havam //
analyzed: āpaḥ vātaḥ parvatāsaḥ vanaspatiḥ śṛṇotu pṛthivī havam

original: RV_8,054.05a yad indra rādho asti te māghonam maghavattama /
analyzed: yat indra rādhaḥ asti te māghonam maghavattama

original: RV_8,054.05c tena no bodhi sadhamādyo vṛdhe bhago dānāya vṛtrahan //
analyzed: tena naḥ bodhi sadhamādyaḥ vṛdhe bhagaḥ dānāya vṛtrahan

original: RV_8,054.06a ājipate nṛpate tvam id dhi no vāja ā vakṣi sukrato /
analyzed: āji pate nṛpate tvam id hi naḥ vāje ā vakṣi su krato

original: RV_8,054.06c vītī hotrābhir uta devavītibhiḥ sasavāṃso vi śṛṇvire //
analyzed: vītī hotrābhiḥ uta deva vītibhiḥ sasavāṃsaḥ vi śṛṇvire

original: RV_8,054.07a santi hy arya āśiṣa indra āyur janānām /
analyzed: santi hi aryaḥ āśiṣaḥ indre āyuḥ janānām

original: RV_8,054.07c asmān nakṣasva maghavann upāvase dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam //
analyzed: asmān nakṣasva maghavan upa avase dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam

original: RV_8,054.08a vayaṃ ta indra stomebhir vidhema tvam asmākaṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: vayam te indra stomebhiḥ vidhema tvam asmākam śatakrato

original: RV_8,054.08c mahi sthūraṃ śaśayaṃ rādho ahrayam praskaṇvāya ni tośaya //
analyzed: mahi sthūram śaśayam rādhaḥ ahrayam praskaṇvāya ni tośaya

original: RV_8,055.01a bhūrīd indrasya vīryaṃ vy akhyam abhy āyati /
analyzed: bhūri id indrasya vīryam vi akhyam abhī āyati

original: RV_8,055.01c rādhas te dasyave vṛka //
analyzed: rādhaḥ te dasyave vṛka

original: RV_8,055.02a śataṃ śvetāsa ukṣaṇo divi tāro na rocante /
analyzed: śatam śvetāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ divi tāraḥ na rocante

original: RV_8,055.02c mahnā divaṃ na tastabhuḥ //
analyzed: mahnā divam na tastabhuḥ

original: RV_8,055.03a śataṃ veṇūñ chataṃ śunaḥ śataṃ carmāṇi mlātāni /
analyzed: śatam śatam śunaḥ śatam carmāṇi mlātāni

original: RV_8,055.03c śatam me balbajastukā aruṣīṇāṃ catuḥśatam //
analyzed: śatam me balbaja stukāḥ aruṣīṇām catuḥśatam

original: RV_8,055.04a sudevā stha kāṇvāyanā vayo-vayo vicarantaḥ /
analyzed: su devāḥ stha kāṇvāyanāḥ vayaḥ vayaḥ vicarantaḥ

original: RV_8,055.04c aśvāso na caṅkramata //
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ na caṅkramata

original: RV_8,055.05a ād it sāptasya carkirann ānūnasya mahi śravaḥ /
analyzed: āt id sāptasya carkiran anūnasya mahi śravaḥ

original: RV_8,055.05c śyāvīr atidhvasan pathaś cakṣuṣā cana saṃnaśe //
analyzed: śyāvīḥ atidhvasan pathaḥ cakṣuṣā cana saṃnaśe

original: RV_8,056.01a prati te dasyave vṛka rādho adarśy ahrayam /
analyzed: prati te dasyave vṛka rādhaḥ adarśi ahrayam

original: RV_8,056.01c dyaur na prathinā śavaḥ //
analyzed: dyauḥ na prathinā śavaḥ

original: RV_8,056.02a daśa mahyam pautakrataḥ sahasrā dasyave vṛkaḥ /
analyzed: daśa mahyam pautakrataḥ sahasrā dasyave vṛkaḥ

original: RV_8,056.02c nityād rāyo amaṃhata //
analyzed: nityāt rāyaḥ amaṃhata

original: RV_8,056.03a śatam me gardabhānāṃ śatam ūrṇāvatīnām /
analyzed: śatam me gardabhānām śatam ūrṇāvatīnām

original: RV_8,056.03c śataṃ dāsāṃ ati srajaḥ //
analyzed: śatam dāsām ati srajaḥ

original: RV_8,056.04a tatro api prāṇīyata pūtakratāyai vyaktā /
analyzed: tatra u api prāṇīyata pūtakratāyai vyaktā

original: RV_8,056.04c aśvānām in na yūthyām //
analyzed: aśvānām id na yūthyām

original: RV_8,056.05a acety agniś cikitur havyavāṭ sa sumadrathaḥ /
analyzed: aceti agniḥ cikituḥ havyavāṭ sa sumat rathaḥ

original: RV_8,056.05c agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā bṛhat sūro arocata divi sūryo arocata //
analyzed: agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā bṛhat sūraḥ arocata divi sūryaḥ arocata

original: RV_8,057.01a yuvaṃ devā kratunā pūrvyeṇa yuktā rathena taviṣaṃ yajatrā /
analyzed: yuvam devā kratunā pūrvyeṇa yuktā rathena taviṣam yajatrā

original: RV_8,057.01c āgacchataṃ nāsatyā śacībhir idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanam pibāthaḥ //
analyzed: āgacchatam nāsatyā śacībhiḥ idam tṛtīyam savanam pibāthaḥ

original: RV_8,057.02a yuvāṃ devās traya ekādaśāsaḥ satyāḥ satyasya dadṛśe purastāt /
analyzed: yuvām devāḥ trayaḥ ekādaśāsaḥ satyāḥ satyasya dadṛśe purastāt

original: RV_8,057.02c asmākaṃ yajñaṃ savanaṃ juṣāṇā pātaṃ somam aśvinā dīdyagnī //
analyzed: asmākam yajñam savanam juṣāṇā pātam somam aśvinā dīdi agnī

original: RV_8,057.03a panāyyaṃ tad aśvinā kṛtaṃ vāṃ vṛṣabho divo rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: panāyyam tat aśvinā kṛtam vām vṛṣabhaḥ divaḥ rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_8,057.03c sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvāṃ it tāṃ upa yātā pibadhyai //
analyzed: sahasram śaṃsāḥ uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvām id tām upa yātā pibadhyai

original: RV_8,057.04a ayaṃ vām bhāgo nihito yajatremā giro nāsatyopa yātam /
analyzed: ayam vām bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ yajatrā imāḥ giraḥ nāsatyā upa yātam

original: RV_8,057.04c pibataṃ somam madhumantam asme pra dāśvāṃsam avataṃ śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: pibatam somam madhumantam asme pra dāśvāṃsam avatam śacībhiḥ

original: RV_8,058.01a yam ṛtvijo bahudhā kalpayantaḥ sacetaso yajñam imaṃ vahanti /
analyzed: yam ṛtvijaḥ bahudhā kalpayantaḥ sacetasaḥ yajñam imam vahanti

original: RV_8,058.01c yo anūcāno brāhmaṇo yukta āsīt kā svit tatra yajamānasya saṃvit //
analyzed: yaḥ anūcānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yuktaḥ āsīt kā svid tatra yajamānasya saṃvid

original: RV_8,058.02a eka evāgnir bahudhā samiddha ekaḥ sūryo viśvam anu prabhūtaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva agniḥ bahudhā samiddhaḥ ekaḥ sūryaḥ viśvam anu prabhūtaḥ

original: RV_8,058.02c ekaivoṣāḥ sarvam idaṃ vi bhāty ekaṃ vā idaṃ vi babhūva sarvam //
analyzed: ekā eva uṣāḥ sarvam idam vi bhāti ekam vai idam vi babhūva sarvam

original: RV_8,058.03a jyotiṣmantaṃ ketumantaṃ tricakraṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ suṣadam bhūrivāram /
analyzed: jyotiṣmantam ketumantam tri cakram sukham ratham suṣadam bhūri vāram

original: RV_8,058.03c citrāmaghā yasya yoge 'dhijajñe taṃ vāṃ huve ati riktam pibadhyai //
analyzed: citrāmaghā yasya yoge tam vām huve ati riktam pibadhyai

original: RV_8,059.01a imāni vām bhāgadheyāni sisrata indrāvaruṇā pra mahe suteṣu vām /
analyzed: imāni vām bhāgadheyāni sisrate indrāvaruṇā pra mahe suteṣu vām

original: RV_8,059.01c yajñe-yajñe ha savanā bhuraṇyatho yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣathaḥ //
analyzed: yajñeyajñe ha savanā bhuraṇyathaḥ yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣathaḥ

original: RV_8,059.02a niṣṣidhvarīr oṣadhīr āpa āstām indrāvaruṇā mahimānam āśata /
analyzed: niṣṣidhvarīḥ oṣadhīḥ āpaḥ āstām indrāvaruṇā mahimānam āśata

original: RV_8,059.02c yā sisratū rajasaḥ pāre adhvano yayoḥ śatrur nakir ādeva ohate //
analyzed: yā sisratuḥ rajasaḥ pāre adhvanaḥ yayoḥ śatruḥ nakir ādevaḥ ohate

original: RV_8,059.03a satyaṃ tad indrāvaruṇā kṛśasya vām madhva ūrmiṃ duhate sapta vāṇīḥ /
analyzed: satyam tat indrāvaruṇā kṛśasya vām madhvaḥ ūrmim duhate sapta vāṇīḥ

original: RV_8,059.03c tābhir dāśvāṃsam avataṃ śubhas patī yo vām adabdho abhi pāti cittibhiḥ //
analyzed: tābhiḥ dāśvāṃsam avatam śubhaḥ patī yaḥ vām adabdhaḥ abhi pāti cittibhiḥ

original: RV_8,059.04a ghṛtapruṣaḥ saumyā jīradānavaḥ sapta svasāraḥ sadana ṛtasya /
analyzed: ghṛta pruṣaḥ saumyāḥ jīra dānavaḥ sapta svasāraḥ sadane ṛtasya

original: RV_8,059.04c yā ha vām indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutas tābhir dhattaṃ yajamānāya śikṣatam //
analyzed: yāḥ ha vām indrāvaruṇāḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ tābhiḥ dhattam yajamānāya śikṣatam

original: RV_8,059.05a avocāma mahate saubhagāya satyaṃ tveṣābhyām mahimānam indriyam /
analyzed: avocāma mahate saubhagāya satyam tveṣābhyām mahimānam indriyam

original: RV_8,059.05c asmān sv indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutas tribhiḥ sāptebhir avataṃ śubhas patī //
analyzed: asmān su indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutaḥ tribhiḥ sāptebhiḥ avatam śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_8,059.06a indrāvaruṇā yad ṛṣibhyo manīṣāṃ vāco matiṃ śrutam adattam agre /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā yat ṛṣibhyaḥ manīṣām vācaḥ matim śrutam adattam agre

original: RV_8,059.06c yāni sthānāny asṛjanta dhīrā yajñaṃ tanvānās tapasābhy apaśyam //
analyzed: yāni sthānāni asṛjanta dhīrāḥ yajñam tanvānāḥ tapasā abhi apaśyam

original: RV_8,059.07a indrāvaruṇā saumanasam adṛptaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhattam /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā saumanasam adṛptam rāyaḥ poṣam yajamāneṣu dhattam

original: RV_8,059.07c prajām puṣṭim bhūtim asmāsu dhattaṃ dīrghāyutvāya pra tirataṃ na āyuḥ //
analyzed: prajām puṣṭim bhūtim asmāsu dhattam dīrgha āyu tvāya pra tiratam naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_8,060.01a agna ā yāhy agnibhir hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: agne ā yāhi agnibhiḥ hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_8,060.01c ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭham barhir āsade //
analyzed: ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭham barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_8,060.02a acchā hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaś caranty adhvare /
analyzed: acchā hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaḥ caranti adhvare

original: RV_8,060.02c ūrjo napātaṃ ghṛtakeśam īmahe 'gniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam //
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napātam ghṛta keśam īmahe gnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_8,060.03a agne kavir vedhā asi hotā pāvaka yakṣyaḥ /
analyzed: agne kaviḥ vedhāḥ asi hotā pāvaka yakṣyaḥ

original: RV_8,060.03c mandro yajiṣṭho adhvareṣv īḍyo viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ //
analyzed: mandraḥ yajiṣṭhaḥ adhvareṣu īḍyaḥ viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,060.04a adrogham ā vahośato yaviṣṭhya devāṃ ajasra vītaye /
analyzed: adrogham ā vaha uśataḥ yaviṣṭhya devān ajasra vītaye

original: RV_8,060.04c abhi prayāṃsi sudhitā vaso gahi mandasva dhītibhir hitaḥ //
analyzed: abhi prayāṃsi sudhitā vaso gahi mandasva dhītibhiḥ hitaḥ

original: RV_8,060.05a tvam it saprathā asy agne trātar ṛtas kaviḥ /
analyzed: tvam id saprathāḥ asi agne trātar kaviḥ

original: RV_8,060.05c tvāṃ viprāsaḥ samidhāna dīdiva ā vivāsanti vedhasaḥ //
analyzed: tvām viprāsaḥ samidhāna dīdivas ā vivāsanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_8,060.06a śocā śociṣṭha dīdihi viśe mayo rāsva stotre mahāṃ asi /
analyzed: śoca śociṣṭha dīdihi viśe mayaḥ rāsva stotre mahān asi

original: RV_8,060.06c devānāṃ śarman mama santu sūrayaḥ śatrūṣāhaḥ svagnayaḥ //
analyzed: devānām śarman mama santu sūrayaḥ śatrūṣāhaḥ su agnayaḥ

original: RV_8,060.07a yathā cid vṛddham atasam agne saṃjūrvasi kṣami /
analyzed: yathā cit vṛddham atasam agne saṃjūrvasi kṣami

original: RV_8,060.07c evā daha mitramaho yo asmadhrug durmanmā kaś ca venati //
analyzed: eva daha mitra mahas yaḥ asmadhruk durmanmā kaḥ ca venati

original: RV_8,060.08a mā no martāya ripave rakṣasvine māghaśaṃsāya rīradhaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ martāya ripave rakṣasvine mā agha śaṃsāya rīradhaḥ

original: RV_8,060.08c asredhadbhis taraṇibhir yaviṣṭhya śivebhiḥ pāhi pāyubhiḥ //
analyzed: a sredhadbhiḥ taraṇibhiḥ yaviṣṭhya śivebhiḥ pāhi pāyubhiḥ

original: RV_8,060.09a pāhi no agna ekayā pāhy uta dvitīyayā /
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne ekayā pāhi uta dvitīyayā

original: RV_8,060.09c pāhi gīrbhis tisṛbhir ūrjām pate pāhi catasṛbhir vaso //
analyzed: pāhi gīrbhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ ūrjām pate pāhi catasṛbhiḥ vaso

original: RV_8,060.10a pāhi viśvasmād rakṣaso arāvṇaḥ pra sma vājeṣu no 'va /
analyzed: pāhi viśvasmāt rakṣasaḥ arāvṇaḥ pra sma vājeṣu naḥ vaḥ

original: RV_8,060.10c tvām id dhi nediṣṭhaṃ devatātaya āpiṃ nakṣāmahe vṛdhe //
analyzed: tvām id hi nediṣṭham devatātaye āpim nakṣāmahe vṛdhe

original: RV_8,060.11a ā no agne vayovṛdhaṃ rayim pāvaka śaṃsyam /
analyzed: ā naḥ agne vayaḥ vṛdham rayim pāvaka śaṃsyam

original: RV_8,060.11c rāsvā ca na upamāte puruspṛhaṃ sunītī svayaśastaram //
analyzed: rāsvā ca naḥ upamāte puruspṛham su nītī sva yaśastaram

original: RV_8,060.12a yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śardhatas taranto arya ādiśaḥ /
analyzed: yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śardhataḥ tarantaḥ aryaḥ ādiśaḥ

original: RV_8,060.12c sa tvaṃ no vardha prayasā śacīvaso jinvā dhiyo vasuvidaḥ //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ vardha prayasā śacī vaso jinva dhiyaḥ vasu vidaḥ

original: RV_8,060.13a śiśāno vṛṣabho yathāgniḥ śṛṅge davidhvat /
analyzed: śiśānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yathā agniḥ śṛṅge davidhvat

original: RV_8,060.13c tigmā asya hanavo na pratidhṛṣe sujambhaḥ sahaso yahuḥ //
analyzed: tigmāḥ asya hanavaḥ na pratidhṛṣe su jambhaḥ sahasaḥ yahuḥ

original: RV_8,060.14a nahi te agne vṛṣabha pratidhṛṣe jambhāso yad vitiṣṭhase /
analyzed: nahi te agne vṛṣabha pratidhṛṣe jambhāsaḥ yat vitiṣṭhase

original: RV_8,060.14c sa tvaṃ no hotaḥ suhutaṃ haviṣ kṛdhi vaṃsvā no vāryā puru //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ hotar su hutam haviḥ kṛdhi vaṃsva naḥ vāryā puru

original: RV_8,060.15a śeṣe vaneṣu mātroḥ saṃ tvā martāsa indhate /
analyzed: śeṣe vaneṣu mātroḥ sam tvā martāsaḥ indhate

original: RV_8,060.15c atandro havyā vahasi haviṣkṛta ād id deveṣu rājasi //
analyzed: atandraḥ havyā vahasi haviṣkṛtaḥ āt id deveṣu rājasi

original: RV_8,060.16a sapta hotāras tam id īḷate tvāgne sutyajam ahrayam /
analyzed: sapta hotāraḥ tam id īḍate tvā agne sutyajam ahrayam

original: RV_8,060.16c bhinatsy adriṃ tapasā vi śociṣā prāgne tiṣṭha janāṃ ati //
analyzed: bhinatsi adrim tapasā vi śociṣā pra agne tiṣṭha janān ati

original: RV_8,060.17a agnim-agniṃ vo adhriguṃ huvema vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: agnim agnim vaḥ adhrigum huvema vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_8,060.17c agniṃ hitaprayasaḥ śaśvatīṣv ā hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām //
analyzed: agnim hita prayasaḥ śaśvatīṣu ā hotāram carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_8,060.18a ketena śarman sacate suṣāmaṇy agne tubhyaṃ cikitvanā /
analyzed: ketena śarman sacate suṣāmaṇi agne tubhyam cikitvanā

original: RV_8,060.18c iṣaṇyayā naḥ pururūpam ā bhara vājaṃ nediṣṭham ūtaye //
analyzed: iṣaṇyayā naḥ puru rūpam ā bhara vājam nediṣṭham ūtaye

original: RV_8,060.19a agne jaritar viśpatis tepāno deva rakṣasaḥ /
analyzed: agne jaritar viśpatiḥ tepānaḥ deva rakṣasaḥ

original: RV_8,060.19c aproṣivān gṛhapatir mahāṃ asi divas pāyur duroṇayuḥ //
analyzed: a proṣivān gṛhapatiḥ mahān asi divaḥ pāyuḥ duroṇayuḥ

original: RV_8,060.20a mā no rakṣa ā veśīd āghṛṇīvaso mā yātur yātumāvatām /
analyzed: mā naḥ rakṣaḥ ā veśīt āghṛṇīvaso mā yātuḥ yātumāvatām

original: RV_8,060.20c parogavyūty anirām apa kṣudham agne sedha rakṣasvinaḥ //
analyzed: parogavyūtī anirām apa kṣudham agne sedha rakṣasvinaḥ

original: RV_8,061.01a ubhayaṃ śṛṇavac ca na indro arvāg idaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: ubhayam śṛṇavat ca naḥ indraḥ arvāk idam vacaḥ

original: RV_8,061.01c satrācyā maghavā somapītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭha ā gamat //
analyzed: satrācyā maghavā soma pītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭhaḥ ā gamat

original: RV_8,061.02a taṃ hi svarājaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tam ojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ /
analyzed: tam hi sva rājam vṛṣabham tam ojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ

original: RV_8,061.02c utopamānām prathamo ni ṣīdasi somakāmaṃ hi te manaḥ //
analyzed: uta upamānām prathamaḥ ni sīdasi soma kāmam hi te manaḥ

original: RV_8,061.03a ā vṛṣasva purūvaso sutasyendrāndhasaḥ /
analyzed: ā vṛṣasva purūvaso sutasya indra andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,061.03c vidmā hi tvā harivaḥ pṛtsu sāsahim adhṛṣṭaṃ cid dadhṛṣvaṇim //
analyzed: vidma hi tvā harivas pṛtsu sāsahim adhṛṣṭam cit dadhṛṣvaṇim

original: RV_8,061.04a aprāmisatya maghavan tathed asad indra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ /
analyzed: aprāmisatya maghavan tathā id asat indra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ

original: RV_8,061.04c sanema vājaṃ tava śiprinn avasā makṣū cid yanto adrivaḥ //
analyzed: sanema vājam tava śiprin avasā makṣū cit yantaḥ adrivas

original: RV_8,061.05a śagdhy ū ṣu śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: śagdhi u su śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,061.05c bhagaṃ na hi tvā yaśasaṃ vasuvidam anu śūra carāmasi //
analyzed: bhagam na hi tvā yaśasam vasu vidam anu śūra carāmasi

original: RV_8,061.06a pauro aśvasya purukṛd gavām asy utso deva hiraṇyayaḥ /
analyzed: pauraḥ aśvasya puru kṛt gavām asi utsaḥ deva hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_8,061.06c nakir hi dānam parimardhiṣat tve yad-yad yāmi tad ā bhara //
analyzed: nakir hi dānam parimardhiṣat tve yat yat yāmi tat ā bhara

original: RV_8,061.07a tvaṃ hy ehi cerave vidā bhagaṃ vasuttaye /
analyzed: tvam hi ehi cerave vida bhagam vasuttaye

original: RV_8,061.07c ud vāvṛṣasva maghavan gaviṣṭaya ud indrāśvamiṣṭaye //
analyzed: ud vāvṛṣasva maghavan gaviṣṭaye ud indra aśvamiṣṭaye

original: RV_8,061.08a tvam purū sahasrāṇi śatāni ca yūthā dānāya maṃhase /
analyzed: tvam purū sahasrāṇi śatāni ca yūthā dānāya maṃhase

original: RV_8,061.08c ā purandaraṃ cakṛma vipravacasa indraṃ gāyanto 'vase //
analyzed: ā purandaram cakṛma vipra vacasaḥ indram gāyantaḥ vase

original: RV_8,061.09a avipro vā yad avidhad vipro vendra te vacaḥ /
analyzed: a vipraḥ vā yat avidhat vipraḥ vā indra te vacaḥ

original: RV_8,061.09c sa pra mamandat tvāyā śatakrato prācāmanyo ahaṃsana //
analyzed: sa pra mamandat tvāyā śatakrato prācāmanyo ahaṃsana

original: RV_8,061.10a ugrabāhur mrakṣakṛtvā purandaro yadi me śṛṇavad dhavam /
analyzed: ugra bāhuḥ mrakṣa kṛtvā purandaraḥ yadi me śṛṇavat dhavam

original: RV_8,061.10c vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomair indraṃ havāmahe //
analyzed: vasūyavaḥ vasu patim śatakratum stomaiḥ indram havāmahe

original: RV_8,061.11a na pāpāso manāmahe nārāyāso na jaḷhavaḥ /
analyzed: na pāpāsaḥ manāmahe na arāyāsaḥ na jaḷhavaḥ

original: RV_8,061.11c yad in nv indraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ sacā sute sakhāyaṃ kṛṇavāmahai //
analyzed: yat id nu indram vṛṣaṇam sacā sute sakhāyam kṛṇavāmahai

original: RV_8,061.12a ugraṃ yuyujma pṛtanāsu sāsahim ṛṇakātim adābhyam /
analyzed: ugram yuyujma pṛtanāsu sāsahim ṛṇakātim adābhyam

original: RV_8,061.12c vedā bhṛmaṃ cit sanitā rathītamo vājinaṃ yam id ū naśat //
analyzed: veda bhṛmam cit sanitā rathītamaḥ vājinam yam id u naśat

original: RV_8,061.13a yata indra bhayāmahe tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi /
analyzed: yatas indra bhayāmahe tatas naḥ abhayam kṛdhi

original: RV_8,061.13c maghavañ chagdhi tava tan na ūtibhir vi dviṣo vi mṛdho jahi //
analyzed: maghavan śagdhi tava tat naḥ ūtibhiḥ vi dviṣaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ jahi

original: RV_8,061.14a tvaṃ hi rādhaspate rādhaso mahaḥ kṣayasyāsi vidhataḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi rādhaspate rādhasaḥ mahaḥ kṣayasya asi vidhataḥ

original: RV_8,061.14c taṃ tvā vayam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe //
analyzed: tam tvā vayam maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,061.15a indra spaḷ uta vṛtrahā paraspā no vareṇyaḥ /
analyzed: indra spaṣ uta vṛtrahā paraspāḥ naḥ vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_8,061.15c sa no rakṣiṣac caramaṃ sa madhyamaṃ sa paścāt pātu naḥ puraḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ rakṣiṣat caramam sa madhyamam sa paścāt pātu naḥ puras

original: RV_8,061.16a tvaṃ naḥ paścād adharād uttarāt pura indra ni pāhi viśvataḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ paścāt adharāt uttarāt puras indra ni pāhi viśvatas

original: RV_8,061.16c āre asmat kṛṇuhi daivyam bhayam āre hetīr adevīḥ //
analyzed: āre asmat kṛṇuhi daivyam bhayam āre hetīḥ adevīḥ

original: RV_8,061.17a adyādyā śvaḥ-śva indra trāsva pare ca naḥ /
analyzed: adya adya śvas śvas indra trāsva pare ca naḥ

original: RV_8,061.17c viśvā ca no jaritṝn satpate ahā divā naktaṃ ca rakṣiṣaḥ //
analyzed: viśvā ca naḥ jaritṝn satpate ahā divā naktam ca rakṣiṣaḥ

original: RV_8,061.18a prabhaṅgī śūro maghavā tuvīmaghaḥ sammiślo viryāya kam /
analyzed: prabhaṅgī śūraḥ maghavā tuvīmaghaḥ sammiślaḥ viryāya kam

original: RV_8,061.18c ubhā te bāhū vṛṣaṇā śatakrato ni yā vajram mimikṣatuḥ //
analyzed: ubhā te bāhū vṛṣaṇā śatakrato ni yā vajram mimikṣatuḥ

original: RV_8,062.01a pro asmā upastutim bharatā yaj jujoṣati /
analyzed: pra u asmai upastutim bharata yat jujoṣati

original: RV_8,062.01c ukthair indrasya māhinaṃ vayo vardhanti somino bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: ukthaiḥ indrasya māhinam vayaḥ vardhanti sominaḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.02a ayujo asamo nṛbhir ekaḥ kṛṣṭīr ayāsyaḥ /
analyzed: ayujaḥ asamaḥ nṛbhiḥ ekaḥ kṛṣṭīḥ ayāsyaḥ

original: RV_8,062.02c pūrvīr ati pra vāvṛdhe viśvā jātāny ojasā bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ ati pra vāvṛdhe viśvā jātāni ojasā bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.03a ahitena cid arvatā jīradānuḥ siṣāsati /
analyzed: a hitena cit arvatā jīra dānuḥ siṣāsati

original: RV_8,062.03c pravācyam indra tat tava vīryāṇi kariṣyato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: pravācyam indra tat tava vīryāṇi kariṣyataḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.04a ā yāhi kṛṇavāma ta indra brahmāṇi vardhanā /
analyzed: ā yāhi kṛṇavāma te indra brahmāṇi vardhanā

original: RV_8,062.04c yebhiḥ śaviṣṭha cākano bhadram iha śravasyate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: yebhiḥ śaviṣṭha cākanaḥ bhadram iha śravasyate bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.05a dhṛṣataś cid dhṛṣan manaḥ kṛṇoṣīndra yat tvam /
analyzed: dhṛṣataḥ cit dhṛṣat manaḥ kṛṇoṣi indra yat tvam

original: RV_8,062.05c tīvraiḥ somaiḥ saparyato namobhiḥ pratibhūṣato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: tīvraiḥ somaiḥ saparyataḥ namobhiḥ pratibhūṣataḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.06a ava caṣṭa ṛcīṣamo 'vatāṃ iva mānuṣaḥ /
analyzed: ava caṣṭe ṛcīṣamaḥ vatām iva mānuṣaḥ

original: RV_8,062.06c juṣṭvī dakṣasya sominaḥ sakhāyaṃ kṛṇute yujam bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: juṣṭvī dakṣasya sominaḥ sakhāyam kṛṇute yujam bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.07a viśve ta indra vīryaṃ devā anu kratuṃ daduḥ /
analyzed: viśve te indra vīryam devāḥ anu kratum daduḥ

original: RV_8,062.07c bhuvo viśvasya gopatiḥ puruṣṭuta bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: bhuvaḥ viśvasya gopatiḥ puruṣṭuta bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.08a gṛṇe tad indra te śava upamaṃ devatātaye /
analyzed: gṛṇe tat indra te śavaḥ upamam devatātaye

original: RV_8,062.08c yad dhaṃsi vṛtram ojasā śacīpate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: yat haṃsi vṛtram ojasā śacīpate bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.09a samaneva vapuṣyataḥ kṛṇavan mānuṣā yugā /
analyzed: samanā iva vapuṣyataḥ kṛṇavat mānuṣā yugā

original: RV_8,062.09c vide tad indraś cetanam adha śruto bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: vide tat indraḥ cetanam adha śrutaḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.10a uj jātam indra te śava ut tvām ut tava kratum /
analyzed: ud jātam indra te śavaḥ ud tvām ud tava kratum

original: RV_8,062.10c bhūrigo bhūri vāvṛdhur maghavan tava śarmaṇi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: bhūrigo bhūri vāvṛdhuḥ maghavan tava śarmaṇi bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.11a ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan saṃ yujyāva sanibhya ā /
analyzed: aham ca tvam ca vṛtrahan sam yujyāva sanibhyaḥ ā

original: RV_8,062.11c arātīvā cid adrivo 'nu nau śūra maṃsate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: arātīvā cit adrivas nu nau śūra maṃsate bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,062.12a satyam id vā u taṃ vayam indraṃ stavāma nānṛtam /
analyzed: satyam id vai u tam vayam indram stavāma na anṛtam

original: RV_8,062.12c mahāṃ asunvato vadho bhūri jyotīṃṣi sunvato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
analyzed: mahān a sunvataḥ vadhaḥ bhūri jyotīṃṣi sunvataḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,063.01a sa pūrvyo mahānāṃ venaḥ kratubhir ānaje /
analyzed: sa pūrvyaḥ mahānām venaḥ kratubhiḥ ānaje

original: RV_8,063.01c yasya dvārā manuṣ pitā deveṣu dhiya ānaje //
analyzed: yasya dvārā manuḥ pitā deveṣu dhiyaḥ ānaje

original: RV_8,063.02a divo mānaṃ not sadan somapṛṣṭhāso adrayaḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ mānam na ud sadan soma pṛṣṭhāsaḥ adrayaḥ

original: RV_8,063.02c ukthā brahma ca śaṃsyā //
analyzed: ukthā brahma ca śaṃsyā

original: RV_8,063.03a sa vidvāṃ aṅgirobhya indro gā avṛṇod apa /
analyzed: sa vidvān aṅgirobhyaḥ indraḥ gāḥ avṛṇot apa

original: RV_8,063.03c stuṣe tad asya pauṃsyam //
analyzed: stuṣe tat asya pauṃsyam

original: RV_8,063.04a sa pratnathā kavivṛdha indro vākasya vakṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: sa pratnathā kavi vṛdhaḥ indraḥ vākasya vakṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_8,063.04c śivo arkasya homany asmatrā gantv avase //
analyzed: śivaḥ arkasya homani asmatrā gantu avase

original: RV_8,063.05a ād ū nu te anu kratuṃ svāhā varasya yajyavaḥ /
analyzed: āt u nu te anu kratum svāhā varasya yajyavaḥ

original: RV_8,063.05c śvātram arkā anūṣatendra gotrasya dāvane //
analyzed: śvātram arkāḥ anūṣata indra gotrasya dāvane

original: RV_8,063.06a indre viśvāni vīryā kṛtāni kartvāni ca /
analyzed: indre viśvāni vīryā kṛtāni kartvāni ca

original: RV_8,063.06c yam arkā adhvaraṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: yam arkāḥ adhvaram viduḥ

original: RV_8,063.07a yat pāñcajanyayā viśendre ghoṣā asṛkṣata /
analyzed: yat pāñcajanyayā viśā indre ghoṣāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_8,063.07c astṛṇād barhaṇā vipo 'ryo mānasya sa kṣayaḥ //
analyzed: astṛṇāt barhaṇā vipaḥ ryaḥ mānasya sa kṣayaḥ

original: RV_8,063.08a iyam u te anuṣṭutiś cakṛṣe tāni pauṃsyā /
analyzed: iyam u te anuṣṭutiḥ cakṛṣe tāni pauṃsyā

original: RV_8,063.08c prāvaś cakrasya vartanim //
analyzed: prāvaḥ cakrasya vartanim

original: RV_8,063.09a asya vṛṣṇo vyodana uru kramiṣṭa jīvase /
analyzed: asya vṛṣṇaḥ vi odanaḥ uru kramiṣṭa jīvase

original: RV_8,063.09c yavaṃ na paśva ā dade //
analyzed: yavam na paśve ā dade

original: RV_8,063.10a tad dadhānā avasyavo yuṣmābhir dakṣapitaraḥ /
analyzed: tat dadhānāḥ avasyavaḥ yuṣmābhiḥ dakṣa pitaraḥ

original: RV_8,063.10c syāma marutvato vṛdhe //
analyzed: syāma marutvataḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_8,063.11a baḷ ṛtviyāya dhāmna ṛkvabhiḥ śūra nonumaḥ /
analyzed: baṭ ṛtviyāya dhāmnaḥ ṛkvabhiḥ śūra nonumaḥ

original: RV_8,063.11c jeṣāmendra tvayā yujā //
analyzed: jeṣāma indra tvayā yujā

original: RV_8,063.12a asme rudrā mehanā parvatāso vṛtrahatye bharahūtau sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: asme rudrāḥ mehanā parvatāsaḥ vṛtra hatye bhara hūtau sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_8,063.12c yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate dhāyi pajra indrajyeṣṭhā asmāṃ avantu devāḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate dhāyi pajraḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ asmān avantu devāḥ

original: RV_8,064.01a ut tvā mandantu stomāḥ kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ /
analyzed: ud tvā mandantu stomāḥ kṛṇuṣva rādhaḥ adrivas

original: RV_8,064.01c ava brahmadviṣo jahi //
analyzed: ava brahma dviṣaḥ jahi

original: RV_8,064.02a padā paṇīṃr arādhaso ni bādhasva mahāṃ asi /
analyzed: padā paṇīṃr arādhasaḥ ni bādhasva mahān asi

original: RV_8,064.02c nahi tvā kaś cana prati //
analyzed: nahi tvā kaḥ cana prati

original: RV_8,064.03a tvam īśiṣe sutānām indra tvam asutānām /
analyzed: tvam īśiṣe sutānām indra tvam a sutānām

original: RV_8,064.03c tvaṃ rājā janānām //
analyzed: tvam rājā janānām

original: RV_8,064.04a ehi prehi kṣayo divy āghoṣañ carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: ehi prehi kṣayaḥ divi āghoṣam carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_8,064.04c obhe pṛṇāsi rodasī //
analyzed: ā ubhe pṛṇāsi rodasī

original: RV_8,064.05a tyaṃ cit parvataṃ giriṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam /
analyzed: tyam cit parvatam girim śatavantam sahasriṇam

original: RV_8,064.05c vi stotṛbhyo rurojitha //
analyzed: vi stotṛbhyaḥ rurojitha

original: RV_8,064.06a vayam u tvā divā sute vayaṃ naktaṃ havāmahe /
analyzed: vayam u tvā divā sute vayam naktam havāmahe

original: RV_8,064.06c asmākaṃ kāmam ā pṛṇa //
analyzed: asmākam kāmam ā pṛṇa

original: RV_8,064.07a kva sya vṛṣabho yuvā tuvigrīvo anānataḥ /
analyzed: kva sya vṛṣabhaḥ yuvā tuvi grīvaḥ an ānataḥ

original: RV_8,064.07c brahmā kas taṃ saparyati //
analyzed: brahmā kaḥ tam saparyati

original: RV_8,064.08a kasya svit savanaṃ vṛṣā jujuṣvāṃ ava gacchati /
analyzed: kasya svid savanam vṛṣā jujuṣvān ava gacchati

original: RV_8,064.08c indraṃ ka u svid ā cake //
analyzed: indram kaḥ u svid ā cake

original: RV_8,064.09a kaṃ te dānā asakṣata vṛtrahan kaṃ suvīryā /
analyzed: kam te dānā asakṣata vṛtrahan kam su vīryā

original: RV_8,064.09c ukthe ka u svid antamaḥ //
analyzed: ukthe kaḥ u svid antamaḥ

original: RV_8,064.10a ayaṃ te mānuṣe jane somaḥ pūruṣu sūyate /
analyzed: ayam te mānuṣe jane somaḥ pūruṣu sūyate

original: RV_8,064.10c tasyehi pra dravā piba //
analyzed: tasya ihi pra drava piba

original: RV_8,064.11a ayaṃ te śaryaṇāvati suṣomāyām adhi priyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam te śaryaṇāvati suṣomāyām adhi priyaḥ

original: RV_8,064.11c ārjīkīye madintamaḥ //
analyzed: ārjīkīye madintamaḥ

original: RV_8,064.12a tam adya rādhase mahe cārum madāya ghṛṣvaye /
analyzed: tam adya rādhase mahe cārum madāya ghṛṣvaye

original: RV_8,064.12c ehīm indra dravā piba //
analyzed: ehi īm indra drava piba

original: RV_8,065.01a yad indra prāg apāg udaṅ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: yat indra prāk apāk udak nyak vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_8,065.01c ā yāhi tūyam āśubhiḥ //
analyzed: ā yāhi tūyam āśubhiḥ

original: RV_8,065.02a yad vā prasravaṇe divo mādayāse svarṇare /
analyzed: yat vā prasravaṇe divaḥ mādayāse svarṇare

original: RV_8,065.02c yad vā samudre andhasaḥ //
analyzed: yat vā samudre andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,065.03a ā tvā gīrbhir mahām uruṃ huve gām iva bhojase /
analyzed: ā tvā gīrbhiḥ mahām urum huve gām iva bhojase

original: RV_8,065.03c indra somasya pītaye //
analyzed: indra somasya pītaye

original: RV_8,065.04a ā ta indra mahimānaṃ harayo deva te mahaḥ /
analyzed: ā te indra mahimānam harayaḥ deva te mahaḥ

original: RV_8,065.04c rathe vahantu bibhrataḥ //
analyzed: rathe vahantu bibhrataḥ

original: RV_8,065.05a indra gṛṇīṣa u stuṣe mahāṃ ugra īśānakṛt /
analyzed: indra gṛṇīṣe u stuṣe mahān ugraḥ īśāna kṛt

original: RV_8,065.05c ehi naḥ sutam piba //
analyzed: ehi naḥ sutam piba

original: RV_8,065.06a sutāvantas tvā vayam prayasvanto havāmahe /
analyzed: sutāvantaḥ tvā vayam prayasvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_8,065.06c idaṃ no barhir āsade //
analyzed: idam naḥ barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_8,065.07a yac cid dhi śaśvatām asīndra sādhāraṇas tvam /
analyzed: yat cit hi śaśvatām asi indra sādhāraṇaḥ tvam

original: RV_8,065.07c taṃ tvā vayaṃ havāmahe //
analyzed: tam tvā vayam havāmahe

original: RV_8,065.08a idaṃ te somyam madhv adhukṣann adribhir naraḥ /
analyzed: idam te somyam madhu adhukṣan adribhiḥ naraḥ

original: RV_8,065.08c juṣāṇa indra tat piba //
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ indra tat piba

original: RV_8,065.09a viśvāṃ aryo vipaścito 'ti khyas tūyam ā gahi /
analyzed: viśvān aryaḥ vipaścitaḥ ti khyaḥ tūyam ā gahi

original: RV_8,065.09c asme dhehi śravo bṛhat //
analyzed: asme dhehi śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_8,065.10a dātā me pṛṣatīnāṃ rājā hiraṇyavīnām /
analyzed: dātā me pṛṣatīnām rājā hiraṇyavīnām

original: RV_8,065.10c mā devā maghavā riṣat //
analyzed: mā devāḥ maghavā riṣat

original: RV_8,065.11a sahasre pṛṣatīnām adhi ścandram bṛhat pṛthu /
analyzed: sahasre pṛṣatīnām adhi ścandram bṛhat pṛthu

original: RV_8,065.11c śukraṃ hiraṇyam ā dade //
analyzed: śukram hiraṇyam ā dade

original: RV_8,065.12a napāto durgahasya me sahasreṇa surādhasaḥ /
analyzed: napātaḥ durgahasya me sahasreṇa su rādhasaḥ

original: RV_8,065.12c śravo deveṣv akrata //
analyzed: śravaḥ deveṣu akrata

original: RV_8,066.01a tarobhir vo vidadvasum indraṃ sabādha ūtaye /
analyzed: tarobhiḥ vaḥ vidadvasum indram sabādhas ūtaye

original: RV_8,066.01c bṛhad gāyantaḥ sutasome adhvare huve bharaṃ na kāriṇam //
analyzed: bṛhat gāyantaḥ suta some adhvare huve bharam na kāriṇam

original: RV_8,066.02a na yaṃ dudhrā varante na sthirā muro made suśipram andhasaḥ /
analyzed: na yam dudhrāḥ varante na sthirāḥ muraḥ made su śipram andhasaḥ

original: RV_8,066.02c ya ādṛtyā śaśamānāya sunvate dātā jaritra ukthyam //
analyzed: yaḥ ādṛtya śaśamānāya sunvate dātā jaritre ukthyam

original: RV_8,066.03a yaḥ śakro mṛkṣo aśvyo yo vā kījo hiraṇyayaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ śakraḥ mṛkṣaḥ aśvyaḥ yaḥ vā kījaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_8,066.03c sa ūrvasya rejayaty apāvṛtim indro gavyasya vṛtrahā //
analyzed: saḥ ūrvasya rejayati apāvṛtim indraḥ gavyasya vṛtrahā

original: RV_8,066.04a nikhātaṃ cid yaḥ purusambhṛtaṃ vasūd id vapati dāśuṣe /
analyzed: nikhātam cit yaḥ puru sambhṛtam vasu ud id vapati dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,066.04c vajrī suśipro haryaśva it karad indraḥ kratvā yathā vaśat //
analyzed: vajrī su śipraḥ haryaśvaḥ id karat indraḥ kratvā yathā vaśat

original: RV_8,066.05a yad vāvantha puruṣṭuta purā cic chūra nṛṇām /
analyzed: yat vāvantha puruṣṭuta purā cit śūra nṛṇām

original: RV_8,066.05c vayaṃ tat ta indra sam bharāmasi yajñam ukthaṃ turaṃ vacaḥ //
analyzed: vayam tat te indra sam bharāmasi yajñam uktham turam vacaḥ

original: RV_8,066.06a sacā someṣu puruhūta vajrivo madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ /
analyzed: sacā someṣu puruhūta vajrivas madāya dyukṣa soma pāḥ

original: RV_8,066.06c tvam id dhi brahmakṛte kāmyaṃ vasu deṣṭhaḥ sunvate bhuvaḥ //
analyzed: tvam id hi brahma kṛte kāmyam vasu deṣṭhaḥ sunvate bhuvaḥ

original: RV_8,066.07a vayam enam idā hyo 'pīpemeha vajriṇam /
analyzed: vayam enam idā hyas pīpema iha vajriṇam

original: RV_8,066.07c tasmā u adya samanā sutam bharā nūnam bhūṣata śrute //
analyzed: tasmai u adya samanā sutam bhara nūnam bhūṣata śrute

original: RV_8,066.08a vṛkaś cid asya vāraṇa urāmathir ā vayuneṣu bhūṣati /
analyzed: vṛkaḥ cit asya vāraṇaḥ urāmathiḥ ā vayuneṣu bhūṣati

original: RV_8,066.08c semaṃ na stomaṃ jujuṣāṇa ā gahīndra pra citrayā dhiyā //
analyzed: sa imam naḥ stomam jujuṣāṇaḥ ā gahi indra pra citrayā dhiyā

original: RV_8,066.09a kad ū nv asyākṛtam indrasyāsti pauṃsyam /
analyzed: kad u nu asya a kṛtam indrasya asti pauṃsyam

original: RV_8,066.09c keno nu kaṃ śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā //
analyzed: kena u nu kam śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā

original: RV_8,066.10a kad ū mahīr adhṛṣṭā asya taviṣīḥ kad u vṛtraghno astṛtam /
analyzed: kad u mahīḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ asya taviṣīḥ kad u vṛtra ghna u astṛtam

original: RV_8,066.10c indro viśvān bekanāṭāṃ ahardṛśa uta kratvā paṇīṃr abhi //
analyzed: indraḥ viśvān bekanāṭām ahardṛśaḥ uta kratvā paṇīṃr abhi

original: RV_8,066.11a vayaṃ ghā te apūrvyendra brahmāṇi vṛtrahan /
analyzed: vayam gha te apūrvya indra brahmāṇi vṛtrahan

original: RV_8,066.11c purūtamāsaḥ puruhūta vajrivo bhṛtiṃ na pra bharāmasi //
analyzed: purūtamāsaḥ puruhūta vajrivas bhṛtim na pra bharāmasi

original: RV_8,066.12a pūrvīś cid dhi tve tuvikūrminn āśaso havanta indrotayaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvīḥ cit hi tve tuvikūrmin āśasaḥ havante indrā ūtayaḥ

original: RV_8,066.12c tiraś cid aryaḥ savanā vaso gahi śaviṣṭha śrudhi me havam //
analyzed: tiras cit aryaḥ savanā vaso gahi śaviṣṭha śrudhi me havam

original: RV_8,066.13a vayaṃ ghā te tve id v indra viprā api ṣmasi /
analyzed: vayam gha te tve id u indra viprāḥ api smasi

original: RV_8,066.13c nahi tvad anyaḥ puruhūta kaś cana maghavann asti marḍitā //
analyzed: nahi tvat anyaḥ puruhūta kaḥ cana maghavan asti marḍitā

original: RV_8,066.14a tvaṃ no asyā amater uta kṣudho 'bhiśaster ava spṛdhi /
analyzed: tvam naḥ asyāḥ amateḥ uta kṣudhaḥ bhiśasteḥ ava spṛdhi

original: RV_8,066.14c tvaṃ na ūtī tava citrayā dhiyā śikṣā śaciṣṭha gātuvit //
analyzed: tvam naḥ ūtī tava citrayā dhiyā śikṣa śaciṣṭha gātu vid

original: RV_8,066.15a soma id vaḥ suto astu kalayo mā bibhītana /
analyzed: somaḥ id vaḥ sutaḥ astu kalayaḥ mā bibhītana

original: RV_8,066.15c aped eṣa dhvasmāyati svayaṃ ghaiṣo apāyati //
analyzed: apa id eṣa dhvasmā ayati svayam gha eṣaḥ apāyati

original: RV_8,067.01a tyān nu kṣatriyāṃ ava ādityān yāciṣāmahe /
analyzed: tyān nu kṣatriyām avaḥ ādityān yāciṣāmahe

original: RV_8,067.01c sumṛḷīkāṃ abhiṣṭaye //
analyzed: su mṛḍīkām abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_8,067.02a mitro no aty aṃhatiṃ varuṇaḥ parṣad aryamā /
analyzed: mitraḥ naḥ ati aṃhatim varuṇaḥ parṣat aryamā

original: RV_8,067.02c ādityāso yathā viduḥ //
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ yathā viduḥ

original: RV_8,067.03a teṣāṃ hi citram ukthyaṃ varūtham asti dāśuṣe /
analyzed: teṣām hi citram ukthyam varūtham asti dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,067.03c ādityānām araṅkṛte //
analyzed: ādityānām araṅkṛte

original: RV_8,067.04a mahi vo mahatām avo varuṇa mitrāryaman /
analyzed: mahi vaḥ mahatām avaḥ varuṇa mitra aryaman

original: RV_8,067.04c avāṃsy ā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: avāṃsi ā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_8,067.05a jīvān no abhi dhetanādityāsaḥ purā hathāt /
analyzed: jīvān naḥ abhi dhetana ādityāsaḥ purā hathāt

original: RV_8,067.05c kad dha stha havanaśrutaḥ //
analyzed: kad ha stha havana śrutaḥ

original: RV_8,067.06a yad vaḥ śrāntāya sunvate varūtham asti yac chardiḥ /
analyzed: yat vaḥ śrāntāya sunvate varūtham asti yat chardiḥ

original: RV_8,067.06c tenā no adhi vocata //
analyzed: tena naḥ adhi vocata

original: RV_8,067.07a asti devā aṃhor urv asti ratnam anāgasaḥ /
analyzed: asti devāḥ aṃhoḥ uru asti ratnam anāgasaḥ

original: RV_8,067.07c ādityā adbhutainasaḥ //
analyzed: ādityāḥ adbhuta enasaḥ

original: RV_8,067.08a mā naḥ setuḥ siṣed ayam mahe vṛṇaktu nas pari /
analyzed: mā naḥ setuḥ siṣet ayam mahe vṛṇaktu naḥ pari

original: RV_8,067.08c indra id dhi śruto vaśī //
analyzed: indraḥ id hi śrutaḥ vaśī

original: RV_8,067.09a mā no mṛcā ripūṇāṃ vṛjinānām aviṣyavaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ mṛcā ripūṇām vṛjinānām aviṣyavaḥ

original: RV_8,067.09c devā abhi pra mṛkṣata //
analyzed: devāḥ abhi pra mṛkṣata

original: RV_8,067.10a uta tvām adite mahy ahaṃ devy upa bruve /
analyzed: uta tvām adite mahi aham devi upa bruve

original: RV_8,067.10c sumṛḷīkām abhiṣṭaye //
analyzed: su mṛḍīkām abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_8,067.11a parṣi dīne gabhīra āṃ ugraputre jighāṃsataḥ /
analyzed: parṣi dīne gabhīre ām ugra putre jighāṃsataḥ

original: RV_8,067.11c mākis tokasya no riṣat //
analyzed: mākir tokasya naḥ riṣat

original: RV_8,067.12a aneho na uruvraja urūci vi prasartave /
analyzed: anehaḥ naḥ uru vraje urūci vi prasartave

original: RV_8,067.12c kṛdhi tokāya jīvase //
analyzed: kṛdhi tokāya jīvase

original: RV_8,067.13a ye mūrdhānaḥ kṣitīnām adabdhāsaḥ svayaśasaḥ /
analyzed: ye mūrdhānaḥ kṣitīnām adabdhāsaḥ sva yaśasaḥ

original: RV_8,067.13c vratā rakṣante adruhaḥ //
analyzed: vratā rakṣante adruhaḥ

original: RV_8,067.14a te na āsno vṛkāṇām ādityāso mumocata /
analyzed: te naḥ āsnaḥ vṛkāṇām ādityāsaḥ mumocata

original: RV_8,067.14c stenam baddham ivādite //
analyzed: stenam baddham iva adite

original: RV_8,067.15a apo ṣu ṇa iyaṃ śarur ādityā apa durmatiḥ /
analyzed: apa u su naḥ iyam śaruḥ ādityāḥ apa durmatiḥ

original: RV_8,067.15c asmad etv ajaghnuṣī //
analyzed: asmat etu a jaghnuṣī

original: RV_8,067.16a śaśvad dhi vaḥ sudānava ādityā ūtibhir vayam /
analyzed: śaśvat hi vaḥ sudānavaḥ ādityāḥ ūtibhiḥ vayam

original: RV_8,067.16c purā nūnam bubhujmahe //
analyzed: purā nūnam bubhujmahe

original: RV_8,067.17a śaśvantaṃ hi pracetasaḥ pratiyantaṃ cid enasaḥ /
analyzed: śaśvantam hi pracetasaḥ pratiyantam cit enasaḥ

original: RV_8,067.17c devāḥ kṛṇutha jīvase //
analyzed: devāḥ kṛṇutha jīvase

original: RV_8,067.18a tat su no navyaṃ sanyasa ādityā yan mumocati /
analyzed: tat su naḥ navyam sanyase ādityāḥ yat mumocati

original: RV_8,067.18c bandhād baddham ivādite //
analyzed: bandhāt baddham iva adite

original: RV_8,067.19a nāsmākam asti tat tara ādityāso atiṣkade /
analyzed: na asmākam asti tat taraḥ ādityāsaḥ atiṣkade

original: RV_8,067.19c yūyam asmabhyam mṛḷata //
analyzed: yūyam asmabhyam mṛḍata

original: RV_8,067.20a mā no hetir vivasvata ādityāḥ kṛtrimā śaruḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ hetiḥ vivasvataḥ ādityāḥ kṛtrimā śaruḥ

original: RV_8,067.20c purā nu jaraso vadhīt //
analyzed: purā nu jarasaḥ vadhīt

original: RV_8,067.21a vi ṣu dveṣo vy aṃhatim ādityāso vi saṃhitam /
analyzed: vi su dveṣaḥ vi aṃhatim ādityāsaḥ vi saṃhitam

original: RV_8,067.21c viṣvag vi vṛhatā rapaḥ //
analyzed: viṣvak vi vṛhata rapaḥ

original: RV_8,068.01a ā tvā rathaṃ yathotaye sumnāya vartayāmasi /
analyzed: ā tvā ratham yathā ūtaye sumnāya vartayāmasi

original: RV_8,068.01c tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham indra śaviṣṭha satpate //
analyzed: tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham indra śaviṣṭha satpate

original: RV_8,068.02a tuviśuṣma tuvikrato śacīvo viśvayā mate /
analyzed: tuvi śuṣma tuvi krato śacīvas viśvayā mate

original: RV_8,068.02c ā paprātha mahitvanā //
analyzed: ā paprātha mahitvanā

original: RV_8,068.03a yasya te mahinā mahaḥ pari jmāyantam īyatuḥ /
analyzed: yasya te mahinā mahaḥ pari jmāyantam īyatuḥ

original: RV_8,068.03c hastā vajraṃ hiraṇyayam //
analyzed: hastāḥ vajram hiraṇyayam

original: RV_8,068.04a viśvānarasya vas patim anānatasya śavasaḥ /
analyzed: viśvānarasya vaḥ patim an ānatasya śavasaḥ

original: RV_8,068.04c evaiś ca carṣaṇīnām ūtī huve rathānām //
analyzed: evaiḥ ca carṣaṇīnām ūtī huve rathānām

original: RV_8,068.05a abhiṣṭaye sadāvṛdhaṃ svarmīḷheṣu yaṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: abhiṣṭaye sadāvṛdham svarmīḷheṣu yam naraḥ

original: RV_8,068.05c nānā havanta ūtaye //
analyzed: nānā havante ūtaye

original: RV_8,068.06a paromātram ṛcīṣamam indram ugraṃ surādhasam /
analyzed: paromātram ṛcīṣamam indram ugram su rādhasam

original: RV_8,068.06c īśānaṃ cid vasūnām //
analyzed: īśānam cit vasūnām

original: RV_8,068.07a taṃ-tam id rādhase maha indraṃ codāmi pītaye /
analyzed: taṃtam id rādhase mahe indram codāmi pītaye

original: RV_8,068.07c yaḥ pūrvyām anuṣṭutim īśe kṛṣṭīnāṃ nṛtuḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ pūrvyām anuṣṭutim īśe kṛṣṭīnām nṛtuḥ

original: RV_8,068.08a na yasya te śavasāna sakhyam ānaṃśa martyaḥ /
analyzed: na yasya te śavasāna sakhyam ānaṃśa martyaḥ

original: RV_8,068.08c nakiḥ śavāṃsi te naśat //
analyzed: nakir śavāṃsi te naśat

original: RV_8,068.09a tvotāsas tvā yujāpsu sūrye mahad dhanam /
analyzed: tvotāsaḥ tvā yujā apsu sūrye mahat dhanam

original: RV_8,068.09c jayema pṛtsu vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: jayema pṛtsu vajrivas

original: RV_8,068.10a taṃ tvā yajñebhir īmahe taṃ gīrbhir girvaṇastama /
analyzed: tam tvā yajñebhiḥ īmahe tam gīrbhiḥ girvaṇastama

original: RV_8,068.10c indra yathā cid āvitha vājeṣu purumāyyam //
analyzed: indra yathā cit āvitha vājeṣu purumāyyam

original: RV_8,068.11a yasya te svādu sakhyaṃ svādvī praṇītir adrivaḥ /
analyzed: yasya te svādu sakhyam svādvī praṇītiḥ adrivas

original: RV_8,068.11c yajño vitantasāyyaḥ //
analyzed: yajñaḥ vitantasāyyaḥ

original: RV_8,068.12a uru ṇas tanve tana uru kṣayāya nas kṛdhi /
analyzed: uru naḥ tanve tane uru kṣayāya naḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_8,068.12c uru ṇo yandhi jīvase //
analyzed: uru naḥ yandhi jīvase

original: RV_8,068.13a uruṃ nṛbhya uruṃ gava uruṃ rathāya panthām /
analyzed: urum nṛbhyaḥ urum gave urum rathāya panthām

original: RV_8,068.13c devavītim manāmahe //
analyzed: deva vītim manāmahe

original: RV_8,068.14a upa mā ṣaḍ dvā-dvā naraḥ somasya harṣyā /
analyzed: upa mā ṣaṭ dvādvāḥ naraḥ somasya harṣyā

original: RV_8,068.14c tiṣṭhanti svādurātayaḥ //
analyzed: tiṣṭhanti svādu rātayaḥ

original: RV_8,068.15a ṛjrāv indrota ā dade harī ṛkṣasya sūnavi /
analyzed: ṛjrau indrote ā dade harī ṛkṣasya sūnavi

original: RV_8,068.15c āśvamedhasya rohitā //
analyzed: āśvamedhasya rohitā

original: RV_8,068.16a surathāṃ ātithigve svabhīśūṃr ārkṣe /
analyzed: su rathān ātithigve su abhīśūn ārkṣe

original: RV_8,068.16c āśvamedhe supeśasaḥ //
analyzed: āśvamedhe supeśasaḥ

original: RV_8,068.17a ṣaḷ aśvāṃ ātithigva indrote vadhūmataḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭ aśvān ātithigve indrote vadhūmataḥ

original: RV_8,068.17c sacā pūtakratau sanam //
analyzed: sacā pūtakratau sanam

original: RV_8,068.18a aiṣu cetad vṛṣaṇvaty antar ṛjreṣv aruṣī /
analyzed: ā eṣu cetat vṛṣaṇvatī antar ṛjreṣu aruṣī

original: RV_8,068.18c svabhīśuḥ kaśāvatī //
analyzed: su abhīśuḥ kaśāvatī

original: RV_8,068.19a na yuṣme vājabandhavo ninitsuś cana martyaḥ /
analyzed: na yuṣme vāja bandhavaḥ ninitsuḥ cana martyaḥ

original: RV_8,068.19c avadyam adhi dīdharat //
analyzed: avadyam adhi dīdharat

original: RV_8,069.01a pra-pra vas triṣṭubham iṣam mandadvīrāyendave /
analyzed: pra pra vaḥ triṣṭubham iṣam mandat vīrāya indave

original: RV_8,069.01c dhiyā vo medhasātaye purandhyā vivāsati //
analyzed: dhiyā vaḥ medha sātaye purandhyā vivāsati

original: RV_8,069.02a nadaṃ va odatīnāṃ nadaṃ yoyuvatīnām /
analyzed: nadam vaḥ odatīnām nadam yoyuvatīnām

original: RV_8,069.02c patiṃ vo aghnyānāṃ dhenūnām iṣudhyasi //
analyzed: patim vaḥ aghnyānām dhenūnām iṣudhyasi

original: RV_8,069.03a tā asya sūdadohasaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ asya sūdadohasaḥ somam śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ

original: RV_8,069.03c janman devānāṃ viśas triṣv ā rocane divaḥ //
analyzed: janman devānām viśaḥ triṣu ā rocane divaḥ

original: RV_8,069.04a abhi pra gopatiṃ girendram arca yathā vide /
analyzed: abhi pra go patim girā indram arca yathā vide

original: RV_8,069.04c sūnuṃ satyasya satpatim //
analyzed: sūnum satyasya sat patim

original: RV_8,069.05a ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire 'ruṣīr adhi barhiṣi /
analyzed: ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire ruṣīḥ adhi barhiṣi

original: RV_8,069.05c yatrābhi saṃnavāmahe //
analyzed: yatra abhi saṃnavāmahe

original: RV_8,069.06a indrāya gāva āśiraṃ duduhre vajriṇe madhu /
analyzed: indrāya gāvaḥ āśiram duduhre vajriṇe madhu

original: RV_8,069.06c yat sīm upahvare vidat //
analyzed: yat sīm upahvare vidat

original: RV_8,069.07a ud yad bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ gṛham indraś ca ganvahi /
analyzed: ud yat bradhnasya viṣṭapam gṛham indraḥ ca ganvahi

original: RV_8,069.07c madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi triḥ sapta sakhyuḥ pade //
analyzed: madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi tris sapta sakhyuḥ pade

original: RV_8,069.08a arcata prārcata priyamedhāso arcata /
analyzed: arcata prārcata priyamedhāsaḥ arcata

original: RV_8,069.08c arcantu putrakā uta puraṃ na dhṛṣṇv arcata //
analyzed: arcantu putrakāḥ uta puram na dhṛṣṇu arcata

original: RV_8,069.09a ava svarāti gargaro godhā pari saniṣvaṇat /
analyzed: ava svarāti gargaraḥ godhā pari saniṣvaṇat

original: RV_8,069.09c piṅgā pari caniṣkadad indrāya brahmodyatam //
analyzed: piṅgā pari caniṣkadat indrāya brahma udyatam

original: RV_8,069.10a ā yat patanty enyaḥ sudughā anapasphuraḥ /
analyzed: ā yat patanti enyaḥ su dughāḥ an apasphuraḥ

original: RV_8,069.10c apasphuraṃ gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave //
analyzed: apasphuram gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave

original: RV_8,069.11a apād indro apād agnir viśve devā amatsata /
analyzed: apāt indraḥ apāt agniḥ viśve devāḥ amatsata

original: RV_8,069.11c varuṇa id iha kṣayat tam āpo abhy anūṣata vatsaṃ saṃśiśvarīr iva //
analyzed: varuṇe id iha kṣayat tam āpaḥ abhī anūṣata vatsam saṃśiśvarīḥ iva

original: RV_8,069.12a sudevo asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: su devaḥ asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ

original: RV_8,069.12c anukṣaranti kākudaṃ sūrmyaṃ suṣirām iva //
analyzed: anukṣaranti kākudam sūrmyam suṣirām iva

original: RV_8,069.13a yo vyatīṃr aphāṇayat suyuktāṃ upa dāśuṣe /
analyzed: yaḥ vyatīṃr aphāṇayat su yuktām upa dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,069.13c takvo netā tad id vapur upamā yo amucyata //
analyzed: takvaḥ netā tat id vapuḥ upamā yaḥ amucyata

original: RV_8,069.14a atīd u śakra ohata indro viśvā ati dviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ati id u śakraḥ ohate indraḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_8,069.14c bhinat kanīna odanam pacyamānam paro girā //
analyzed: bhinat kanīnaḥ odanam pacyamānam paras girā

original: RV_8,069.15a arbhako na kumārako 'dhi tiṣṭhan navaṃ ratham /
analyzed: arbhakaḥ na kumārakaḥ dhi tiṣṭhat navam ratham

original: RV_8,069.15c sa pakṣan mahiṣam mṛgam pitre mātre vibhukratum //
analyzed: sa pakṣat mahiṣam mṛgam pitre mātre vibhu kratum

original: RV_8,069.16a ā tū suśipra dampate rathaṃ tiṣṭhā hiraṇyayam /
analyzed: ā tū su śipra dampate ratham tiṣṭha hiraṇyayam

original: RV_8,069.16c adha dyukṣaṃ sacevahi sahasrapādam aruṣaṃ svastigām anehasam //
analyzed: adha dyukṣam sacevahi sahasra pādam aruṣam svasti gām anehasam

original: RV_8,069.17a taṃ ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate /
analyzed: tam gha īm itthā namasvinaḥ upa svarājam āsate

original: RV_8,069.17c arthaṃ cid asya sudhitaṃ yad etava āvartayanti dāvane //
analyzed: artham cit asya sudhitam yat etave āvartayanti dāvane

original: RV_8,069.18a anu pratnasyaukasaḥ priyamedhāsa eṣām /
analyzed: anu pratnasya okasaḥ priyamedhāsaḥ eṣām

original: RV_8,069.18c pūrvām anu prayatiṃ vṛktabarhiṣo hitaprayasa āśata //
analyzed: pūrvām anu prayatim vṛkta barhiṣaḥ hita prayasaḥ āśata

original: RV_8,070.01a yo rājā carṣaṇīnāṃ yātā rathebhir adhriguḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ rājā carṣaṇīnām yātā rathebhiḥ adhriguḥ

original: RV_8,070.01c viśvāsāṃ tarutā pṛtanānāṃ jyeṣṭho yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe //
analyzed: viśvāsām tarutā pṛtanānām jyeṣṭhaḥ yaḥ vṛtra hā gṛṇe

original: RV_8,070.02a indraṃ taṃ śumbha puruhanmann avase yasya dvitā vidhartari /
analyzed: indram tam śumbha puru hanman avase yasya dvitā vidhartari

original: RV_8,070.02c hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśato maho dive na sūryaḥ //
analyzed: hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśataḥ mahaḥ dive na sūryaḥ

original: RV_8,070.03a nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśad yaś cakāra sadāvṛdham /
analyzed: nakir tam karmaṇā naśat yaḥ cakāra sadāvṛdham

original: RV_8,070.03c indraṃ na yajñair viśvagūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭaṃ dhṛṣṇvojasam //
analyzed: indram na yajñaiḥ viśva gūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭam dhṛṣṇu ojasam

original: RV_8,070.04a aṣāḷham ugram pṛtanāsu sāsahiṃ yasmin mahīr urujrayaḥ /
analyzed: aṣāḍham ugram pṛtanāsu sāsahim yasmin mahīḥ urujrayaḥ

original: RV_8,070.04c saṃ dhenavo jāyamāne anonavur dyāvaḥ kṣāmo anonavuḥ //
analyzed: sam dhenavaḥ jāyamāne anonavuḥ dyāvaḥ kṣāmaḥ anonavuḥ

original: RV_8,070.05a yad dyāva indra te śataṃ śatam bhūmīr uta syuḥ /
analyzed: yat dyāvaḥ indra te śatam śatam bhūmīḥ uta syuḥ

original: RV_8,070.05c na tvā vajrin sahasraṃ sūryā anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī //
analyzed: na tvā vajrin sahasram sūryāḥ anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī

original: RV_8,070.06a ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā /
analyzed: ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā

original: RV_8,070.06c asmāṃ ava maghavan gomati vraje vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: asmān ava maghavan gomati vraje vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,070.07a na sīm adeva āpad iṣaṃ dīrghāyo martyaḥ /
analyzed: na sīm adevaḥ āpat iṣam dīrgha āyo martyaḥ

original: RV_8,070.07c etagvā cid ya etaśā yuyojate harī indro yuyojate //
analyzed: etagvā cit yaḥ etaśā yuyojate harī indraḥ yuyojate

original: RV_8,070.08a taṃ vo maho mahāyyam indraṃ dānāya sakṣaṇim /
analyzed: tam vaḥ mahāyyam indram dānāya sakṣaṇim

original: RV_8,070.08c yo gādheṣu ya āraṇeṣu havyo vājeṣv asti havyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ gādheṣu yaḥ āraṇeṣu havyaḥ vājeṣu asti havyaḥ

original: RV_8,070.09a ud ū ṣu ṇo vaso mahe mṛśasva śūra rādhase /
analyzed: ud u su naḥ vaso mahe mṛśasva śūra rādhase

original: RV_8,070.09c ud ū ṣu mahyai maghavan maghattaya ud indra śravase mahe //
analyzed: ud u su mahyai maghavan maghattaye ud indra śravase mahe

original: RV_8,070.10a tvaṃ na indra ṛtayus tvānido ni tṛmpasi /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indraḥ ṛtayuḥ tvānidaḥ ni tṛmpasi

original: RV_8,070.10c madhye vasiṣva tuvinṛmṇorvor ni dāsaṃ śiśnatho hathaiḥ //
analyzed: madhye vasiṣva tuvi nṛmṇa ūrvoḥ ni dāsam śiśnathaḥ hathaiḥ

original: RV_8,070.11a anyavratam amānuṣam ayajvānam adevayum /
analyzed: anya vratam a mānuṣam a yajvānam a devayum

original: RV_8,070.11c ava svaḥ sakhā dudhuvīta parvataḥ sughnāya dasyum parvataḥ //
analyzed: ava svaḥ sakhā dudhuvīta parvataḥ su ghnāya dasyum parvataḥ

original: RV_8,070.12a tvaṃ na indrāsāṃ haste śaviṣṭha dāvane /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra āsām haste śaviṣṭha dāvane

original: RV_8,070.12c dhānānāṃ na saṃ gṛbhāyāsmayur dviḥ saṃ gṛbhāyāsmayuḥ //
analyzed: dhānānām na sam gṛbhāya asmayuḥ dvis sam gṛbhāya asmayuḥ

original: RV_8,070.13a sakhāyaḥ kratum icchata kathā rādhāma śarasya /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ kratum icchata kathā rādhāma śarasya

original: RV_8,070.13c upastutim bhojaḥ sūrir yo ahrayaḥ //
analyzed: upastutim bhojaḥ sūriḥ yaḥ ahrayaḥ

original: RV_8,070.14a bhūribhiḥ samaha ṛṣibhir barhiṣmadbhi staviṣyase /
analyzed: bhūribhiḥ samaha ṛṣibhiḥ barhiṣmadbhiḥ staviṣyase

original: RV_8,070.14c yad ittham ekam-ekam ic chara vatsān parādadaḥ //
analyzed: yat ittham ekam ekam id śara vatsān parādadaḥ

original: RV_8,070.15a karṇagṛhyā maghavā śauradevyo vatsaṃ nas tribhya ānayat /
analyzed: karṇa gṛhya maghavā śauradevyaḥ vatsam naḥ tribhyaḥ ānayat

original: RV_8,070.15c ajāṃ sūrir na dhātave //
analyzed: ajām sūriḥ na dhātave

original: RV_8,071.01a tvaṃ no agne mahobhiḥ pāhi viśvasyā arāteḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne mahobhiḥ pāhi viśvasyāḥ arāteḥ

original: RV_8,071.01c uta dviṣo martyasya //
analyzed: uta dviṣaḥ martyasya

original: RV_8,071.02a nahi manyuḥ pauruṣeya īśe hi vaḥ priyajāta /
analyzed: nahi manyuḥ pauruṣeyaḥ īśe hi vaḥ priya jāta

original: RV_8,071.02c tvam id asi kṣapāvān //
analyzed: tvam id asi kṣapāvān

original: RV_8,071.03a sa no viśvebhir devebhir ūrjo napād bhadraśoce /
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvebhiḥ devebhiḥ ūrjaḥ napāt bhadra śoce

original: RV_8,071.03c rayiṃ dehi viśvavāram //
analyzed: rayim dehi viśva vāram

original: RV_8,071.04a na tam agne arātayo martaṃ yuvanta rāyaḥ /
analyzed: na tam agne arātayaḥ martam yuvanta rāyaḥ

original: RV_8,071.04c yaṃ trāyase dāśvāṃsam //
analyzed: yam trāyase dāśvāṃsam

original: RV_8,071.05a yaṃ tvaṃ vipra medhasātāv agne hinoṣi dhanāya /
analyzed: yam tvam vipra medha sātau agne hinoṣi dhanāya

original: RV_8,071.05c sa tavotī goṣu gantā //
analyzed: sa tava ūtī goṣu gantā

original: RV_8,071.06a tvaṃ rayim puruvīram agne dāśuṣe martāya /
analyzed: tvam rayim puru vīram agne dāśuṣe martāya

original: RV_8,071.06c pra ṇo naya vasyo accha //
analyzed: pra naḥ naya vasyaḥ accha

original: RV_8,071.07a uruṣyā ṇo mā parā dā aghāyate jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: uruṣya naḥ mā parā dāḥ aghāyate jātavedaḥ

original: RV_8,071.07c durādhye martāya //
analyzed: durādhye martāya

original: RV_8,071.08a agne mākiṣ ṭe devasya rātim adevo yuyota /
analyzed: agne mākir te devasya rātim adevaḥ yuyota

original: RV_8,071.08c tvam īśiṣe vasūnām //
analyzed: tvam īśiṣe vasūnām

original: RV_8,071.09a sa no vasva upa māsy ūrjo napān māhinasya /
analyzed: sa naḥ vasvaḥ upa māsi ūrjaḥ napāt māhinasya

original: RV_8,071.09c sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ //
analyzed: sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_8,071.10a acchā naḥ śīraśociṣaṃ giro yantu darśatam /
analyzed: acchā naḥ śīra śociṣam giraḥ yantu darśatam

original: RV_8,071.10c acchā yajñāso namasā purūvasum purupraśastam ūtaye //
analyzed: acchā yajñāsaḥ namasā purūvasum puru praśastam ūtaye

original: RV_8,071.11a agniṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ dānāya vāryāṇām /
analyzed: agnim sūnum sahasaḥ jātavedasam dānāya vāryāṇām

original: RV_8,071.11c dvitā yo bhūd amṛto martyeṣv ā hotā mandratamo viśi //
analyzed: dvitā yaḥ bhūt amṛtaḥ martyeṣu ā hotā mandratamaḥ viśi

original: RV_8,071.12a agniṃ vo devayajyayāgnim prayaty adhvare /
analyzed: agnim vaḥ deva yajyayā agnim prayati adhvare

original: RV_8,071.12c agniṃ dhīṣu prathamam agnim arvaty agniṃ kṣaitrāya sādhase //
analyzed: agnim dhīṣu prathamam agnim arvati agnim kṣaitrāya sādhase

original: RV_8,071.13a agnir iṣāṃ sakhye dadātu na īśe yo vāryāṇām /
analyzed: agniḥ iṣām sakhye dadātu naḥ īśe yaḥ vāryāṇām

original: RV_8,071.13c agniṃ toke tanaye śaśvad īmahe vasuṃ santaṃ tanūpām //
analyzed: agnim toke tanaye śaśvat īmahe vasum santam tanū pām

original: RV_8,071.14a agnim īḷiṣvāvase gāthābhiḥ śīraśociṣam /
analyzed: agnim īḍiṣva avase gāthābhiḥ śīra śociṣam

original: RV_8,071.14c agniṃ rāye purumīḷha śrutaṃ naro 'gniṃ sudītaye chardiḥ //
analyzed: agnim rāye purumīḷha śrutam naraḥ gnim sudītaye chardiḥ

original: RV_8,071.15a agniṃ dveṣo yotavai no gṛṇīmasy agniṃ śaṃ yoś ca dātave /
analyzed: agnim dveṣaḥ yotavai naḥ gṛṇīmasi agnim śam yos ca dātave

original: RV_8,071.15c viśvāsu vikṣv aviteva havyo bhuvad vastur ṛṣūṇām //
analyzed: viśvāsu vikṣu avitā iva havyaḥ bhuvat vastuḥ ṛṣūṇām

original: RV_8,072.01a haviṣ kṛṇudhvam ā gamad adhvaryur vanate punaḥ /
analyzed: haviṣ kṛṇudhvam ā gamat adhvaryuḥ vanate punar

original: RV_8,072.01c vidvāṃ asya praśāsanam //
analyzed: vidvān asya praśāsanam

original: RV_8,072.02a ni tigmam abhy aṃśuṃ sīdad dhotā manāv adhi /
analyzed: ni tigmam abhī aṃśum sīdat hotā manau adhi

original: RV_8,072.02c juṣāṇo asya sakhyam //
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ asya sakhyam

original: RV_8,072.03a antar icchanti taṃ jane rudram paro manīṣayā /
analyzed: antar icchanti tam jane rudram paras manīṣayā

original: RV_8,072.03c gṛbhṇanti jihvayā sasam //
analyzed: gṛbhṇanti jihvayā sasam

original: RV_8,072.04a jāmy atītape dhanur vayodhā aruhad vanam /
analyzed: jāmī atītape dhanuḥ vayodhāḥ aruhat vanam

original: RV_8,072.04c dṛṣadaṃ jihvayāvadhīt //
analyzed: dṛṣadam jihvayā avadhīt

original: RV_8,072.05a caran vatso ruśann iha nidātāraṃ na vindate /
analyzed: caran vatsaḥ ruśan iha nidātāram na vindate

original: RV_8,072.05c veti stotava ambyam //
analyzed: veti stotava ambyam

original: RV_8,072.06a uto nv asya yan mahad aśvāvad yojanam bṛhad /
analyzed: uta u nu asya yat mahat aśvāvat yojanam bṛhat

original: RV_8,072.06c dāmā rathasya dadṛśe //
analyzed: dāmā rathasya dadṛśe

original: RV_8,072.07a duhanti saptaikām upa dvā pañca sṛjataḥ /
analyzed: duhanti sapta ekām upa dvā pañca sṛjataḥ

original: RV_8,072.07c tīrthe sindhor adhi svare //
analyzed: tīrthe sindhoḥ adhi svare

original: RV_8,072.08a ā daśabhir vivasvata indraḥ kośam acucyavīt /
analyzed: ā daśabhiḥ vivasvataḥ indraḥ kośam acucyavīt

original: RV_8,072.08c khedayā trivṛtā divaḥ //
analyzed: khedayā trivṛtā divaḥ

original: RV_8,072.09a pari tridhātur adhvaraṃ jūrṇir eti navīyasī /
analyzed: pari tri dhātuḥ adhvaram jūrṇiḥ eti navīyasī

original: RV_8,072.09c madhvā hotāro añjate //
analyzed: madhvā hotāraḥ añjate

original: RV_8,072.10a siñcanti namasāvatam uccācakram parijmānam /
analyzed: siñcanti namasā avatam uccācakram parijmānam

original: RV_8,072.10c nīcīnabāram akṣitam //
analyzed: nīcīna bāram akṣitam

original: RV_8,072.11a abhyāram id adrayo niṣiktam puṣkare madhu /
analyzed: abhyāram id adrayaḥ niṣiktam puṣkare madhu
