original: RV_8,100.10a yad vāg vadanty avicetanāni rāṣṭrī devānāṃ niṣasāda mandrā /
analyzed: yat vāc vadantī a vicetanāni rāṣṭrī devānām niṣasāda mandrā

original: RV_8,100.10c catasra ūrjaṃ duduhe payāṃsi kva svid asyāḥ paramaṃ jagāma //
analyzed: catasraḥ ūrjam duduhe payāṃsi kva svid asyāḥ paramam jagāma

original: RV_8,100.11a devīṃ vācam ajanayanta devās tāṃ viśvarūpāḥ paśavo vadanti /
analyzed: devīm vācam ajanayanta devāḥ tām viśva rūpāḥ paśavaḥ vadanti

original: RV_8,100.11c sā no mandreṣam ūrjaṃ duhānā dhenur vāg asmān upa suṣṭutaitu //
analyzed: sā naḥ mandrā iṣam ūrjam duhānā dhenuḥ vāc asmān upa suṣṭutā etu

original: RV_8,100.12a sakhe viṣṇo vitaraṃ vi kramasva dyaur dehi lokaṃ vajrāya viṣkabhe /
analyzed: sakhe viṣṇo vitaram vi kramasva dyauḥ dehi lokam vajrāya viṣkabhe

original: RV_8,100.12c hanāva vṛtraṃ riṇacāva sindhūn indrasya yantu prasave visṛṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: hanāva vṛtram riṇacāva sindhūn indrasya yantu prasave visṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_8,101.01a ṛdhag itthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye /
analyzed: ṛdhak itthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye

original: RV_8,101.01c yo nūnam mitrāvaruṇāv abhiṣṭaya ācakre havyadātaye //
analyzed: yaḥ nūnam mitrāvaruṇau abhiṣṭaye ācakre havya dātaye

original: RV_8,101.02a varṣiṣṭhakṣatrā urucakṣasā narā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā /
analyzed: varṣiṣṭha kṣatrau uru cakṣasā narā rājānā dīrgha śruttamā

original: RV_8,101.02c tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ //
analyzed: tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_8,101.03a pra yo vām mitrāvaruṇājiro dūto adravat /
analyzed: pra yaḥ vām mitrāvaruṇā ajiraḥ dūtaḥ adravat

original: RV_8,101.03c ayaḥśīrṣā maderaghuḥ //
analyzed: ayaḥ śīrṣā maderaghuḥ

original: RV_8,101.04a na yaḥ sampṛcche na punar havītave na saṃvādāya ramate /
analyzed: na yaḥ sampṛcche na punar havītave na saṃvādāya ramate

original: RV_8,101.04c tasmān no adya samṛter uruṣyatam bāhubhyāṃ na uruṣyatam //
analyzed: tasmāt naḥ adya samṛteḥ uruṣyatam bāhubhyām naḥ uruṣyatam

original: RV_8,101.05a pra mitrāya prāryamṇe sacathyam ṛtāvaso /
analyzed: pra mitrāya pra aryamṇe sacathyam ṛtāvaso

original: RV_8,101.05c varūthyaṃ varuṇe chandyaṃ vaca stotraṃ rājasu gāyata //
analyzed: varūthyam varuṇe chandyam vacaḥ stotram rājasu gāyata

original: RV_8,101.06a te hinvire aruṇaṃ jenyaṃ vasv ekam putraṃ tisṝṇām /
analyzed: te hinvire aruṇam jenyam vasu ekam putram tisṝṇām

original: RV_8,101.06c te dhāmāny amṛtā martyānām adabdhā abhi cakṣate //
analyzed: te dhāmāni amṛtā martyānām adabdhā abhi cakṣate

original: RV_8,101.07a ā me vacāṃsy udyatā dyumattamāni kartvā /
analyzed: ā me vacāṃsi udyatā dyumattamāni kartvā

original: RV_8,101.07c ubhā yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣasā prati havyāni vītaye //
analyzed: ubhā yātam nāsatyā sajoṣasā prati havyāni vītaye

original: RV_8,101.08a rātiṃ yad vām arakṣasaṃ havāmahe yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū /
analyzed: rātim yat vām arakṣasam havāmahe yuvābhyām vājinīvasū

original: RV_8,101.08c prācīṃ hotrām pratirantāv itaṃ narā gṛṇānā jamadagninā //
analyzed: prācīm hotrām pratirantau itam narā gṛṇānā jamadagninā

original: RV_8,101.09a ā no yajñaṃ divispṛśaṃ vāyo yāhi sumanmabhiḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam divispṛśam vāyo yāhi su manmabhiḥ

original: RV_8,101.09c antaḥ pavitra upari śrīṇāno 'yaṃ śukro ayāmi te //
analyzed: antar pavitre upari śrīṇānaḥ yam śukraḥ ayāmi te

original: RV_8,101.10a vety adhvaryuḥ pathibhī rajiṣṭhaiḥ prati havyāni vītaye /
analyzed: veti adhvaryuḥ pathibhiḥ rajiṣṭhaiḥ prati havyāni vītaye

original: RV_8,101.10c adhā niyutva ubhayasya naḥ piba śuciṃ somaṃ gavāśiram //
analyzed: adha niyutvas ubhayasya naḥ piba śucim somam gavāśiram

original: RV_8,101.11a baṇ mahāṃ asi sūrya baḷ āditya mahāṃ asi /
analyzed: baṭ mahān asi sūrya baṭ āditya mahān asi

original: RV_8,101.11c mahas te sato mahimā panasyate 'ddhā deva mahāṃ asi //
analyzed: mahaḥ te sataḥ mahimā panasyate ddhā deva mahān asi

original: RV_8,101.12a baṭ sūrya śravasā mahāṃ asi satrā deva mahāṃ asi /
analyzed: baṭ sūrya śravasā mahān asi satrā deva mahān asi

original: RV_8,101.12c mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohito vibhu jyotir adābhyam //
analyzed: mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohitaḥ vibhu jyotiḥ adābhyam

original: RV_8,101.13a iyaṃ yā nīcy arkiṇī rūpā rohiṇyā kṛtā /
analyzed: iyam yā nīcī arkiṇī rūpā rohiṇyā kṛtā

original: RV_8,101.13c citreva praty adarśy āyaty antar daśasu bāhuṣu //
analyzed: citrā iva prati adarśi āyatī antar daśasu bāhuṣu

original: RV_8,101.14a prajā ha tisro atyāyam īyur ny anyā arkam abhito viviśre /
analyzed: prajāḥ ha tisraḥ atyāyam īyuḥ ni anyāḥ arkam abhitas viviśre

original: RV_8,101.14c bṛhad dha tasthau bhuvaneṣv antaḥ pavamāno harita ā viveśa //
analyzed: bṛhat ha tasthau bhuvaneṣu antar pavamānaḥ haritaḥ ā viveśa

original: RV_8,101.15a mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: mātā rudrāṇām duhitā vasūnām svasā ādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_8,101.15c pra nu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gām anāgām aditiṃ vadhiṣṭa //
analyzed: pra nu vocam cikituṣe janāya mā gām anāgām aditim vadhiṣṭa

original: RV_8,101.16a vacovidaṃ vācam udīrayantīṃ viśvābhir dhībhir upatiṣṭhamānām /
analyzed: vacaḥ vidam vācam udīrayantīm viśvābhiḥ dhībhiḥ upatiṣṭhamānām

original: RV_8,101.16c devīṃ devebhyaḥ pary eyuṣīṃ gām ā māvṛkta martyo dabhracetāḥ //
analyzed: devīm devebhyaḥ pari eyuṣīm gām ā mā avṛkta martyaḥ dabhra cetāḥ

original: RV_8,102.01a tvam agne bṛhad vayo dadhāsi deva dāśuṣe /
analyzed: tvam agne bṛhat vayaḥ dadhāsi deva dāśuṣe

original: RV_8,102.01c kavir gṛhapatir yuvā //
analyzed: kaviḥ gṛhapatiḥ yuvā

original: RV_8,102.02a sa na īḷānayā saha devāṃ agne duvasyuvā /
analyzed: sa naḥ īḍānayā saha devān agne duvasyuvā

original: RV_8,102.02c cikid vibhānav ā vaha //
analyzed: cikit vibhāno ā vaha

original: RV_8,102.03a tvayā ha svid yujā vayaṃ codiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya /
analyzed: tvayā ha svid yujā vayam codiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_8,102.03c abhi ṣmo vājasātaye //
analyzed: abhi smaḥ vājasātaye

original: RV_8,102.04a aurvabhṛguvac chucim apnavānavad ā huve /
analyzed: aurva bhṛgu vat śucim apnavāna vat ā huve

original: RV_8,102.04c agniṃ samudravāsasam //
analyzed: agnim samudra vāsasam

original: RV_8,102.05a huve vātasvanaṃ kavim parjanyakrandyaṃ sahaḥ /
analyzed: huve vāta svanam kavim parjanya krandyam sahaḥ

original: RV_8,102.05c agniṃ samudravāsasam //
analyzed: agnim samudra vāsasam

original: RV_8,102.06a ā savaṃ savitur yathā bhagasyeva bhujiṃ huve /
analyzed: ā savam savituḥ yathā bhagasya iva bhujim huve

original: RV_8,102.06c agniṃ samudravāsasam //
analyzed: agnim samudra vāsasam

original: RV_8,102.07a agniṃ vo vṛdhantam adhvarāṇām purūtamam /
analyzed: agnim vaḥ vṛdhantam adhvarāṇām purūtamam

original: RV_8,102.07c acchā naptre sahasvate //
analyzed: acchā naptre sahasvate

original: RV_8,102.08a ayaṃ yathā na ābhuvat tvaṣṭā rūpeva takṣyā /
analyzed: ayam yathā naḥ ābhuvat tvaṣṭā rūpā iva takṣyā

original: RV_8,102.08c asya kratvā yaśasvataḥ //
analyzed: asya kratvā yaśasvataḥ

original: RV_8,102.09a ayaṃ viśvā abhi śriyo 'gnir deveṣu patyate /
analyzed: ayam viśvāḥ abhi śriyaḥ gniḥ deveṣu patyate

original: RV_8,102.09c ā vājair upa no gamat //
analyzed: ā vājaiḥ upa naḥ gamat

original: RV_8,102.10a viśveṣām iha stuhi hotṝṇāṃ yaśastamam /
analyzed: viśveṣām iha stuhi hotṝṇām yaśastamam

original: RV_8,102.10c agniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam //
analyzed: agnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_8,102.11a śīram pāvakaśociṣaṃ jyeṣṭho yo dameṣv ā /
analyzed: śīram pāvaka śociṣam jyeṣṭhaḥ yaḥ dameṣu ā

original: RV_8,102.11c dīdāya dīrghaśruttamaḥ //
analyzed: dīdāya dīrghaśruttamaḥ

original: RV_8,102.12a tam arvantaṃ na sānasiṃ gṛṇīhi vipra śuṣmiṇam /
analyzed: tam arvantam na sānasim gṛṇīhi vipra śuṣmiṇam

original: RV_8,102.12c mitraṃ na yātayajjanam //
analyzed: mitram na yātayat janam

original: RV_8,102.13a upa tvā jāmayo giro dediśatīr haviṣkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: upa tvā jāmayaḥ giraḥ dediśatīḥ haviṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_8,102.13c vāyor anīke asthiran //
analyzed: vāyoḥ anīke asthiran

original: RV_8,102.14a yasya tridhātv avṛtam barhis tasthāv asaṃdinam /
analyzed: yasya tri dhātu a vṛtam barhiḥ tasthau a saṃdinam

original: RV_8,102.14c āpaś cin ni dadhā padam //
analyzed: āpaḥ cit ni dadha padam

original: RV_8,102.15a padaṃ devasya mīḷhuṣo 'nādhṛṣṭābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: padam devasya mīḍhuṣaḥ na adhṛṣṭābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_8,102.15c bhadrā sūrya ivopadṛk //
analyzed: bhadrā sūryaḥ iva upadṛś

original: RV_8,102.16a agne ghṛtasya dhītibhis tepāno deva śociṣā /
analyzed: agne ghṛtasya dhītibhiḥ tepānaḥ deva śociṣā

original: RV_8,102.16c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
analyzed: ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca

original: RV_8,102.17a taṃ tvājananta mātaraḥ kaviṃ devāso aṅgiraḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā ajananta mātaraḥ kavim devāsaḥ aṅgiraḥ

original: RV_8,102.17c havyavāham amartyam //
analyzed: havya vāham amartyam

original: RV_8,102.18a pracetasaṃ tvā kave 'gne dūtaṃ vareṇyam /
analyzed: pracetasam tvā kave gne dūtam vareṇyam

original: RV_8,102.18c havyavāhaṃ ni ṣedire //
analyzed: havyavāham ni sedire

original: RV_8,102.19a nahi me asty aghnyā na svadhitir vananvati /
analyzed: nahi me asti aghnyā na svadhitiḥ vananvati

original: RV_8,102.19c athaitādṛg bharāmi te //
analyzed: atha etādṛś bharāmi te

original: RV_8,102.20a yad agne kāni kāni cid ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi /
analyzed: yat agne kāni kāni cit ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi

original: RV_8,102.20c tā juṣasva yaviṣṭhya //
analyzed: tā juṣasva yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_8,102.21a yad atty upajihvikā yad vamro atisarpati /
analyzed: yat atti upajihvikā yat vamraḥ atisarpati

original: RV_8,102.21c sarvaṃ tad astu te ghṛtam //
analyzed: sarvam tat astu te ghṛtam

original: RV_8,102.22a agnim indhāno manasā dhiyaṃ saceta martyaḥ /
analyzed: agnim indhānaḥ manasā dhiyam saceta martyaḥ

original: RV_8,102.22c agnim īdhe vivasvabhiḥ //
analyzed: agnim īdhe vivasvabhiḥ

original: RV_8,103.01a adarśi gātuvittamo yasmin vratāny ādadhuḥ /
analyzed: adarśi gātu vittamaḥ yasmin vratāni ādadhuḥ

original: RV_8,103.01c upo ṣu jātam āryasya vardhanam agniṃ nakṣanta no giraḥ //
analyzed: upa u su jātam āryasya vardhanam agnim nakṣanta naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_8,103.02a pra daivodāso agnir devāṃ acchā na majmanā /
analyzed: pra daivodāsaḥ agniḥ devān acchā na majmanā

original: RV_8,103.02c anu mātaram pṛthivīṃ vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi //
analyzed: anu mātaram pṛthivīm vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi

original: RV_8,103.03a yasmād rejanta kṛṣṭayaś carkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt rejanta kṛṣṭayaḥ carkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ

original: RV_8,103.03c sahasrasām medhasātāv iva tmanāgniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata //
analyzed: sahasra sām medha sātau iva tmanā agnim dhībhiḥ saparyata

original: RV_8,103.04a pra yaṃ rāye ninīṣasi marto yas te vaso dāśat /
analyzed: pra yam rāye ninīṣasi martaḥ yaḥ te vaso dāśat

original: RV_8,103.04c sa vīraṃ dhatte agna ukthaśaṃsinaṃ tmanā sahasrapoṣiṇam //
analyzed: sa vīram dhatte agne uktha śaṃsinam tmanā sahasra poṣiṇam

original: RV_8,103.05a sa dṛḷhe cid abhi tṛṇatti vājam arvatā sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ /
analyzed: sa dṛḷhe cit abhi tṛṇatti vājam arvatā sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ

original: RV_8,103.05c tve devatrā sadā purūvaso viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi //
analyzed: tve devatrā sadā purūvaso viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi

original: RV_8,103.06a yo viśvā dayate vasu hotā mandro janānām /
analyzed: yaḥ viśvā dayate vasu hotā mandraḥ janānām

original: RV_8,103.06c madhor na pātrā prathamāny asmai pra stomā yanty agnaye //
analyzed: madhoḥ na pātrā prathamāni asmai pra stomāḥ yanti agnaye

original: RV_8,103.07a aśvaṃ na gīrbhī rathyaṃ sudānavo marmṛjyante devayavaḥ /
analyzed: aśvam na gīrbhiḥ rathyam sudānavaḥ marmṛjyante devayavaḥ

original: RV_8,103.07c ubhe toke tanaye dasma viśpate parṣi rādho maghonām //
analyzed: ubhe toke tanaye dasma viśpate parṣi rādhaḥ maghonām

original: RV_8,103.08a pra maṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata ṛtāvne bṛhate śukraśociṣe /
analyzed: pra maṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata ṛtāvne bṛhate śukra śociṣe

original: RV_8,103.08c upastutāso agnaye //
analyzed: upastutāsaḥ agnaye

original: RV_8,103.09a ā vaṃsate maghavā vīravad yaśaḥ samiddho dyumny āhutaḥ /
analyzed: ā vaṃsate maghavā vīravat yaśaḥ samiddhaḥ dyumnī āhutaḥ

original: RV_8,103.09c kuvin no asya sumatir navīyasy acchā vājebhir āgamat //
analyzed: kuvid naḥ asya sumatiḥ navīyasī acchā vājebhiḥ āgamat

original: RV_8,103.10a preṣṭham u priyāṇāṃ stuhy āsāvātithim /
analyzed: preṣṭham u priyāṇām stuhi āsāva atithim

original: RV_8,103.10c agniṃ rathānāṃ yamam //
analyzed: agnim rathānām yamam

original: RV_8,103.11a uditā yo niditā veditā vasv ā yajñiyo vavartati /
analyzed: uditā yaḥ niditā veditā vasū ā yajñiyaḥ vavartati

original: RV_8,103.11c duṣṭarā yasya pravaṇe normayo dhiyā vājaṃ siṣāsataḥ //
analyzed: duṣṭarāḥ yasya pravaṇe na ūrmayaḥ dhiyā vājam siṣāsataḥ

original: RV_8,103.12a mā no hṛṇītām atithir vasur agniḥ purupraśasta eṣaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ hṛṇītām atithiḥ vasuḥ agniḥ puru praśastaḥ eṣaḥ

original: RV_8,103.12c yaḥ suhotā svadhvaraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ su hotā su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_8,103.13a mo te riṣan ye acchoktibhir vaso 'gne kebhiś cid evaiḥ /
analyzed: mā u te riṣan ye acchoktibhiḥ vaso gne kebhiḥ cit evaiḥ

original: RV_8,103.13c kīriś cid dhi tvām īṭṭe dūtyāya rātahavyaḥ svadhvaraḥ //
analyzed: kīriḥ cit hi tvām īṭṭe dūtyāya rāta havyaḥ su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_8,103.14a āgne yāhi marutsakhā rudrebhiḥ somapītaye /
analyzed: ā agne yāhi marut sakhā rudrebhiḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_8,103.14c sobharyā upa suṣṭutim mādayasva svarṇare //
analyzed: sobharyāḥ upa suṣṭutim mādayasva svarṇare
